Title: Vendor Management Lead
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Join us on this exciting journey, and together, we’ll reimagine the future.
Role with us
Manage and effectively lead a group of technical staff to ensure the successful operations of the Mass Market Operations business based within several Industry Partners in India. Achieve agreed customer service delivery and business targets for all associated Fixed wireline and Mobility support functions
This role will be key to enabling the continued evolution of our business model to streamline our Operations in India. You will lead a small but potent team in the ICC that will be accountable for the service delivery performance of our Industry Partners in India for Fixed Wireline and Mobile Activations. You will be accountable for building effective relationships with your peers and all stakeholders and the development of the Mass Market operations team in the Innovation Capability Centre as we realign and optimise our service delivery footprint
Key Accountabilities
Guide and support our Industry Partners to achieve SLA performance, customer experience expectations and quality standards within budget.
Oversee performance to Operational KPIs and assist with driving the Industry Partners to achieve key deliverables (see Activation Metrics)
Conduct daily/weekly performance stand-ups with the industry partner leadership teams and act as a conduit between the cross functional teams in Telstra and the partner should there be any escalations
Understand Telstra’s Risk and Compliance Framework (e.g. Privacy risk, Security risk, IT Risk etc.) and support/ facilitate partner in developing suitable Plans to ensure compliance (e.g. Business Continuity Plans)
Ensuring there is no risk to Telstra’s Regulatory obligations – Meet and exceed on the industry regulatory standards [ACMA]
Build highly effective relationships with your peers and all stakeholders and the development of the team
Build and maintain solid, productive relationships with industry partners and other operational leads to ensure consistency and improvement across the entire activation episode.
Work with the partners to execute troubleshooting exercises required to ensure order progression, including escalation into dependant groups where required (i.e. Field workforce, Sales, IT)
Identification and resolution of partner pain points, including feedback to the vertical on systemic issues requiring improvement
Monitoring of quality and compliance through presence on the floor – partner with the quality teams to ensure the quality framework meets business needs
Maintain the business area Operating / Engagement Model, updating it as new situations arise
Input into the monthly forecasting process, to ensure the Operational lead has appropriate input to sign off on forecast [i.e. – AHT reviews]
Providing Key Operational input to shape the contractual obligations from a commercial stand point
Ensure effective reporting frameworks are in place to support monitoring of key operational metrics
Co-ordinate post-implementation reviews of projects or plans, and analyse their impact on the achievement of the groups KPIs
Act as the point of contact for any incident management or business continuity events [Downtime due to systems being offline, weather and political events] that severely impact operations
Collaborate with the partner to develop glide paths to recovery based on factual evidence, performance standards and staffing levels and ensure the partner delivers on the stated glide paths
Ensure the partner teams are 100% compliant with all Telstra mandatory training course – i.e. Business Essentials
Accountable for the implementation of new processes & procedures. This may include a small scale, fully operational, implementation of a new process - to learn how to bring the change into complete readiness
Conduct weekly/fortnightly ride-on’s to understand the process gaps and determine improvement opportunities
Develop a 30-60-90-day program of work to improve the partners performance and also undertake analysis, research & diagnosis to identify patterns, trends or issues that need a solution or resolution to be developed
Onsite guidance and support for any future Transition activities. Provide “on-site” health checks for the project team for any transition with the aim of achieving Tollgate on or before plan
Skill & Experience: 8 + yrs
Relevant experience in Leading diverse teams
Relevant tertiary qualifications (e.g. business, commercial, management, procurement) coupled with 5 to 10 years demonstrated experience (i.e. considered a specialist in field)
Experience in driving operational improvement programs across third-party service providers, especially in India.
Experience delivering significant cost savings over the life of Partner contracts
Experience engaging and influencing senior stakeholders, both internal and external, to achieve business objectives
Commercial management experience and contribution to solving complex problems.
Proven ability to contribute to and inform strategy development within area of expertise
Demonstrated excellent written and verbal communication skills
Experience working in a complex, cross functional company such as Telstra
International BPO Experience

Why Join us
Our people in India will be at the forefront of technological change as they work collaboratively with, and learn from, world-class experts and have access to the latest training programs and insights for their field.
Alongside your work on leading edge projects, working with us means you'll have access to company perks and benefits that'll reward you for the great work you do. We’re growing, fast, and for you that means many exciting opportunities to develop your career with us at Telstra.
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit tel.st/allrolesflex

Title: VP-Technology
Description:
Position Summary
The Chief Technology Officer (CTO) is responsible for overseeing all technical aspects at Pluto7 with deep focus in Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and Big Data Analytics. The CTO works with Executive Management to grow the company through the use of technological resources. Using an active and practical approach, the CTO will direct all employees globally to attain the company’s strategic goals established in the company’s strategic plan aligned with Google Cloud Platform in partnership with Google.
Responsibilities/Duties
THIS IS NOT A PURE PEOPLE MANAGEMENT OR A SLIDEWARE JOB.
Establish the company’s technical vision and leads all aspects of the company’s technological development with focus on ML, AI and Big Data.
Actively interact with Google and Google's customers as a Partner on strategic engagements
Directs Pluto7's strategic direction, development and future growth.
Works in a consultative fashion with other department heads, such as marketing, delivery and operations as an advisory of technologies that may improve their efficiency and effectiveness.

Get into building ML models hands no and be deep in data sciences expertise
Be hands on solution design for enterprise customers

Engage with Google and Google's customers actively in solving domain centric problems of Fortune 500 customers

BS in related field and at least 15 years experience in the Information Technology arena, at least 10 years management and strategic experience in this field or MBA/MS in related filed with 10 years experience, 7 of which must be managerial and strategic.
Abilities
Hands on with Technology a must and be willing to roll-up the selves and get things done
Build, Learn and Troubleshoot ML models and Big Data solutions hands on with the team
Help with Workshop and C-Level Executive engagements
Ability to actively communicate, inspire and motivate all levels of staff.
Ability to think and act strategically and proactively.
Strong writing and presentation skills.

Title: Java8, Kafka Streams, Machine Learning, AI Developer
Description:

Experience with Stream Analysis and ML with tools such as Spark, Apache Flink, etc
Experience with building instrumented, scalable, highly available, and secure systems
Hiring and retaining top engineers in the Integration team
Experience with one or more public clouds (AWS, GCP, Azure)
5+ years of hands on Java development with 2 years in building data processing applications using Spring Boot
BS in EE or CS

Title: Backend Developer - Content Processing - Virtual Reality
Description:
Job Summary
Tesseract with a singular goal to Democratize Mixed Reality is set to replace the age-old 2D media paradigm to 3D. We are building a platform that would help our consumers to consume digital content in an immersive way using virtual reality.
The VR team at Tesseract will be committed to solving challenging problems in computer vision, artificial intelligence, optics and embedded systems to accelerate innovation in Mixed Reality, and to enable consumers to have truly immersive digital experiences that are entertaining, and help enterprises improve work productivity. The candidates will also be involved in research and development with a multi-disciplinary team of experts in computer vision, 3D interaction paradigms.
Responsibilities and Duties
In this role, the appointed individuals will form part of a team that will build a video content delivery and viewing infrastructure. They will work closely with our product team to build new and compelling experiences for our customers!
Design and develop highly scalable services for video systems and packaging.
Develop and maintain video and image encoding software that plug into media pipeline, designing for quality, robustness and scale.
Participate in work related to next-generation video systems and encoding technologies.
Experience with setting up (micro)services for video coding, processing or packaging.
You will take ownership to run and maintain Cloud infrastructure.
Experience with software performance optimization.

Experience with CI/CD processes (Jenkins, GoCD).
Experience with Docker.
Experience with setting up (micro)services for video coding, processing or packaging.
Experience with software performance optimization.
1+ years of experience developing and debugging system level services in C, C++, Python, or Java, particularly on Linux.
High adaptability in a dynamic start-up environment.
Nice to Have
Knowledge/Involvement in open-source multimedia projects such as FFmpeg, x264, or WebM.
Background in image and signal processing, both algorithm design and implementation (for example, image scaling, deinterlacing, frame rate conversion).
Experience with image and video quality assessment.

Title: GDD( Global Drug Development) India Learning Head
Description:
As the GDU India Learning Head, drive alignment and multifaceted collaboration among global and site GDU organization based on the GDU value proposition.
Work in close collaboration with non-GDU learning partners to drive the learning strategy for GDD India.
Support development of a strong talent pipeline and business growth in GDD India.
Is the strategic partner and member of the Leadership Team for GDD in Hyderabad to manage strategic learning requirements, including where appropriate regulatory compliance aspects.
Enable associates in GDD to execute effectively on the business strategy by identifying and building future capabilities (knowledge, skills and behaviors)

Your responsibilities:
Your responsibilities include, but not limited to:

Capability Building

Lead development of Hyderabad capability building strategy and related learning interventions based on knowledge, skills and behaviors identified as necessary to optimize individual and team performance to ensure business success.
Will also take the lead on selective cross-development global learning projects as a member of the GDU Leadership Team.
Support, adapt, or define the curricula for local roles (starting from global role-based curricula), set priorities and monitor their implementation, working within the aims of Development and in line with Global Development University.
For Hyderabad, lead and drive the implementation of a competency-based learning approach with clear definition of core competencies, key knowledge areas, behavioral indicators, and proficiency levels.
Enable and drive Learning Roadmaps which are in service of GDD and functional strategic imperatives & priorities. Identify enterprise-wide solutions or designing component solutions as part of a Learning Roadmap. Maximize the reuse of global learning content, adapting where essential for meeting Hyderabad needs.
Effectively establish, deepen and sustain key relationships with stakeholders to understand business needs and related performance gaps, define requirements and demonstrate an understanding of processes and methodology in order to provide appropriate learning solutions.
Partner with Hyderabad HR to provide learning and development expertise in support of the development and implementation of HR plans, programs and tools to build and enhance organizational capability, as appropriate. Adopt innovative technologies which offer enhanced user experience & accessibility.
Partners with Head Learning, Strategy and Partnering to ensure alignment across Novartis Development on learning strategies.
Accountable for all learning solutions in GDD India, working in partnership with other partners within GDU.
Build and leverage design and delivery capability both internally (within GDU, HR and business) and externally (building working relationships with third-party vendors in varied areas of expertise)

GDU Hyderabad Team Lead

All GDU Hyderabad team should be appropriately trained, monitored, supported and encouraged in their professional development. Be responsible for the day to day management of all associates of the group.
Ensure successful on-boarding training for new joiners and those changing roles and lead training contents in new graduates and cross functional lecture
Establish high standards of practice and to encourage the sharing of good practice within the group and to / from the global team and improve the productivity and effectiveness of learning.
Work with Hyderabad leadership team to produce yearly group objectives and prepare for annual management review.
Encourage appropriate communication/collaboration between the GDU Hyderabad and other Novartis’ Education/Training functions
Organize and manage budget/cost for GDU activity in Hyderabad as required and ensure the efficient and effective use of all resources. To be responsible for group’s administration.
Utilize and leverage available learning technologies as appropriate e.g. Video, Collaboration, user-generated content
Develop an integrated roadmap to address key capability gaps.

Member of the Global Development University Leadership Team

Play an active role in the GDU Leadership Team and make sure Hyderabad’s learning needs are well represented and met
Together with the GDU leadership team, define the Global Development Learning Strategy to build a more flexible and dynamic learning organization focused on the learners’ and busi-ness needs.

Reporting learning outcomes

Defines and drives the learning analytics strategy for GDU India in collaboration with GDU Global head, including use of predictive analytics and artificial intelligence engines for Global Development University and working with wider Development business (leverage STRIDE DataHub, Nerve, etc)
Implements the reporting strategy working with appropriate internal experts and leading ex-ternal vendors.
Leverages the GDU learning operations team to operationalize into meaningful in-sights/reporting / measurement that can drive actions and behaviors by the GDU Leadership Team.
Collaborates and shares insights and results with the Novartis Learning Council to benefit the wider Novartis learning community.

Key Performance Indicators

Successful roll out and adoption of a competency-based, cross-functional learning approach for Development.
Training needs analysis with a definition of current state, desired state, and proposed learn-ing solution.
Training curricula in place for all major GDD roles
Amount of content curated/adopted/reused from GDU and other parts of Novartis learning
Reporting learning-based outcomes and impact of learning on performance (where measured)
Total number of learning solutions developed/updated/provided
Total number of associates who participated in trainings a year, learner satisfaction, and achieving desired outcomes
Adoption level of learning technology and innovative learning approaches
Learning administration: managing registrations, seat utilization, no-shows, late cancellations, etc.
Managing budget adequately for associate and functional learning needs
Minimum requirements
What you’ll bring to the role:

Impact on the organization:

Responsible for learning for 2,000 people in Hyderabad (number anticipated to increase)
Drive onboarding and upskilling of new roles in Hydera-bad to drive significant business benefit and enable stra-tegic plans of One GDD
Ensuring that GDD associates possess and are capable of demonstrating operational and scientific knowledge, skills and behaviors which are key to individual, team and business success
Driving and leading identification and implementing high quality learning solutions to Global Development organi-zation.
Substantially enhancing impact of learning on business performance and by bringing and deploying latest adult learning methods and techniques to Novartis
Setting standards and driving functional excellence in learning expertise and program implementation in com-pliance with regulatory requirements.
Making Novartis an employer of choice in Hyderabad for its learning and professional development opportunities (attraction), and developing and retaining talent within the GDD organization, and Novartis.

Ideal Background

Education (minimum/desirable):

Master’s Degree/PhD in Life Sciences desirable, alternatively in HR or Organizational Development with strong business acumen.
Degree/certification in Learning & Development is a plus.

Languages:
Minimal: Fluent English (oral and written)
Desirable: Local language (oral and written)

Experience/Professional requirement:

10 years of related experience, minimum of 5 years of leadership and management experience

Preferred: Leadership in areas of learning, talent, HR or comparable areas; experience in applicable technical/ professional areas pertinent to the division/ function served

Why consider Novartis?
750 million. That’s how many lives our products touch. And while we’re proud of that fact, in this world of digital and technological transformation, we must also ask ourselves this: how can we continue to improve and extend even more people’s lives?

We believe the answers are found when curious, courageous and collaborative people like you are brought together in an inspiring environment. Where you’re given opportunities to explore the power of digital and data. Where you’re empowered to risk failure by taking smart risks, and where you’re surrounded by people who share your determination to tackle the world’s toughest medical challenges.

We are Novartis. Join us and help us reimagine medicine.

Title: Java Full Stack Developer / Core Java / HTML / Java Script /...
Description:
Requisition ID: 218729
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.

Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. Title: Git + AWS Cloud Engineer
Description:
Klizo Solutions develops mobile apps, websites, and software. We work in some really cool technology like facial recognition, artificial intelligence, and even blockchain. We have about 25 people in the team, and we are are doubling in size over the next couple months. We are looking for good people to join our rapidly growing company.
As a key member of our team, the AWS Cloud Engineer will work with development teams and other DevOps engineers to solve critical issues while improving customer experience. Other responsibilities include:
Build and support scalable microservices and system orchestration.
Design, development, and testing of features delivered as applications and/or services.
Investigate and contribute to solving issues in production environments.
Provide collaborative conduit between various technical and non-technical teams.
Build effective monitoring, alerts, and metrics for production services.
Build effective DevOps services, processes, and tooling.
Supporting applications and/or services as and when required on a 24x7 basis.
Desired Qualifications
Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science, Management Information Systems, or Mathematics
Minimum of 7 years of software engineering experience
Minimum of 4 years of AWS technology delivery experience
AWS Certified Developer highly desired
AWS Certified SysOps Administrator highly desired
'Make-it-happen' attitude, the innate capacity for ownership and timely delivery of results in a fast-paced environment
Strong knowledge of microservice and SoA architectures.
Experience with AWS cloud platform technologies such as API Gateway, Lambda, RDS, DynamoDB, SQS, SES, S3, Cognito, Cloud Front, Cloud Watch, etc…
Experience with AWS client technologies such as AppSync (GraphQL) and Amplify
Experience with AWS DevOps tooling such as CodeStar and Service Application Model (SAM)
Experience with infrastructure as code tools and methods such as Chef, Puppet, Salt, Cloud Formation, or Ansible
Experience with Identity Access Management (IAM) and Identity Provider (IdP) technologies and solutions (e.g. oAuth, OpenID, JWT, SAML).
Experience with HTTP APIs and RESTful web services
Understanding of web browser APIs and behavior
Excellent technical communication skills
Competent in designing and building web applications and/or web services in a commercial setting
Competent in design/implementation for reliability, availability, scalability and performance
Competent in software engineering tools (e.g. build tools) and best practices (e.g. test automation and continuous integration)
Preferred Qualifications
Experience with automated testing, test-driven development and/or behavior-driven development
Experience building complex software systems that have been successfully delivered to customers
Meticulous attention to detail
Ability to multi-task while ensuring high quality of results
Dedication to high standards of code quality and testing
Passion for building a rich and innovative user experience
Demonstrable track record as an owner: someone who can take a concept and make it real
Experience working in Agile development team
Experience with source control systems especially GIT
Application Performance Monitoring (APM) experience (e.g. Dynatrace, App Dynamics, New Relic)
Ability to monitor and troubleshoot a very large complex system of services
Cognizant of modern database/storage technologies
Experience with automated testing tools (e.g. Selenium, JMeter).
Knowledge of IP networking, VPN's, DNS, load balancing and firewalling
Extra credit: Provide your GitHub account or code samples with your resume!
Nice to Have Experience
Experience and talent for UI/UX design
Experience with building PWA and native customer facing applications
Experience with build CI/CD systems like Jenkins, Travis or TFS
Experience with Docker/Kubernetes and container orchestration
Experience with Unix/Linux environments
Proficiency in a front-end language like Elm, JavaScript, Objective-C or Swift
Proficiency in at least one front-end web development framework such as React, Angular, Rails, Django, Vue.js.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹30,000.00 to ₹40,000.00 /year
Experience:
AWS: 4 years (Required)
Git: 4 years (Required)
Education:
Bachelor's (Required)
Location:
New Town, Kolkata, West Bengal (Required)

Title: Software-Senior Engineer(DEVOPS Product owner)
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Role with us:
To create a brilliant connected future for everybody through the delivery of high quality software solutions.
Successful candidates will be experienced Senior Technology Specialists possessing strong problem solving skills, a self-starter mindset with a proactive attitude towards delivery and leadership capabilities in order to provide technical guidance to other Software Engineers.
Technical Product owner is responsible for laying out vision for implementing DEVOPS i..e CI/CD, Automation Testing, TDD, Monitoring across SaaS and IaaS platforms on AWS and Azure
Key Accountabilities:
Technical Product Owner would be responsible for laying out the vision and blueprints and bring it to reality with a DevSecOps view.
Identify industry best practices and standards for implementation of Cloud.
Guide engineers and developers in following best practices and standards and cross train them on cloud technology.
Complying with all relevant processes and standards, including change management principles and processes to ensure deliverables meet or exceed defined quality standards.
Skill & Experience: 12 + yrs Exp
DEVOPS, CI/CD, Agile, Bamboo, Jenkins, AWS, Azzure, Git, Bitbucket, Docker, Virtualisation, Monitoring, Teraform, Product Management, Agile
Optional Skills: Chef, Ansible, Python, Database, Perl, UNIX
Technical Descriptors
7+ years of experience with AWS Cloud with understanding of AWS platform, service offerings and billing.
AWS CloudFormation templates, AWS EC2, VPC and Subnets, S3, ELB/ALB.
Experience in high level design and architectures of networks, servers, infrastructure and other systems for various models such as IaaS, SaaS, PaaS etc.
Experience with setup and administration of databases in AWS (MongoDB, SQL Server, Couchbase databases etc.)
Working experience in a DevOps environment with the team and other stakeholders.
Understanding of Agile, DevOps
Understanding of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and ability to develop and contribute in an IaC environment.
Exposure to and ability to support automation pipeline (Bamboo, Jenkins, etc.)
Have working knowledge on tools such as Jira/Confluence/BitBucket/Git.
Understanding and hands on experience with VMs and Dockers
Certification(s) in AWS
Why Join us
Our people in India will be at the forefront of technological change as they work collaboratively with, and learn from, world-class experts and have access to the latest training programs and insights for their field.
Alongside your work on leading edge projects, working with us means you'll have access to company perks and benefits that'll reward you for the great work you do. We’re growing, fast, and for you that means many exciting opportunities to develop your career with us at Telstra.
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit tel.st/allrolesflex

Title: Software-Senior Engineer(Big Data Architect)
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Join us on this exciting journey, and together, we’ll reimagine the future.
Role with us
This position offers diversity in projects, an opportunity to work in a team environment with autonomy and a high-level of responsibility. There are also excellent opportunities for professional growth and advancement within Telstra Customer Platforms and broader Telstra systems.
He would be responsible to develop, maintain, test and evaluate big data solutions within organisations and would be also involved in the design of big data solutions
He would builds large-scale data processing systems He would work on how algorithms work and have experience building high-performance algorithms.
The purpose of the role is to take responsibility for ensuring all requests from the business are developed and delivered in the most optimal way taking into consideration business roadmaps, ITS CRM Strategy, industry best practice, vendor roadmaps and thought leadership and innovation delivering a competitive advantage to Telstra
Key Accountabilities
Big Data Data Architect role is to plan, coordinate, and execute all activities related to the requirements interpretation, design and implementation of Big data and Machine Learning applications. This individual will apply proven industry and technology experience as well as communication skills, problem-solving skills, and knowledge of best practices to issues related to design, development, and deployment of mission-critical systems with a focus on quality application development and delivery.
This role is key to the success of the Customer Platforms function at Telstra and will be responsible and accountable for the following:
Ability to design and develop Big Data and Machine/Deep Learning Applications
Ability to review vendor designs and recommended solutions based on industry best practises
Ability to provide technical governance across Big Data and Machine/Deep Learning solutions at Telstra
Design and develop reusable, scalable and secure big data applications
Ensure optimized application performance with respect to throughput, cost and resource utilization
Develop and maintain real time streaming applications
Understanding of building, deploying and maintaining big data applications on cloud
Manage and administer Big data ecosystem
Create development artefacts including design document, release notes and POV
Assess and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the Big Data and Machine/Deep Learning application solutions to ensure user requirements and business objectives are met in a timely and cost effective manner
Understand overall business operations and develops innovative solutions to help improve productivity
Ability to understand and design provisioning solutions at Telstra and how CRM interacts with provisioning layers.
Strong problem solving and analytical skills needed to support enterprise high availability Salesforce applications
Coordinate with technical resource within and outside of B2B Digitisation.
Monitor process of software configuration/development/testing to assure quality deliverable.
Ensure standards of QA are being met
Review deliverables to verify that they meet client and contract expectations; Implement and enforce high standards for quality deliverables
Analyses performance and capacity issues of the highest complexity.
Demonstrate thought Leadership in Big data and Machine Learning.
Assists leadership with development and management of new application capabilities to improve productivity
Provide training and educate other team members around core capabilities and helps them deliver high quality solutions and deliverables/documentation
Self-Motivator to perform Design / Develop user requirements, test and deploy the changes into production
Skill & Experience : 10+ yrs
Experience with Data Modelling Tool like Erwin/MagicDraw, Hadoop Monitoring services, Hadoop Architecture Understanding, Hadoop Installation/ Service Management, Cluster Management, Unix/Python Scripting,
Technical Descriptors
Should be well versed with overall IT landscape, technologies and should be able to analyze how different technologies integrates with each other
Should be able to provided scalable and robust solution architecture depending on the needs
Should be able to compare tools and technologies and recommend a tool or technology
Must have good understanding of Data Structures, Distributed processing framework.
Must have experience of executing couple of big data projects (end to end)
Strong technical expertise and hands on experience on Hive, Flume, HBase & other Hadoop components
Candidate must have strong background & hands on experience of SPARK or JAVA or Data warehouse / ETL/BI or DWH appliances
Ability to work cross functionally to deliver appropriate resolution of technical, procedural, and operational issues.
Deep Knowledge of either Cloudera/ HortonWorks/ MapR/Pivotal
Deep Knowledge of developing Machine Learning & Deep Learning Models
Good knowledge of NoSQL Databases/ HBase/ MongoDB
Good knowledge of AWS Sagemaker, Tensorflow, Google Cloud Analytics
Good experience with at least one programming language like Scala, Java, Python, Pig etc
Proven expertise of delivering end to end projects working with virtual teams bonus
Why Join us
Our people in India will be at the forefront of technological change as they work collaboratively with, and learn from, world-class experts and have access to the latest training programs and insights for their field.
Alongside your work on leading edge projects, working with us means you'll have access to company perks and benefits that'll reward you for the great work you do. We’re growing, fast, and for you that means many exciting opportunities to develop your career with us at Telstra.
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit tel.st/allrolesflex

Title: Software-Senior Engineer(CPQ Architect)
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Join us on this exciting journey, and together, we’ll reimagine the future.
Role with us
CPQ Technical Architect will work with business stakeholders and ITS colleagues in the implementation and support of Cloudsense CPQ at Telstra. This position offers diversity in projects, an opportunity to work in a team environment with autonomy and a high-level of responsibility. There are also excellent opportunities for professional growth and advancement within Telstra Customer Platforms and broader Telstra systems.
CPQ Technical Architect is responsible for leading technical CPQ low level architecture activities for Telstra across requirement analysis, design, development and implementation on Telstra’s key CRM platforms. They will be responsible for developing and coordinating technical delivery aspects of all Telstra’s CRM systems implementations, communicating effectively and fostering strong relationships with business users and stakeholders.
The purpose of the role is to take responsibility for ensuring all requests from the business are developed and delivered in the most optimal way taking into consideration business roadmaps, ITS CRM Strategy, industry best practice, vendor roadmaps and thought leadership and innovation delivering a competitive advantage to Telstra.
He will participate in and/or be responsible for technical analysis of functional designs, preparation of technical designs, technical build & implementation of CRM, CRM configuration and scripting, quality & code reviews, facilitating testing, resolution of defects identified during test, managing relationships between support and development team, mentoring and training
Key Accountabilities
Salesforce Technical Architect role is to plan, coordinate, and execute all activities related to the requirements interpretation, design and implementation of CPQ, CLM applications. This individual will apply proven industry and technology experience as well as communication skills, problem-solving skills, and knowledge of best practices to issues related to design, development, and deployment of mission-critical CRM systems with a focus on quality application development and delivery.
This role is key to the success of the Customer Platforms function at Telstra and will be responsible and accountable for the following:
Ability to design and develop Salesforce CRM, Cloudsense CPQ & Force.com Applications
Ability to review vendor designs and recommended solutions based on industry best practises
Ability to provide technical governance across Cloudsense CPQ solutions at Telstra
Assess and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the Salesforce application solutions to ensure user requirements and business objectives are met in a timely and cost effective manner
Understand overall business operations and develops innovative solutions to help improve productivity
Ability to understand and design provisioning solutions at Telstra and how CRM interacts with provisioning layers.
Strong problem solving and analytical skills needed to support enterprise high availability Salesforce applications
Coordinate with technical resource within and outside of Customer Platforms team.
Monitor process of software configuration/development/testing to assure quality deliverable.
Ensure standards of QA are being met
Review deliverables to verify that they meet client and contract expectations; Implement and enforce high standards for quality deliverables
Analyses performance and capacity issues of the highest complexity with Salesforce application.
Demonstrate thought Leadership in Cloudsense CPQ innovations and practices.
Assists leadership with development and management of new application capabilities to improve productivity
Provide training and educate other team members around core capabilities and helps them deliver high quality solutions and deliverables/documentation
Self-Motivator to perform Design / Develop user requirements, test and deploy the changes into production
Skill & Experience : 12 + yrs
SFDC, APEX, Conga, Appttus, Cloudsense
Technical Descriptors
Salesforce – Service Cloud, Sales Cloud, Force. Com platform
Salesforce Certified Developer / Advanced Developer / Technical Architect is essential
Experience in building applications on force.com platform with extensive hands-on and subject matter expertise in Salesforce technology including
Full cycle implementation experience with SFDC (application design, architecture and development using Salesforce.com)
Strong SFDC knowledge and Integration components for SFDC (SFDC APIs, Apex controllers, Apex Web Services, Apex callout, outbound messaging, SFDC data loaders, etc.)
Command over APEX and Visual force
Hands on experience in building salesforce apex classes, test classes and deployment process.

Working knowledge of web frameworks – HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JSON, Ajax
working knowledge of all Atlassian tools a bonus
Expertise in developing CPQ capability using Cloudsense.
Proven experience of working with Telco Clients to configure products, Baskets, Order Orchestration and Technical Enrichment.
Certifications in Appttus and Conga would be essential.
Expertise in developing Contract management solution integrating into CPQ using Conga or Appttus
Proven experience with creation of relevant documentation including, but not limited to Apttus CPQ solution design document and requirements documentation
Experience with migration of CPQ across environments including experience with the Apttus migration tool

Quoting and Quote Templates
Approvals (Deal Manager/IWA preferred)
X- Author
Fundamental understanding of Apttus CLM capabilities, Apttus CLM 201 certification a plus
Experience with Apttus Advanced Workflow Approvals
Experience with X-Author for Excel and Contracts

Knowledge of Apttus development

Title: Senior Learning Curation Analyst
Description:
Are you looking for a career that matters?
We believe every person deserves a chance for a healthy life, free from illness and full of possibility. We see a world full of healing, with viable care options available to those with limited choices today. We envision new ways of providing physicians, pharmacists and nurses with technologies that not only treat chronic diseases, but also work to prevent them. We’re looking for team members who are motivated to learn, grow and innovate, while making a meaningful difference for millions of people around the world.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=X0h_0ih8MgQ
Summary
The Learning Curator role develops and executes the learning portfolio curation strategy in collaboration with Learning Business Partners (LBPs). This role develops guidelines that help determine the most relevant content for the learners, and will collaborate with the Learning Technology and Integration role to identify the best content-platform fit for curated content.
The Learning Curator will report to the Learning Experience Lead and is part of the Learning Experience team. Success in this role depends on a candidate’s ability to successfully manage and deliver curated content, facilitated by the best in class learning technology, to provide a complete learning experience to learners.
Essential Duties and Responsibilities
Determine strategy for learning portfolio curation, based on input from LBPs
Establish structure, governance, and context to curate content that will be most relevant and valuable to the organization and learner
Drive learner experience via identification, filtering and sharing relevant content across multiple tools & platforms: Ongoing Content Rationalization Process; Content Organization and Tagging; Data Mine Office 360 to identify additional available content (Delve); Social Learner; Artificial Intelligence Effectiveness
Liaise with Learning Technology & Integrations team to introduce systems needed to curate and deliver relevant and learner-centric content
Deliver content in an organized and meaningful manner with the help of defined processes
Involve internal stakeholders and external information in the curation process to offer customized and vetted selection of the most effective and relevant resources
Create a curation mindset where everyone shares and curates information in the organization, and employees feel empowered to seek credible content that is relevant and customized to their needs
Qualifications
Required: Bachelor’s / Undergraduate degree or country equivalent
Preferred: Degree or certification in instructional design, education, training, or related field of study
Required: 3-5 years of experience designing and developing learning solutions (e.g., e-learning, instructor led courses)
Preferred: 2 years of experience in developing learning curriculums for multiple functions
Adult Learning: Theory and Practice: Advanced experience in applying concepts and practices of adult learning to meet the dynamic needs of the business
Business Acumen: Knowledge of business-critical activities and alignment to learning solutions
Decision Making and Critical Thinking: Knowledge of tools and techniques for effective use of a broad range of methods, assumptions, frameworks, and perspectives when solving problems
Planning: Ability to contribute to operational (short term), tactical (1–2 years), and strategic (3-5 years) planning in support of business plans and strategies
L&D Policies, Standards, and Procedures: Knowledge of and ability to use industry and organization standards, procedures, and policies relevant to learning
Learning Needs Analysis: Knowledge of the process of identifying what people need to learn for successful individual and organizational performance
Learning Delivery: Knowledge of methods and alternatives for delivering learning solutions
Knowledge Management: Familiarity with processes and tools for capturing, organizing, and using individual and organizational intellectual assets
Interpersonal Relationships: Demonstrated skill in working with individuals and groups in a constructive and collaborative manner, including the ability to build and maintain critical networks and collaborative relationships
Oral and Written Communications: Ability to express oneself to provide information to others effectively and in a succinct manner
Organization Skills: Ability to manage multiple priorities and to know when to escalate issues for resolution
Time Management: Strong time management skills to prioritize effectively and handle multiple, aggressive deadlines
Portfolio Management: Ability to efficiently and effectively manage a portfolio of learning
Global Mindset: Convey respect for different perspectives, leverage diverse contributions and adapt behaviour to accommodate others

Title: Data Scientist - Machine Learning
Description:
Responsibilities:
Research and bring innovations to develop next generation solutions in core functional areas.
related to NLP, Speech Analysis (including indian languages), Image Processing, Price Estimator, Digital Marketing, Customer Relationship Management (CRM), Campaign Management & Data Insights etc.
Provide technical thought leadership, coaching and mentorship in the field of data science in working with engineering and other cross functional teams.
Evolve the approach for the application of machine learning/deep learning to existing program and project disciplines.
Help establish standards in machine learning and statistical analysis to ensure consistency in quality across projects and teams and identify relevant process efficiencies.


Requirements:
Graduation/Post Graduation degree in Computer Science/ Mathematics/Statistics (IITs, IIITs and NITs preferred).
2-8 years of strong hands on experience in Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning (ML), NLP, Deep Learning, Image Processing and Neural Networks.
Experience with ML frameworks including scikit-learn, NLTK, NumPy, Pandas, Keras, TensorFlow, Theano and other Cognitive Tools.
Coding skills in Java, Python, Ruby, Scala, R etc to take the idea from thought to production.
Proficiency with various approaches in regression, classification, and cluster analysis.
Experience with large data sets and distributed computing (Hive/Hadoop/Spark) a plus.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Responsibilities:
Solve complex business problems of global organizations by applying AI and Machine Learning techniques in combination with NLP and computer vision.
Design new machine learning models for the organization's product suite.
Implement machine learning models and fine-tune them for different use cases.
Systemic study of the latest research and industry developments in Artificial Intelligence. Leverage these developments to solve real-world business problems.
Automate manual processes, optimize data-delivery and build the infrastructure required for optimal extraction, transformation, and loading of data required for a wide variety of use-cases using SQL/ETL.
Design competitive AI/ML services and user experience for next-generation devices and create prototypes for demonstration.
Build real-time and batch analytics platform for analytics & machine-learning.
Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve ML models/infrastructure and software that uses these models.
Create algorithms to extract information from a large data set to perform statistical analysis and analyze the same to create predictive models.


Requirements:
Hands On experience of existing AI/ML platforms.
Experience in complete modeling process (Problem statement definition, Data exploration & pre-processing, Feature Engineering, Model Building, Testing & Validation).
Practical experience using ML methods for classification, clustering and estimation, such as Decision Trees, Random Forests, Extreme Gradient Boosting, Ridge Regression, PCA and SVM.
Practical experience in deep learning and optimizing neural networks.
Expert in SQL .Understands Data very well and has extensive Data Modeling experience.
Familiarity with database (SQL, Oracle, Stored Procedures, MongoDB) and can work with relational as well as non-relational databases.
Expert in Object-oriented programming concepts and principles.
Strong analytical skills and passion for building world-class user experiences, combined with a vision to think big.
Should be an expert in handling various data types and structures: structured, unstructured, voice, image and video data, static versus streaming data.
Prior experience in integrating data, profiling, validating and cleansing data in Big Data platforms will be a plus.
Strong background with advanced mathematical concepts related to Probabilistic Models, Linear Algebra, Calculus, and Optimization will be a plus.
Good technical writing, reporting & communication skills.
An autonomous team player- Curious, Proactive and Communicative.

Title: Hiring for Artificial Intelligence
Description:
Job Summary
We are looking for an expert Artificial Intelligence with the following skills:
a) Programming experience in TensorFlow / Deep Learning for below context
1. NLP / Text processing / NLP libraries like NLTK, Spacy
2. Image processing
3. Video processing

B.Tech/B.E. - Any Specialization, Computers, B.Sc - Any Specialization, BCA - Computers
PG: M.Tech - Any Specialization, Computers, MCA - Computers
Benefits
As per company policy.

work: 1 year (Preferred)

Title: Machine Learning Specialist
Description:
Job Description



The AI R&D team is part of Data Sc. R&D. The AI R&D team is created to carry on world class R&D in AI, machine vision, NLP, knowledge graphs etc.. Apart from R&D, this team will devote half of their efforts to develop AI based products for Shell.

The machine learning specialist is be responsible for R&D and product development around AI. Machine learning specialist will report the Team Lead - Artificial Intelligence.

Research & Development
drive specific R&D activities and contribute to the overall AI R&D program.
Quickly develop proof of concepts to validate new methods
Remain up to date on different R&D activities in AI around the world.
Manage one external relation
Product Development
Support as core AI specialist in more than one project
Pick up responsibility of end-to-end delivery of at least one project
Play the key role in identifying the tool stack for development
Requirements
PhD or masters in a quantitative subject like mathematics, statistics, computer science or other quantitative subjects.
Strong foundation in maths, stats, computer science, probability theory and other fundamental knowledge required for machine learning and AI
Solid understanding of at least on the topics like deep learning, machine visions, NLP, knowledge graphs etc.
Programming skills: python (must), MATLAB, R
Understanding of cloud environment (AWS or Azure), containerization
Company Description
Shell began operations in India more than 80 years ago. At Shell India, we invest in our people through our industry-leading development programme, which sees our employees thrive and gain access to experts on a local and global level. To date, we have invested more than US$ 1 billion already in India’s energy sector alone in socially and environmentally responsible ways. It is the only global major to have a fuel retail license in India. The Shell Technology Centre Bangalore, STCB, is one of the three global hubs for technology in the Projects & Technology business of Royal Dutch Shell. In addition, we supply crude, chemicals and technology to public and private sector oil companies, and our Chennai Business Centre provides a wide range of finance, accounting and business services to Shell globally.
Disclaimer
Please note: We occasionally amend or withdraw Shell jobs and reserve the right to do so at any time, including prior to the advertised closing date.

Before applying, you are advised to read our data protection policy. This policy describes the processing that may be associated with your personal data and informs you that your personal data may be transferred to Royal Dutch/Shell Group companies around the world.

The Shell Group and its approved recruitment consultants will never ask you for a fee to process or consider your application for a career with Shell. Anyone who demands such a fee is not an authorised Shell representative and you are strongly advised to refuse any such demand.

Shell is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

Full Time
Skillpool
R&D FS - Math Comp & Data Science
Work Location
Bangalore - Shell Technology India
No. of Positions
1
Job Expires
26-Jul-2019

Title: MACHINE LEARNING ENGINEER
Description:
Duties and Responsibilities
Looking for passionate individuals with strong machine learning background.
Hands-on expertise in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Neural Networks, Applied Mathematics and Computer Vision.
Develop and design algorithms and frameworks in terms of API to leverage the data.
Work closely with technical leads and Product Managers to meet deliverables and contribute to data-driven the development of cutting-edge technologies.
Good Knowledge on the database can be an added advantage.
Exposure to IoT, Human-Robot/Human-Computer interaction, big data interpretation/crunching to unleash the power of data, generate predictions which can help automated solutions for improved user experiences.

Title: Head of Engineering and ML/AI
Description:
We are looking for applicants who have a demonstrated research background in machine learning, a passion for independent research and technical problem-solving, and a proven ability to develop and implement ideas from research. The candidate will collaborate with researchers and engineers of multiple disciplines within Ideapoke, in particular with researchers in data collection and development teams to develop advanced data analytics solutions. Work with massive amounts of data collected from various sources.
Responsibilities
Mine massive amounts of data from various sources to gain insights and identify patterns using machine learning techniques and complex network analysis methods.
Design and implement ML algorithms and models through in-depth research and experiment with neural network models, parameter optimization, and optimization algorithms.
Work to accelerate the distributed implementation of existing algorithms and models.
Conduct research to advance the state of the art in deep learning and provide technical solutions at scale for real world challenges in various scenarios.
Establish scalable, efficient, automated processes for model development, model validation, model implementation and large scale data analysis.
Ability to process large amounts of data in a distributed cloud environment.
Strong knowledge/experience of data extraction and data processing.
Optimizing pre-existing algorithms for accuracy and speed.
Flexible approach and ability to develop on new skills.
Self-starter and able to manage multiple research projects.
Team player and a good communicator
*
Ph.D. or Master’s degree from an accredited college/university in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, or related fields (strong mathematical/statistics background with the ability to understand algorithms and methods from a mathematical and intuitive viewpoint)
8 to 10 years of academic or professional experience in Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence and Data Analytics, Natural Language Processing/Text mining or related field.
Technical ability and hands on expertise in Python, Java, R, XML parsing, NoSQL and SQL
*ABOUT IDEAPOKE
*Emerging Technologies | Bengaluru, India
Ideapoke is a global, fast growing start-up with offices in Bengaluru, Bay Area, Tokyo and Shanghai. Our software, search and insights power the innovation agenda of the largest Fortune 500 and Global 2000 companies worldwide.
Our growth is powered by our people and their unwavering commitment to the company-wide vision, strong work ethic and an entrepreneurial do-it-all spirit. We push the boundaries and break existing thought processes with the strong belief that innovation amplifies success in every piece of work we do and by extension, amplifying the success of our clients.
Job Type: Full-time
Experience:
work: 8 years (Preferred)
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)
Location:
Bengaluru, Karnataka (Preferred)

Title: Java Full Stack Developer / Core Java / HTML / Java Script /...
Description:
Requisition ID: 218026
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.
#SAPSFSF

WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team (Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com, APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com, EMEA: Careers@sap.com).
Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.
Additional Locations:

Title: Software-Senior Engineer(Data warehousing/ Reporting Archite...
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Join us on this exciting journey, and together, we’ll reimagine the future.
Role with us
This position offers diversity in projects, an opportunity to work in a team environment with autonomy and a high-level of responsibility. There are also excellent opportunities for professional growth and advancement within Telstra Customer Platforms and broader Telstra systems.
He would be responsible to develop, maintain, test and evaluate data warehousing and Reporting Solutions within organisation.
He would builds large-scale data processing systems He would work on how algorithms work and have experience building high-performance algorithms.
The purpose of the role is to take responsibility for ensuring all requests from the business are developed and delivered in the most optimal way taking into consideration business roadmaps, ITS CRM Strategy, industry best practice, vendor roadmaps and thought leadership and innovation delivering a competitive advantage to Telstra
Key Accountabilities
Data Architect role is to plan, coordinate, and execute all activities related to the requirements interpretation, design and implementation of Data Modelling, Data Marts and Reporting, Operational Feeds, Migration. This individual will apply proven industry and technology experience as well as communication skills, problem-solving skills, and knowledge of best practices to issues related to design, development, and deployment of mission-critical systems with a focus on quality application development and delivery.
This role is key to the success of the Strategy To performance function at Telstra and will be responsible and accountable for the following:
Ability to design and develop Data Warehousing and Reporting capabilities.
Ability to review vendor designs and recommended solutions based on industry best practises
Ability to provide technical governance across Data Warehousing and Reporting capabilities. solutions at Telstra
Assess and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the Data Warehousing and Reporting capabilities.application solutions to ensure user requirements and business objectives are met in a timely and cost effective manner
Understand overall business operations and develops innovative solutions to help improve productivity
Ability to understand and design provisioning solutions at Telstra and how CRM interacts with provisioning layers.
Strong problem solving and analytical skills needed to support enterprise high availability Warehousing applications
Coordinate with technical resource within and outside of B2B Digitisation.
Monitor process of software configuration/development/testing to assure quality deliverable.
Ensure standards of QA are being met
Review deliverables to verify that they meet client and contract expectations; Implement and enforce high standards for quality deliverables
Analyses performance and capacity issues of the highest complexity.
Demonstrate thought Leadership in Data Warehousing and Reporting capabilities..
Assists leadership with development and management of new application capabilities to improve productivity
Provide training and educate other team members around core capabilities and helps them deliver high quality solutions and deliverables/documentation
Self-Motivator to perform Design / Develop user requirements, test and deploy the changes into production
Skill & Experience : 12 + yrs
Experience with Data Modelling Tool like Erwin/MagicDraw, Data Warehouses like
Teradata, Snowflake,SQL DW, Reporting Tools like Tableau, Power Bi, QlickView,
ETL Tools like Informatica, Talend, dataStage
Technical Descriptors
Should be well versed with overall IT landscape, technologies and should be able to analyze how different technologies integrates with each other
Should be able to provided scalable and robust solution architecture depending on the needs
Should be able to compare tools and technologies and recommend a tool or technology
Must have good understanding of Data Structures, Distributed processing framework.
Must have experience of executing couple of big data projects (end to end)
Strong technical expertise and hands on experience on Data Modelling, Warehousing using SQL DW, Snowlfake, Redshift
ETL experience using Talend or Informatica
Expertise on Reporting Tools like Tableau,
Experience on Telco data modelling and reporting related to Marketing, CRM, Products, Provisioning.
Ability to work cross functionally to deliver appropriate resolution of technical, procedural, and operational issues.
Proven expertise of delivering end to end projects working with virtual teams bonus
Why Join us
Our people in India will be at the forefront of technological change as they work collaboratively with, and learn from, world-class experts and have access to the latest training programs and insights for their field.
Alongside your work on leading edge projects, working with us means you'll have access to company perks and benefits that'll reward you for the great work you do. We’re growing, fast, and for you that means many exciting opportunities to develop your career with us at Telstra.
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit tel.st/allrolesflex
