Ability to design and develop Big Data and Machine/Deep Learning Applications
Ability to review vendor designs and recommended solutions based on industry best practises
Ability to provide technical governance across Big Data and Machine/Deep Learning solutions at Telstra
Design and develop reusable, scalable and secure big data applications
Ensure optimized application performance with respect to throughput, cost and resource utilization
Develop and maintain real time streaming applications
Understanding of building, deploying and maintaining big data applications on cloud
Manage and administer Big data ecosystem
Create development artefacts including design document, release notes and POV
Assess and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the Big Data and Machine/Deep Learning application solutions to ensure user requirements and business objectives are met in a timely and cost effective manner
Understand overall business operations and develops innovative solutions to help improve productivity
Ability to understand and design provisioning solutions at Telstra and how CRM interacts with provisioning layers.
Strong problem solving and analytical skills needed to support enterprise high availability
Coordinate with technical resource within and outside of B2B Digitisation.
Monitor process of software configuration/development/testing to assure quality deliverable.
Ensure standards of QA are being met
Review deliverables to verify that they meet client and contract expectations; Implement and enforce high standards for quality deliverables
Analyses performance and capacity issues of the highest complexity.
Demonstrate thought Leadership in Big data and Machine Learning.
Assists leadership with development and management of new application capabilities to improve productivity
Provide training and educate other team members around core capabilities and helps them deliver high quality solutions and deliverables/documentation
Self-Motivator to perform Design / Develop user requirements, test and deploy the changes into production
Skill & Experience: 12+ yrs
Hadoop, Map Reduce, Hive, Hbase and Spark Sqoop, Storm, Kafka,
Python, Lamda Architecutre, Hadoop Consumption, Agile, Delivery,
Atleast 2 end to end project migration experience, Experience of leading 20+ resources
Technical Descriptors
Should be well versed with overall IT landscape, technologies and should be able to analyze how different technologies integrates with each other
Should be able to provided scalable and robust solution architecture depending on the needs
Should be able to compare tools and technologies and recommend a tool or technology
Must have good understanding of Data Structures, Distributed processing framework.
Must have experience of executing couple of big data projects (end to end)
Strong technical expertise and hands on experience on Hive, Flume, HBase & other Hadoop components
Candidate must have strong background & hands on experience of SPARK or JAVA or Data warehouse / ETL/BI or DWH appliances
Ability to work cross functionally to deliver appropriate resolution of technical, procedural, and operational issues.
Deep Knowledge of either Cloudera/ HortonWorks/ MapR/Pivotal
Deep Knowledge of developing Machine Learning & Deep Learning Models
Good knowledge of NoSQL Databases/ HBase/ MongoDB
Good knowledge of AWS Sagemaker, Tensorflow, Google Cloud Analytics
Good experience with at least one programming language like Scala, Java, Python, Pig etc

Title: Java Full Stack Developer / Core Java / HTML / Java Script /...
Description:

Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%

COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.
#SAPSFSF

Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.

Title: Backend Developer - Content Delivery
Description:
Job Summary
Tesseract with a singular goal to Democratize Mixed Reality is set to replace the age-old 2D media paradigm to 3D. We are building a platform that would help our consumers to consume digital content in an immersive way using virtual reality.
The VR team at Tesseract will be committed to solving challenging problems in computer vision, artificial intelligence, optics and embedded systems to accelerate innovation in Mixed Reality, and to enable consumers to have truly immersive digital experiences that are entertaining, and help enterprises improve work productivity. The candidates will also be involved in research and development with a multi-disciplinary team of experts in computer vision, 3D interaction paradigms.
Responsibilities and Duties
In this role, the appointed individuals will form part of a team that will build a video content delivery and viewing infrastructure. They will work closely with our product team to build new and compelling experiences for our customers!
Develop video delivery stacks to run on varied devices and servers.
Collaborate with Network Engineering team to design and build our next generation edge network.
Analyze and improve efficiency, scalability, and stability of network infrastructure.
You will build robust secure and scalable microservices.
You will be responsible to implement RESTful services with a metric-driven API Gateway.
You will ensure sub-second server response and will be responsible to implement relational, document, key, object or graph data-stores, index stores and messaging stores as needed.
You will take ownership to run and maintain Cloud infrastructure.
You will continuously evaluate relevant technologies, influence and drive architecture and design discussions.
Required Experience, Skills and Qualifications
What to Bring
B.Tech/B.E. in Computer Science from a reputed college or related technical discipline with 2-5 years of experience in software development.
1+ years of experience with one or more of: filesystems, concurrency, multithreading, server architectures, distributed systems.
Experience with micro web frameworks – like Node.js, reactive programming.
Exposure in building RESTful APIs with monitoring, fault tolerance and metrics.
Experience with MySQL, NoSql (MongoDB, Redis)
Hands-on with AJAX and Javascript.
High adaptability in a dynamic start-up environment.
Nice to Have
Experience with video systems and/or streaming specifications, such as Dynamic Adaptive Streaming over HTTP (MPEG-DASH), or Common Media Application Format (CMAF).
Understanding of video compression and processing, including coding standards such as H.264/AVC, HEVC, VP9 and AV1.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹1,000,000.00 to ₹1,800,000.00 /year
Experience:
Programming: 1 year (Required)
work: 1 year (Preferred)
Education:
Bachelor's (Required)

Title: Cloud CAAS Engineer
Description:
Who We Are

We are part of the Cisco’s Collaboration Technology Group (CTG), the #1 global leader in Collaboration Technologies, which provides best-in-class integrated solutions that redefine the collaboration experience.
Our Customer Care Business Unit is an industry leader in the market in developing and delivering intelligent customer and employee experiences at cloud speed and scale.

We are on a mission and hungry to hire A+ Engineers who could -
o Articulate the next generation of Customer Care SaaS Solutions that will fundamentally change the way companies engage with their customers and will transform this multi-billion-dollar industry.
o Envision, influence and implement the future of customer care with us.

Who You Are

You are an extremely passionate coder with a deep flair for quality.
You write clean reusable code that’s easier to read, test and maintain.
You have been the lead on some modules.
You are a persistent problem solver.
‘Customers’ is your Top Priority.
You may not have solution to everything off hand but you know how to navigate a quickest path to get a solution to your problem.
You get things done and never give up. You are self-driven and biased towards execution and delivery – taking on what needs to be done and owning it through to the end and beyond. You lead by example with your tenacity and extreme ownership ethic.
You possess a highly infectious energy, commitment and rigor.
You are fearless and challenge status-quo regardless of hierarchy.
You love to hack and innovate.

What You will be Doing

As part of our rapidly growing team, You'll work on leading cloud technologies and platforms spanning Cloud, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, Analytics, Integration, Connectivity, Messaging and more.
You will operate in an high performing environment with the latest in cloud development technologies and practices, including continuous delivery, continuous integration, test-driven development and PaaS based development.
Being an integral part of our Engineering team, you will work with –
With Engineering Teams
o You will build customer care solutions that provide rich experiences, connectivity, and automation
o You will write code, deliver high quality, high value software and focus on continuous value delivery.
o You will review the code of other Engineers.
o You will ensure 360 evaluation of code including Static Analysis, Code Complexity, Junits, automation using state-of-art development tools and technologies.

With Architects/Leads
o You will work with Architect and Leads to ensure your design has conformance in all aspects and fits into the overall solution.
o You may be a Subject Matter Expert and help the architect/lead in solution design for your components considering all ilities – serviceability, scalabilty etc.
Customer Success Team
o You will work closely with Customer Solutions Assurance and Technical Assistance Teams to address customer issues with Top priority.

How will you Succeed
o By writing a high quality wow inducing code using the right tools and techniques.
o Through continuous value delivery
o By addressing customer issues with top priority
o Through your passion, hardwork, continuous focus and acceleration to get your work done with quality.
o By keeping your innovative spirits very high and hack.
o By participating in different coding competitions and hackathons.

Join our Force if you have –
6+ years of software engineering experience with recent work on Full Stack development
Experienced at developing highly available and reliable cloud based applications using Java/Scala
Have successfully implemented APIs and user interfaces using Node.js, REST, Java, JavaScript, and React
Experience with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery
Experience with instrumenting code for cloud deployments
Experienced with persistent areas such as: Cassandra, Elasticsearch, and/or Redis
Experienced developing services on AWS, OpenStack, Cloud Foundry, Heroku, or similar
Experience with Mac

Title: Senior Analyst - Innovation Product Team- SITnT - Mumbai
Description:
SCAM ALERT: Caution against fraudulent job offers!
More Info

×

SCAM ALERT
Caution against fraudulent job offers!

We have been informed of instances where jobseekers are led to believe of fictitious job opportunities with Deloitte India (“Deloitte”). In one or more such cases, false promises of actual or potential selection, or initiation or completion of the recruitment formalities appear to have been or are being made. Some jobseekers appear to have been asked to pay money to specified bank accounts of individuals or entities as a condition of their selection for a ‘job’ with Deloitte. These individuals or entities are in no way connected with Deloitte and do not represent or otherwise act on behalf of Deloitte.


At Deloitte, ethics and integrity are fundamental and not negotiable.
We are against corruption and neither offer bribes nor accept them, nor induce or permit any other party to make or receive bribes on our behalf.
We have not authorised any party or person to collect any money from jobseekers in any form whatsoever for promises of getting jobs in Deloitte.
We consider candidates only on merit and that we provide an equal opportunity to eligible applicants.
No one other than an authorised official of Deloitte is permitted to confirm any job offer from Deloitte.
Anyone who at any time has made or makes any payment to any party against promises of job or selection for a job with Deloitte or any matter related to this (including those for ‘registration’, ‘verification’ or ‘security deposit’) or otherwise engages with any such person who has made or makes fraudulent promises or offers, does so (or has done so) entirely at their own risk. Deloitte takes no responsibility or liability for any such unauthorised or fraudulent actions or engagements.
We encourage jobseekers to exercise caution. If you have queries about the veracity of a job offer you have received which relates to Deloitte or would like to report a fraud with regard to job offers with Deloitte, please send an email to inhiringalert@deloitte.com

Deloitte US Innovation – Senior Analyst – US Innovation, Product Team

If you are fascinated about how digital technology is transforming business, plan your next career move with Deloitte’s US Innovation team. Deloitte’s breadth, depth, and scale, combined with our relentless passion for innovation create powerful opportunities to help our clients and our own organization stay ahead of change, deliver impact that matters, and transform complexity and disruption into lasting value.

Our Innovation team is already leveraging Artificial Intelligence, analytics and leading-edge automation capabilities to transform how we serve clients and operate our business. Moreover, the team is also actively exploring nascent applications such as IoT, Blockchain and AR/VR.

Work you’ll do

As an US Innovation Senior Analyst, you will be responsible for developing new digital products across Deloitte’s four businesses – Audit, Advisory, Consulting, Tax.

Your primary responsibilities include:
Participate in Process Assessment and Ideation workshop to align client requirements seeking fitment to existing Products and PlatformsParticipate in the development of new digital products which focus on the way in which services are delivered to clientsDeliver presentations and product demonstrations that requires in-depth knowledge on existing product portfolio and specific functional domainsContribute towards design, conceptualization and storyboarding for PowerPoint deck as per Product Strategy and use caseLiaise with stakeholders about product requirements and ideas to further innovate existing capabilities Design product development plans and develop commercial feasibility analysis for new productsDevelop functional architecture design, technical design requirements and user interface requirementsManage product testing in collaboration with the solution architect and technology development teamExecute and lead multiple project work streams, including opportunity identification, ideation, stakeholder communication, technology vendor management and deliveryDevelop and maintain a diverse set of business relationships during project engagementsCarry out Research as required for Use case or Technical/ Functional domain to understand current market offeringsEvaluate new technologies in the areas of process automation and artificial intelligence Develop high degree of trust with key internal client base

The team

The US Innovation product team focuses on incubating and developing emerging technology products to improve client service delivery for the firm and enabling a ‘Digital’ Deloitte. These emerging technologies include but are not limited to - Robotic Process Automation, Chatbots, Natural Language Processing, Natural Language Generation, Data Wrangling, Cognitive Technologies, Machine Learning and Blockchain. The team assesses opportunities, evaluates appropriate vendors, develops prototypes and delivers products to the business.

Qualifications

3 – 6 years of professional experience in Digital product development / management.Any Graduation Degree (Engineering/Commerce preferred)Professional qualification (reputed institutes preferred): Master's degree in Computer Science/ Information Technology/ Computer Engineering or related field OR, MBAKnowledge or certification in artificial intelligence, automation, semantic analytics, visualization technologies is a plus
Work Location: Mumbai
Work Timings: 11am to 8pm
Skills required
Ideal candidate is someone who has 3-6 years of coding/programming/developer experience and now wants to explore product managementCandidate can be currently working as techno functional consultant or closely aligned with Pre-sales and Solution architecture teamsAbility to manage clients, complex projects, drive business requirement gathering, manage scope and client expectations.Prior experience in R and Python will be an added advantageShould have experience in developing digital solutions to meet business challengesEvaluate and advise on new technologies, vendors and productDriving product design and development with technology vendors to create innovative solutions that create competitive advantagesCollaborating with development and release management team, software developers and quality assurance team to facilitate product deployment and end user training, including strategy to production and rollout to usersShould be able to create matrices to compare available technology vendors and technology productSelf-accountable for ensuring that results are achieved; demonstrate a strong orientation towards achievement; deliver work in a timely matter with minimal errors and guidanceShould have the ability to create product vision and product roadmap presentationsShould be a problem solver that can link business requirements to end design digital application or solutionExcellent verbal and written communication skills in EnglishStrong interpersonal and team building skills; ability to foster a cohesive and effective work environmentSuperior project management and time management skills. Able to manage autonomously, as well as prioritize as necessaryHighly proficient with PowerPoint, Excel, and collaboration toolsHigh degree of self-confidence, poise, maturity, discretion, diplomacy and empathyAbility to work well under pressure and act in utmost confidentiality with sensitive informationAbility to work independently, manage small engagements or parts of large engagementsStrong problem solving and troubleshooting skills with the ability to exercise mature judgement

How you’ll grow
At Deloitte, we’ve invested a great deal to create a rich environment in which our professionals can grow. We want all our people to develop in their own way, playing to their own strengths as they hone their leadership skills. And, as a part of our efforts, we provide our professionals with a variety of learning and networking opportunities—including exposure to leaders, sponsors, coaches, and challenging assignments—to help accelerate their careers along the way. No two people learn in the same way. So, we provide a range of resources including live classrooms, team-based learning, and eLearning. DU: The Leadership Center in India, our state-of-the-art, world-class learning Center in the Hyderabad offices is an extension of the Deloitte University (DU) in Westlake, Texas, and represents a tangible symbol of our commitment to our people’s growth and development. Explore DU: The Leadership Center in India

Benefits
At Deloitte, we know that great people make a great organization. We value our people and offer employees a broad range of benefits. Learn more about what working at Deloitte can mean for you.

Deloitte’s culture
Our positive and supportive culture encourages our people to do their best work every day. We celebrate individuals by recognizing their uniqueness and offering them the flexibility to make daily choices that can help them to be healthy, centered, confident, and aware. We offer well-being programs and are continuously looking for new ways to maintain a culture that is inclusive, invites authenticity, leverages our diversity, and where our people excel and lead healthy, happy lives. Learn more about Life at Deloitte.

Corporate citizenship
Deloitte is led by a purpose: to make an impact that matters. This purpose defines who we are and extends to relationships with our clients, our people and our communities. We believe that business has the power to inspire and transform. We focus on education, giving, skill-based volunteerism, and leadership to help drive positive social impact in our communities. Learn more about Deloitte’s impact on the world.

About Deloitte
Deloitte refers to one or more of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited, a UK private company limited by guarantee (“DTTL”), its network of member firms, and their related entities. DTTL and each of its member firms are legally separate and independent entities. DTTL (also referred to as “Deloitte Global”) does not provide services to clients. In the United States, Deloitte refers to one or more of the US member firms of DTTL, their related entities that operate using the “Deloitte” name in the United States and their respective affiliates. Certain services may not be available to attest clients under the rules and regulations of public accounting. Please see www.deloitte.com/about to learn more about our global network of member firms.

Copyright © 2018 Deloitte Development LLC. All rights reserved.
“Deloitte” is the brand under which tens of thousands of dedicated professionals in independent firms throughout the world collaborate to provide audit, consulting, financial advisory, risk management and tax services to selected clients. These firms are members of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited DTTL, a UK private company limited by guarantee. Each member firm provides services in a particular geographic area and is subject to the laws and professional regulations of the particular country or countries in which it operates. DTTL does not itself provide services to clients. DTTL and each DTTL member firm are separate and distinct legal entities, which cannot obligate each other. DTTL and each DTTL member firm are liable only for their own acts or omissions and not those of each other. Each DTTL member firm is structured differently in accordance with national laws, regulations, customary practice, and other factors, and may secure the provision of professional services in its territory through subsidiaries, affiliates and/or other entities.

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
Responsibilities:
Responsible for researching, designing and implementing software systems to improve personalization.
Enable the development of high resolution content, dynamic assessment and deeper integration of the flagship product into student's daily life.
Operate at the intersection of diverse disciplines - large data systems, ML and AI, offline and online content, analytics etc.


Requirements:
Ability to write efficient and eloquent code in Python (preferred), C/C++ or Golang.
Ability to write complex, efficient, and eloquent SQL queries to extract data from large scale systems.

Title: Senior Software Developer
Description:
Are you a passionate Techie ninja with 5 - 7 yrs of experience, who thinks, “I don’t want to just keep pushing paper or doing dumb work and want to create products that change people’s lives”. Someone who has the passion to create and not just the mentality to maintain existing systems. An Entrepreneurial spirit with a startup mentality, who will take pride in what he/she will help create. A believer and not a skeptic with an ability to wear multiple hats required in astartup.
Company Profile:
At AIndra Systems, an exciting early stage Start-Up based out of Bangalore, our Vision is to build world class systems to aid diagnosis of fatal diseases like cancer with the use of Artificial Intelligence. Our Mission is to use Computer Vision as the vehicle. We take immense pride in the fact that we are amongst the very few deep technology startups in India. We are working on using deep-tech like Optics, Mechatronics and AI in Healthcare. We have been featured by Forbes, Economic Times, Your story etc. We have been supported by multiple national as well as international agencies. We have multiple patent pending products which are under National Phase applications stage in multiple countries.
As a Senior Software Developer, you will be responsible for leading the implementation of the product architecture. We want you if you can:
A person with a great aptitude matched with an amazing attitude and work ethic
Someone who is unfazed by the speed of development and implementation.
Someone who loves new challenges and working on new requirements.
Capable of implementing scalable and high-performance systems.
Want to be involved in product development from an early stage of product conceptualization.
Capable of implementing solutions to be hosted on the Cloud.
Cloud computing knowledge and experience with deploying applications on any of the well known IAAS/PAAS providers.
Capable of providing reliable solutions to a variety of problems using sound problem-solving techniques
Capable of performing technical root cause analysis and outlining corrective action for problems using debuggers, log files etc.
A quick learner willing to work on new programming languages depending on requirement
The ability to communicate technical information clearly and succinctly to both technical and non-technical teams
Highly Desirable:
BS/BTech/MS/MTech (or equivalent degrees) in Computer Science or related technical disciplines
Required Technical and Professional Expertise :
Strong expertise in Python, Java, JEE, JSP, Servlets, JDBC, XML, Spring Framework, Hibernate, MVC, SQL, REST APIs, JAX-RS, Web Services & design patterns
Hands-on experience in Mysql or Postgres with excellent understanding of SQL queries, stored procedure, DB Design etc
Hands-on experience in Tomcat and JBoss
Hands-on experience in Linux/Ubuntu platform
Should have experience in using tools such as Eclipse/IntelliJ/NetBean, ANT/Maven, Jenkin/ Cruisecontrol, JUnit etc
Hands-on experience of using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Strong knowledge or working experience with REST APIs, frameworks and components
Experience of working in any of the JavaScript frameworks Backbone.js/ Angular.js/ ember.js/ node.js is a big plus.
Knowledge/Experience of any NoSQL database (MongoDB, CouchDB, Cassandra etc)
Job Perks
Performance based Stock options
Access to top academic research profs from a few IITs
Beer punch with the team at every second Friday's of the month
Company sponsored passes to technical & entrepreneurship events and meet ups.
Please send your Details & your Resume to contactus@aindra.in

Title: Full Stack Development Internship
Description:
About the company:
Eduwaive Foundation is an AI and data science company with the focus on using ML, Data Science, Artificial Intelligence, Cloud computing, Blockchain, IoT and other related technologies for socially good sectors such as education, agriculture, healthcare, smart city and hence, contribute to UNDP sustainable development goals. Eduwaive Foundation is a not-for-profit company in higher education space with the mission to channelize the youth especially in tier 2-3 colleges and universities towards research, jobs and entrepreneurship opportunities in artificial intelligence for social good sectors by upskilling with an integrated STEM and humanities education. We aim at making higher education accessible, inclusive and affordable which will enable our youth towards the opportunities of the fourth industrial revolution and help them to solve socio-economic problems of the society.
About the internship/job:
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 1. Work with cross-functional partners to understand business requirements to build solutions, driving development efforts across the backend, middle-tier, and frontend 2. Operate independently with minimal supervision and with keen attention to detail 3. Develop internal web applications in Angular, Node.JS, Java, Python, etc. 4. Maintain highest levels of development practices including technical design, solution development, systems configuration, documentation, test, issue identification and resolution and writing clean modular and self-sustaining code
Who can apply:
Only those students or freshers can apply who:
are available for full time (in-office) internship
have relevant skills and interests
can start the internship between 14th Jun'19 and 19th Jul'19
are available for duration of 6 months
have already graduated or are currently in any year of study
are from Chandigarh, Mohali and neighboring cities
Females willing to start/restart their career may also apply
Number of internships/jobs available: 12
Categories: Full Stack Development,Web Development,Computer Science,Engineering

Title: Data Scientist 3
Description:
We are looking for people who will play a critical role as a part of the core team in building this technology platform. They will have work with a team of smart employees for an end to end experience when customers come to NeoGrowth. This team will build a platform that crunches thousands of data points in a matter of seconds, scales from thousands of merchants today to millions of customers by acquiring merchants using basic contact details, underwriting in nanoseconds and funding in seconds.


In NeoGrowth we provide the employees an open minded, collaborative culture of enthusiastic technologists and an opportunity to experiment, learn and self-development. The words like big data, analytics, and machine learning have to be close to your heart.


Requirements:
You should be a B Tech, M Tech, or PhD in Computer Science or related technical discipline (or equivalent).
Have worked in startup like environment with high levels of ownership and commitment for at least 5-7 years.
Have excellent coding skills - should be able to convert design into code fluently.
Know how to architect human and ML systems using active or online learning.
Strong Experience using machine learning and artificial intelligence frameworks such as Tensorflow, sci-kit learn, Keras using python.
Experience in statistics, machine learning and data science.
Experience in NLP, reinforcement learning, active learning.

Experience with Streaming technologies (Kafka, Kinesis, etc).

Research or Industry experience in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning (ML) models, ML infrastructure, Natural Language Processing or Deep Learning.
Experience of working in fintech.
You've worked with postgres or other SQL-based databases.
You're familiar with or have been using Amazon Web Services.
Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve ML models/infrastructure and software that uses these models.

Title: Architect - UI Development
Description:
Icertis, the leading enterprise contract management platform in the cloud, solves the hardest contract management problems on the easiest to use platform. With Icertis, companies accelerate their business by increasing contract velocity, protect against risk by ensuring regulatory and policy compliance, and optimize their commercial relationships by maximizing revenue and reducing costs. The AI-infused Icertis Contract Management (ICM) platform is used by companies like 3M, Airbus, Cognizant, Daimler, Microsoft and Sanofi to manage 5.7 million contracts in 40+ languages across 90+ countries.

We are looking for an UI Architect to be part the transformation of our easy to use, configurable application into the next level Contract Lifecycle Management enterprise platform that serves Fortune 500 customers. This candidate should fit into our culture of (FORTE) Fairness, Openness, Respect, Teamwork and Execution to help grow Icertis into the next generation contracting cloud platform.
The ideal candidate will contribute to the UI architecture initiative to make the Icertis UI the most performant, consistent, and easy to use across all devices, browsers and experiences. This person will collaborate with Engineering, Product Management and User Experience to refactor existing code, build new features and prototype experimental proof of concepts that demonstrate the business value of emerging technologies as they apply to the domain. Your work will be at the intersection of collaboration, workflow management, artificial intelligence, machine learning and data science, so there will be a lot of room to learn new technology for the right candidate.
The suitable candidate must also have extensive experience building solutions across varied complex business domains, with a bend toward building reusable platform components. Candidate must also have experienced this journey in an enterprise software context in a SaaS environment across multiple releases. This professional has a maniacal attention to detail in delivering both technically elegant and very usable business applications.
Responsibilities
Ability to understand complex code structures and be able to create abstractions. Define UI platform components that can be deployed to implement the usage patterns of the users.
Lead a team of UI developers in building sophisticated UI components that can be stitched together to build a consistent application UI framework that is scalable, secure and easy to maintain.
Take full ownership of product features from inception to completion, and take real pride in one’s craftsmanship that will be widely used by top 100 Global companies
Create prototype implementations to prove the concept. Work with the larger UI/engineering team to productize the concepts.
Identify new technology frameworks that can be utilized to improve the speed of development and velocity of new capabilities to be introduced.
Research industry trends and propose changes to the current design as appropriate.

Qualifications
BS in Computer Science or Engineering graduate, preferably a MS degree from a reputed university
12 to 15 years of software development experience with minimum of 7 years in HTML 5, CSS 3, JavaScript, JQuery, AJAX, and JSON in a high growth environment
Experience with Responsive HTML frameworks like Bootstrap and Zurb Foundation
Experience with building out a reusable design system like Salesforce Lightning, SAP Fiori or Material Design
Experience with Javascript frameworks like Angular-S or ReactJS
Experience with Kendo UI or Infragistics UI Controls
Experience with data visualization frameworks like d3.js or Kendo Charts
Expertise in implementing scalable SaaS enterprise application UI frameworks
In depth experience in the design, development and deployment of enterprise web and/or cloud applications using Microsoft .NET technologies
Extensive Experience with ASP.NET MVC using C#.NET
A great communicator of ideas and solutions and a lateral thinker when faced with complex performance or production issues
Icertis is not open to 3rd party solicitation or resumes for our posted FTE positions. Resumes received from 3rd party agencies that are unsolicited will be considered complimentary.

Icertis, Inc. provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, national origin, age, disability, genetic information, marital status, amnesty, or status as a covered veteran in accordance with applicable federal, state and local laws. Icertis, Inc. complies with applicable state and local laws governing non-discrimination in employment in every location in which the company has facilities.

Title: Senior Automation QA Engineer (Remote/Work-from-home)
Description:
WalletHub is one of the leading personal finance destinations in the US and rapidly growing. We’re looking for a motivated, hardworking, and competitive Senior Automation QA Engineer for a full-time, permanent position.
The expected work schedule is 7 AM to 7 PM EST Monday to Friday, including a 1h break.
Responsibilities
Testing and assuring high quality performance of website
Reporting and validating bugs for all components
Creating test plans and test cases
Creating and maintaining automated tests using Selenium and Java
Identifying opportunities for improvement and making constructive suggestions for change
Qualifications
You are the ideal candidate for this job if you have:
At least 3 years of hands-on experience in Test Automation with Java and Selenium
At least 4 years experience in Manual Testing
Excellent attention to details
Proven ability to meet deadlines and handle multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment
Willingness to work hard
Proficient in written/spoken English
Compensation
Very competitive salary based on prior experience and qualifications
Potential for stock options after the first year
Raise and advancement opportunities based on periodic evaluations
The ability to work overtime for added income
100% remote position
Visa sponsorship (after 24 months with the company, based on performance, in case you will be working from outside the US)
How to apply
To get our attention, all you need to do is apply on Indeed and include your updated resume as well as a brief message telling us why you are the right candidate.If we believe that you will be a good match, we'll contact you to arrange the next steps of the application process.
Please know that we appreciate your interest in our company but due to the high number of applications we are unable to get back to candidates who have not been selected to move forward.
Note
This position does not have a location requirement and can be performed remotely from outside the U.S. without the need for U.S. work authorization.
More about WalletHub
WalletHub is a high-growth fintech company based in Washington, D.C. that is looking for talented, hard-working individuals to help us reshape personal finance. More specifically, we are harnessing the power of data analytics and artificial intelligence to build the brain of a smart financial advisor, whose services we’re offering to everyone for free. The WalletHub brain enables users to make better financial decisions in a fraction of the time with three unique features:
1) Customized Credit-Improvement Tips: WalletHub identifies improvement opportunities and guides you through the necessary corrections.
2) Personalized Money-Saving Advice: WalletHub’s savings brain constantly scours the market for load-lightening opportunities, bringing you only the best deals.
3) Wallet Surveillance: Personal finance isn’t as scary with 24/7 credit monitoring providing backup, notifying you of important credit-report changes.
In addition to the valuable intelligence the brain provides, WalletHub is the first and only service to offer free credit scores and full credit reports that are updated on a daily basis absent of user interaction, rather than weekly or monthly and only when a user logs in. Some other services hang their hats on free credit scores and reports, yet they’re still inferior to what WalletHub considers minor pieces to a much larger puzzle.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹960,000.00 to ₹2,100,000.00 /year

Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.

SFDC, APEX, Conga, Appttus, Cloudsense

Title: Java Full Stack Developer / Core Java / HTML / Java Script /...
Description:
Requisition ID: 218729
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.
#SAPSFSF
WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team (Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com, APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com, EMEA: Careers@sap.com).

Title: Full Stack Developer
Description:
Location: Mumbai, India
About Us
Most of the world’s digital information was created in the last few years with the vast majority of that information being unstructured in the form of text, tweets, videos, images, blogs, etc. The rate of growth of digital information vastly exceeds our biological processing abilities. The consequence for investors is that it’s becoming harder to make sense of the factors that drive financial markets. Acting upon partial understanding of vast quantities of information (i.e., heuristics) infuses investment decisions with cognitive biases. In order to beat markets and make money, humans need to augment their reasoning capacity, consider the relevance of more information, and make bias-free decisions.
At Accrete.AI, our vision is to help investors generate alpha, or excess returns, by training machines to think in the language of the markets. We leverage deep learning and Machine Augmented Collective Intelligence (MACI) to train machines to reason and learn so they can help human investors make better investment decisions.
About You:
You have experience with technologies such as Java, Node JS, HTML5, Javascript, MySql, MongoDB
You have expertise in JQuery, Angular JS, CSS3 and JSON. Also has good understanding on developing UI compatible across browsers
You have a fundamental comprehension of financial markets and the financial services industry
You have a product-centric focus
In-depth understanding of front-end to backend
You have experience with Artificial Intelligence
You have good knowledge of SOA and able to write web services
You possess good analytical abilities, and should be able to code as per business functionality
You should be able to read and understand Python code
You have hands on programming experience
You have product development experience
You have a wealth of experience with project management you can draw upon when pressed with urgent deadlines
You’re passionate about or understand finance, macroeconomics and/or computer science
You can distill complex concepts into simple and clear statements
You are a self-starter, able to work in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
You can take a task and run with it with minimal direction but know how to ask for help when needed
You are extremely detail-oriented and plan for everything – including the possibility that milestones might change
You also work exceedingly well in teams, specifically with peers of elder age or of different nationalities
You take pride in your work and always strive for excellence
You are interested in contributing to products powered by artificial intelligence and working on the defining edge of the industry
You are eager to learn, want your contributions to have impact, and are excited about being a part of high-growth startup

A degree in Computer Science or equivalent academic background

Title: Software Engineer - Systems
Description:
At Instart, we are building a world where digital experiences continuously adapt to become increasingly engaging with every interaction.

Every major brand today, whether it is online shopping, travel or news, is making huge investments to improve their online experiences to keep up with consumer expectations. As consumers in a digital world, we tend to abandon websites very quickly if the experience is not as good as we expect it to be - fast, engaging and responsive. With over 100+ patents using artificial intelligence and machine learning, Instart’s unique technology continually optimizes the online consumer experience, learning from every interaction across devices and networks.

We’re growing at a rapid pace - on the path to increase our revenue and customer base by 4x in the next couple of years! You have an opportunity to be a part of this amazing growth, working on cutting-edge AI/ML cloud technology with some of the greatest minds, to help the most recognizable brands in the world create better digital experiences.

Instart is backed by major investors who are all looking to see us become the next Unicorn and more – Andreessen Horowitz, KPCB, Tenaya, Greylock, Geodesic, Sutter Hill and STTelemedia to name a few. We take pride in the great experience we offer our employees from our flexible work schedules to free lunches and our super cool, dog friendly office in Palo Alto. Let’s talk about your next career opportunity at Instart.

We are looking for Systems Engineers to help design and build the backend infrastructure for Instart's large-scale mission-critical distributed system. If you are passionate about working on cutting edge technology together with a world-class engineering team, we want to talk to you. You should have a solid background in distributed systems, large-scale high-throughput high-performance infrastructure, and experience monitoring and tuning performance of complex systems at scale.

Qualifications:
Minimum 8 to 18years of hands-on infrastructure development experience
Excellent development and debugging skills using C/C++ and Python
Experience in programming on a multi-threaded environment
Prior experience with all of the following: fault-tolerant distributed systems, HTTP and related protocols, proxies and web servers, Linux and systems programming
Prior startup experience a plus
Ability to work on multiple projects at a time in a fast-paced environment
Minimum Bachelors or Masters in Computer Science (or equivalent); PhD preferred
Instart is an equal opportunity employer and value diversity at our company. We do not discriminate on the basis of race, religion, color, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, or disability status.

Title: Software Engineer - Infrastructure

About Us
-

Blueshift ( http://blueshift.com/ ) is a venture-funded startup headquartered in San Francisco. Our AI-Powered marketing platform empowers cutting edge B2C brands to drive 1:1 marketing on every channel. With Blueshift, marketers are in full control of automating various forms of personalized messaging across every engagement channel.

Blueshift is trusted by leading digital brands like Udacity, LendingTree, BBC, and Paypal to automate their customer engagement marketing and recognized by Gartner as a "Cool Vendor for AI in Marketing".

Blueshift is founded by repeat entrepreneurs who previously built Mertado.com (acquired by Groupon to become Groupon Goods), and were part of the early team behind Kosmix (acquired by Walmart to become @WalmartLabs). We are backed by top-tier VCs including Nexus Venture Partners, Storm Ventures, Luma Partners, and SoftBank Venture Asia.

Generating test reports, automated monitoring scripts
Must haves-

4-6 years of experience in testing preferably an enterprise SaaS application
Strong knowledge of software QA methodologies, tools and processes
Experience in both manual and automated testing
Hands on experience in automation- Exposure to scripting languages-Python/ Perl/ Shell
Installation and administration skills of one or more of Windows, Linux Operating Systems
Experience with testing RESTful data services, web services and APIs
Solid knowledge of SQL queries
Ability to work as part of a global team with good communication skills (written and spoken English)
We are building a world class team to build high performance computing solutions in Enterprise Artificial Intelligence technologies (e.g., machine learning, predictive data analytics, data science).

We have been covered by the NY Times, Forbes, Fortune, PC World, among others.

Noodle.ai, the Enterprise Artificial Intelligence (TM) company, provides professional services and technical solutions to the world's most innovative companies. Noodle.ai's solutions combine human learning and machine learning technologies to help clients improve customer interactions, improve decision making, and optimize business processes. Noodle.ai's solutions span customer data analytics, product data analytics, and enterprise data analytics. Founded in 2016, Noodle.ai is led by executives previously with the top firms in data science, artificial intelligence, machine learning, and management consulting. Noodle.ai focuses on maximizing value for our clients' customers and shareholders.

Title: Senior Automation QA Engineer (Remote/Work-from-home)
Description:
WalletHub is one of the leading personal finance destinations in the US and rapidly growing. We’re looking for a motivated, hardworking, and competitive Senior Automation QA Engineer for a full-time, permanent position.
The expected work schedule is 7 AM to 7 PM EST Monday to Friday, including a 1h break.
Responsibilities
Testing and assuring high quality performance of website
Reporting and validating bugs for all components
Creating test plans and test cases
Creating and maintaining automated tests using Selenium and Java
Identifying opportunities for improvement and making constructive suggestions for change
Qualifications
You are the ideal candidate for this job if you have:
At least 3 years of hands-on experience in Test Automation with Java and Selenium
At least 4 years experience in Manual Testing
Excellent attention to details
Proven ability to meet deadlines and handle multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment
Willingness to work hard
Proficient in written/spoken English
Compensation
Very competitive salary based on prior experience and qualifications
Potential for stock options after the first year
Raise and advancement opportunities based on periodic evaluations
The ability to work overtime for added income
100% remote position
Visa sponsorship (after 24 months with the company, based on performance, in case you will be working from outside the US)
How to apply
To get our attention, all you need to do is apply on Indeed and include your updated resume as well as a brief message telling us why you are the right candidate.If we believe that you will be a good match, we'll contact you to arrange the next steps of the application process.
Please know that we appreciate your interest in our company but due to the high number of applications we are unable to get back to candidates who have not been selected to move forward.
Note
This position does not have a location requirement and can be performed remotely from outside the U.S. without the need for U.S. work authorization.
More about WalletHub
WalletHub is a high-growth fintech company based in Washington, D.C. that is looking for talented, hard-working individuals to help us reshape personal finance. More specifically, we are harnessing the power of data analytics and artificial intelligence to build the brain of a smart financial advisor, whose services we’re offering to everyone for free. The WalletHub brain enables users to make better financial decisions in a fraction of the time with three unique features:
1) Customized Credit-Improvement Tips: WalletHub identifies improvement opportunities and guides you through the necessary corrections.
2) Personalized Money-Saving Advice: WalletHub’s savings brain constantly scours the market for load-lightening opportunities, bringing you only the best deals.
3) Wallet Surveillance: Personal finance isn’t as scary with 24/7 credit monitoring providing backup, notifying you of important credit-report changes.
In addition to the valuable intelligence the brain provides, WalletHub is the first and only service to offer free credit scores and full credit reports that are updated on a daily basis absent of user interaction, rather than weekly or monthly and only when a user logs in. Some other services hang their hats on free credit scores and reports, yet they’re still inferior to what WalletHub considers minor pieces to a much larger puzzle.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹960,000.00 to ₹2,100,000.00 /year

Title: Git + AWS Cloud Engineer
Description:
Klizo Solutions develops mobile apps, websites, and software. We work in some really cool technology like facial recognition, artificial intelligence, and even blockchain. We have about 25 people in the team, and we are are doubling in size over the next couple months. We are looking for good people to join our rapidly growing company.
As a key member of our team, the AWS Cloud Engineer will work with development teams and other DevOps engineers to solve critical issues while improving customer experience. Other responsibilities include:
Build and support scalable microservices and system orchestration.
Design, development, and testing of features delivered as applications and/or services.
Investigate and contribute to solving issues in production environments.
Provide collaborative conduit between various technical and non-technical teams.

Experience with HTTP APIs and RESTful web services
Understanding of web browser APIs and behavior
Excellent technical communication skills
Competent in designing and building web applications and/or web services in a commercial setting
Competent in design/implementation for reliability, availability, scalability and performance
Competent in software engineering tools (e.g. build tools) and best practices (e.g. test automation and continuous integration)

Experience building complex software systems that have been successfully delivered to customers

Title: Software-Senior Engineer(CPQ Architect)
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Join us on this exciting journey, and together, we’ll reimagine the future.
Role with us
CPQ Technical Architect will work with business stakeholders and ITS colleagues in the implementation and support of Cloudsense CPQ at Telstra. This position offers diversity in projects, an opportunity to work in a team environment with autonomy and a high-level of responsibility. There are also excellent opportunities for professional growth and advancement within Telstra Customer Platforms and broader Telstra systems.
CPQ Technical Architect is responsible for leading technical CPQ low level architecture activities for Telstra across requirement analysis, design, development and implementation on Telstra’s key CRM platforms. They will be responsible for developing and coordinating technical delivery aspects of all Telstra’s CRM systems implementations, communicating effectively and fostering strong relationships with business users and stakeholders.
The purpose of the role is to take responsibility for ensuring all requests from the business are developed and delivered in the most optimal way taking into consideration business roadmaps, ITS CRM Strategy, industry best practice, vendor roadmaps and thought leadership and innovation delivering a competitive advantage to Telstra.
He will participate in and/or be responsible for technical analysis of functional designs, preparation of technical designs, technical build & implementation of CRM, CRM configuration and scripting, quality & code reviews, facilitating testing, resolution of defects identified during test, managing relationships between support and development team, mentoring and training
Key Accountabilities
Salesforce Technical Architect role is to plan, coordinate, and execute all activities related to the requirements interpretation, design and implementation of CPQ, CLM applications. This individual will apply proven industry and technology experience as well as communication skills, problem-solving skills, and knowledge of best practices to issues related to design, development, and deployment of mission-critical CRM systems with a focus on quality application development and delivery.
This role is key to the success of the Customer Platforms function at Telstra and will be responsible and accountable for the following:
Ability to design and develop Salesforce CRM, Cloudsense CPQ & Force.com Applications
Ability to review vendor designs and recommended solutions based on industry best practises
Ability to provide technical governance across Cloudsense CPQ solutions at Telstra
Assess and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the Salesforce application solutions to ensure user requirements and business objectives are met in a timely and cost effective manner
Understand overall business operations and develops innovative solutions to help improve productivity
Ability to understand and design provisioning solutions at Telstra and how CRM interacts with provisioning layers.
Strong problem solving and analytical skills needed to support enterprise high availability Salesforce applications
Coordinate with technical resource within and outside of Customer Platforms team.
Monitor process of software configuration/development/testing to assure quality deliverable.
Ensure standards of QA are being met
Review deliverables to verify that they meet client and contract expectations; Implement and enforce high standards for quality deliverables
Analyses performance and capacity issues of the highest complexity with Salesforce application.
Demonstrate thought Leadership in Cloudsense CPQ innovations and practices.
Assists leadership with development and management of new application capabilities to improve productivity
Provide training and educate other team members around core capabilities and helps them deliver high quality solutions and deliverables/documentation
Self-Motivator to perform Design / Develop user requirements, test and deploy the changes into production
Skill & Experience : 12 + yrs
SFDC, APEX, Conga, Appttus, Cloudsense
Technical Descriptors
Salesforce – Service Cloud, Sales Cloud, Force. Com platform
Salesforce Certified Developer / Advanced Developer / Technical Architect is essential
Experience in building applications on force.com platform with extensive hands-on and subject matter expertise in Salesforce technology including
Full cycle implementation experience with SFDC (application design, architecture and development using Salesforce.com)
Strong SFDC knowledge and Integration components for SFDC (SFDC APIs, Apex controllers, Apex Web Services, Apex callout, outbound messaging, SFDC data loaders, etc.)
Command over APEX and Visual force
Hands on experience in building salesforce apex classes, test classes and deployment process.
Deep knowledge of Salesforce API’s and hands on experience in building custom API’s and integration.
Working knowledge of web frameworks – HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JSON, Ajax
working knowledge of all Atlassian tools a bonus
Expertise in developing CPQ capability using Cloudsense.
Proven experience of working with Telco Clients to configure products, Baskets, Order Orchestration and Technical Enrichment.
Certifications in Appttus and Conga would be essential.
Expertise in developing Contract management solution integrating into CPQ using Conga or Appttus
Proven experience with creation of relevant documentation including, but not limited to Apttus CPQ solution design document and requirements documentation
Experience with migration of CPQ across environments including experience with the Apttus migration tool
Knowledge of the fundamental capabilities of Apttus CPQ including but not limited to:
Quoting and Quote Templates
Approvals (Deal Manager/IWA preferred)
X- Author
Fundamental understanding of Apttus CLM capabilities, Apttus CLM 201 certification a plus
Experience with Apttus Advanced Workflow Approvals
Experience with X-Author for Excel and Contracts
Experience with Apttus Wizard
Familiar with Apttus admin settings, Apttus custom settings and DocuSign settings.
Knowledge of Apttus development
Why Join us
Our people in India will be at the forefront of technological change as they work collaboratively with, and learn from, world-class experts and have access to the latest training programs and insights for their field.
Alongside your work on leading edge projects, working with us means you'll have access to company perks and benefits that'll reward you for the great work you do. We’re growing, fast, and for you that means many exciting opportunities to develop your career with us at Telstra.
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit tel.st/allrolesflex

Title: Java Full Stack Developer / Core Java / HTML / Java Script /...
Description:
Requisition ID: 218729
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.
#SAPSFSF
WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team (Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com, APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com, EMEA: Careers@sap.com).
Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.
