IT Centre Bangalore GDTC
Additional Locations
Worker Type
Employee
Worker Sub-Type
Regular
Time Type
Full time

Title: Technology Compliance Officer
Description:
Title: Technology Compliance Officer, APAC
Level: Associate
Location: India

Overview
Global Risk & Compliance plays a critical role in the successful execution of the firm’s compliance mission. The Compliance function ensures the development and maintenance of a strong compliance culture by developing and maintaining program infrastructure that identifies, measures and monitors compliance with applicable laws, regulations and rules that govern our business globally through independent and credible challenge. Compliance teams work closely with business, legal, control, and audit functions to provide expertise on regulatory compliance matters, assess and measure compliance and related risks, and monitor and test the adequacy of the firm’s compliance control environment.
The Asia Technology Compliance team is responsible for the implementation of Firm’s Compliance Program across Corporate and Line of Business (LoB) aligned technology teams in Asia working closely with Global/ LOB/ location Compliance officers.
Position Description
Technology Compliance Officer will work as part of the Asia Technology Compliance team who are currently located in Hong Kong and Singapore. The role will cover all aspects of the Compliance Program delivery primarily monitoring, testing, data analytics, risk assessments, issue management and regulatory knowledge capture/ dissemination through training and awareness material development and delivery. The officer will be encouraged to develop themselves as a Subject Matter Expert for one or more technologies to provide advisory to LoB and local Compliance teams.

The position requires a strong background in technology (experience in specific technologies would be an advantage e.g. Artificial Intelligence, Blockchain) and Risk and control. The position will also require strong communication and collaboration skills working with geographically diverse teams and the ability to work independently conducting analysis and assessing risks. It will also be essential to have an on-going interest in research and expanding individual and team knowledge with respect to technology risk and regulation.

Responsibilities:
Accountable for aspects of Asia Technology Compliance’s program delivery including
o Monitoring program development and execution
o Conducting specific elements of Compliance Tests with respect to technology risks
o Analysis of performance metrics obtained from Technology teams
o Provision of updates for various control forums and governance activities
o Maintaining Compliance’s continuous assessment of Technology risk through assimilating and assessing regulatory change, issues, external events etc. in Asia

Provide SME input on technology related matters to help LoB and local Compliance officers assess regulatory risks in Asia jurisdictions
Accountable for specific local/Asia projects to address cross LoB/ location regulatory issues and regulatory analysis within Asia which may include evaluating current processes and technical solutions, identifying gaps and prioritizing gaps across the local/ regional agenda
Contribute to Firm’s overall Technology Compliance Operating model through project participation
Participate in the review of submissions/communication to regulators with respect to technology risks
Conduct specific compliance risk assessments of technology changes and technology deployment
Work closely with regional/ global compliance officers and risk partners to ensure coordinated approach to key regulatory issues.


Skills and Qualifications:
Minimum 5+ years of compliance and/ or risk experience
Prior experience in technology / IT Audit / Information Risk/ technology regulations
Working knowledge of Asian technology related regulations
Specialist knowledge in one or more of the following Blockchain (DLT), AI/ML, Cloud, RPA
Recognized profession qualifications eg.CCISO, CISA, CRISC (would be advantageous)
Proven ability to collaborate and build strong partnerships with staff at all levels, across businesses, technology and operations as well as across different countries
Business acumen, relationship management, organizational management skills
Strong analytical, communication and negotiation skills
Must be able to multi-task while maintaining a strong drive for quality
Understanding of how systems and business processes interact in order to assess risks and controls to a business unit
Ability to work well independently in a time-sensitive environment

Title: Software Engineer, Front End
Description:
Note: By applying to this position your application is automatically submitted to the following locations: Bengaluru, Karnataka, India; Hyderabad, Telangana, India
Minimum qualifications:
BA/BS in Computer Science, related technical field, or equivalent practical experience.
5 years of relevant work experience.
Experience working in software development with one or more of the following programming languages; Java, C/C++, C#, Python, JavaScript, and/or Go.
Experience in working with front end technologies and/or front end frameworks.

Preferred qualifications:
Master’s degree, or PhD in Engineering, Computer Science or other technical related field, or equivalent practical experience.
Experience with user-interface design.
Background in computer science, with a focus on data structures, algorithms, and API design.
Ability to learn other coding languages.
Demonstrated ability to share knowledge via formal mentoring, reviewing code, reviewing design documents, providing technical talks, teaching classes, or as a consultant on projects.
About the job
Google's software engineers develop the next-generation technologies that change how billions of users connect, explore, and interact with information and one another. Our products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, security, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, UI design and mobile; the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Google’s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.
Teams that are currently hiring for are:
Google Pay is Google’s mobile payments and commerce app for our Next Billions Users (NBU) markets. It was made first for India with an incredible adoption since launch.
Bolo is a speech-based reading-tutor app that helps children learn to read. Our team’s mission is universal literacy, we believe that everyone should be able to read. Through working together with parents, teachers, and the broader education ecosystem, Bolo will contribute in shaping the future of India’s young learners and readers.
The Web search team works on critical search features that reside in the Google.com search result page. These involve cutting edge ML and information retrieval techniques around language and text understanding, sophisticated ranking algorithms, building large-scale serving infrastructure, and UI innovation to surface rich structured information in search. The team focuses both on solving important India-specific search problems (such as rich local language search, improving the content eco-system for local content, etc) and also technologies that cater to global search features, including user-modeling and document understanding.
Google is and always will be an engineering company. We hire people with a broad set of technical skills who are ready to take on some of technology's greatest challenges and make an impact on millions, if not billions, of users. At Google, engineers not only revolutionize search, they routinely work on massive scalability and storage solutions, large-scale applications and entirely new platforms for developers around the world. From Google Ads to Chrome, Android to YouTube, Social to Local, Google engineers are changing the world one technological achievement after another.
Responsibilities
Design, develop, test, deploy, maintain and improve software.
Manage individual project priorities, deadlines and deliverables.
Design and implement new user-facing features in Google’s products.
Write client-side code for web-based applications, create fast, easy-to-use, high volume production applications, and develop prototypes.
Optimize web applications to maximize speed and scale.
At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status. We also consider qualified applicants regardless of criminal histories, consistent with legal requirements. See also Google's EEO Policy and EEO is the Law. If you have a disability or special need that requires accommodation, please let us know by completing this form.

Title: IoT Engineer / Specialist – Information Technology
Researcher Job stage 5
Description:
Date: Jun 26, 2019
Job Title – Artificial Intelligence Researcher

Ericsson Research is looking for highly motivated and talented Artificial Intelligence Researchers to be part of our Research team, bringing Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning to mobile networks. We are pushing the technology frontiers in AI, combining machine learning and reasoning methods, tools, and techniques to drive intelligent autonomous operations in large complex telecom systems.

Are you well acquainted with the scientific method, and publish your results in scientific conferences or journals?
Do you want to apply those skills to solve real and complex problems with high societal impact?
Do you want to inspire and lead AI research for the future 5G, Cloud and IoT systems?
Then come talk to us!
We are looking for talented researchers to be part of this exciting journey! We are working on a global scale to recruit the best talent and work with the leading universities and customers.

We pride ourselves in providing a supportive team environment where individual contributors are given the maximal opportunity to excel and develop their technical skills. As a researcher in the AI Research team, you will have the freedom to think big and the support to turn ideas into achievements. You will become a member of a successful global research team as a technical leader, and work as part of this team to create a compelling research agenda and carry it out. Your contributions will include developing innovative AI algorithms/solutions and systems to address research challenges in realizing our Zero-Touch Network and Service Management Vision with applications in 5G, Cloud and IoT; prototyping and communicating your work to the Ericsson business units, global customers, standardization groups, and at technical conferences. Here’s what we are looking for in a successful candidate:

Strong background in one or more of the following areas:
Machine Reasoning
Understanding of symbolic artificial intelligence and logical reasoning
Reinforcement learning
Knowledge graphs, knowledge representation, AI planning
Explainable artificial intelligence
Model-based AI systems, Modeling and analysis of system behavior
Logic Programming, Language, methods and tools for intent specification, human-machine interaction
Formal Methods
Deep Neural Networks
Probabilistic reasoning, inference and Bayesian Networks
Transfer and Federated Learning
Bayesian Networks
PhD degree (preferred) with thesis in one of the areas above or Masters’ in a relevant field
Prior experience in research organizations/academia desired
Demonstrated ability to develop novel and innovative ideas, generate patents, publish results at conferences and in journals
Demonstrated implementation/programming skills and experience with opensource software stacks
Knowledge of application areas such as 5G, Cloud, IoT, Computer Vision, Speech Processing is a strong plus
Open and quick to learn new technologies and open to work in adjacent areas
Good communication skills

Ericsson Research

Ericsson Research is the central research organization within Ericsson. Our mission is to provide Ericsson with advanced system concepts, technology and methodology and to secure long term competitive product positioning. World-class research and innovation is achieved through cooperation within Ericsson and with partners, customers, universities and research institutes. We are a truly global organization, offering a diverse, performance-driven culture and an innovative and engaging environment.

Title: Senior Automation QA Engineer (Remote/Work-from-home)
Description:
WalletHub is one of the leading personal finance destinations in the US and rapidly growing. We’re looking for a motivated, hardworking, and competitive Senior Automation QA Engineer for a full-time, permanent position.
The expected work schedule is 7 AM to 7 PM EST Monday to Friday, including a 1h break.
Responsibilities
Testing and assuring high quality performance of website
Reporting and validating bugs for all components
Creating test plans and test cases
Creating and maintaining automated tests using Selenium and Java
Identifying opportunities for improvement and making constructive suggestions for change
Qualifications
You are the ideal candidate for this job if you have:
At least 3 years of hands-on experience in Test Automation with Java and Selenium
At least 4 years experience in Manual Testing
Excellent attention to details
Proven ability to meet deadlines and handle multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment
Willingness to work hard
Proficient in written/spoken English
Compensation
Very competitive salary based on prior experience and qualifications
Potential for stock options after the first year
Raise and advancement opportunities based on periodic evaluations
The ability to work overtime for added income
100% remote position
Visa sponsorship (after 24 months with the company, based on performance, in case you will be working from outside the US)
How to apply
To get our attention, all you need to do is apply on Indeed and include your updated resume as well as a brief message telling us why you are the right candidate.If we believe that you will be a good match, we'll contact you to arrange the next steps of the application process.
Please know that we appreciate your interest in our company but due to the high number of applications we are unable to get back to candidates who have not been selected to move forward.
Note
This position does not have a location requirement and can be performed remotely from outside the U.S. without the need for U.S. work authorization.
More about WalletHub
WalletHub is a high-growth fintech company based in Washington, D.C. that is looking for talented, hard-working individuals to help us reshape personal finance. More specifically, we are harnessing the power of data analytics and artificial intelligence to build the brain of a smart financial advisor, whose services we’re offering to everyone for free. The WalletHub brain enables users to make better financial decisions in a fraction of the time with three unique features:
1) Customized Credit-Improvement Tips: WalletHub identifies improvement opportunities and guides you through the necessary corrections.
2) Personalized Money-Saving Advice: WalletHub’s savings brain constantly scours the market for load-lightening opportunities, bringing you only the best deals.
3) Wallet Surveillance: Personal finance isn’t as scary with 24/7 credit monitoring providing backup, notifying you of important credit-report changes.
In addition to the valuable intelligence the brain provides, WalletHub is the first and only service to offer free credit scores and full credit reports that are updated on a daily basis absent of user interaction, rather than weekly or monthly and only when a user logs in. Some other services hang their hats on free credit scores and reports, yet they’re still inferior to what WalletHub considers minor pieces to a much larger puzzle.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹960,000.00 to ₹2,100,000.00 /year

Title: Java Full Stack Developer / Core Java / HTML / Java Script /...
Description:
Requisition ID: 218026
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.
#SAPSFSF

WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team (Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com, APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com, EMEA: Careers@sap.com).
Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.

work: 1 year (Required)

Title: Software-Senior Engineer(CPQ Architect)
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Join us on this exciting journey, and together, we’ll reimagine the future.
Role with us
CPQ Technical Architect is responsible for leading technical CPQ low level architecture activities for Telstra across requirement analysis, design, development and implementation on Telstra’s key CRM platforms. They will be responsible for developing and coordinating technical delivery aspects of all Telstra’s CRM systems implementations, communicating effectively and fostering strong relationships with business users and stakeholders.
The purpose of the role is to take responsibility for ensuring all requests from the business are developed and delivered in the most optimal way taking into consideration business roadmaps, ITS CRM Strategy, industry best practice, vendor roadmaps and thought leadership and innovation delivering a competitive advantage to Telstra.
He will participate in and/or be responsible for technical analysis of functional designs, preparation of technical designs, technical build & implementation of CRM, CRM configuration and scripting, quality & code reviews, facilitating testing, resolution of defects identified during test, managing relationships between support and development team, mentoring and training
Key Accountabilities
Salesforce Technical Architect role is to plan, coordinate, and execute all activities related to the requirements interpretation, design and implementation of CPQ, CLM applications. This individual will apply proven industry and technology experience as well as communication skills, problem-solving skills, and knowledge of best practices to issues related to design, development, and deployment of mission-critical CRM systems with a focus on quality application development and delivery.
This role is key to the success of the Customer Platforms function at Telstra and will be responsible and accountable for the following:
Ability to design and develop Salesforce CRM, Cloudsense CPQ & Force.com Applications
Ability to review vendor designs and recommended solutions based on industry best practises
Ability to provide technical governance across Cloudsense CPQ solutions at Telstra
Assess and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the Salesforce application solutions to ensure user requirements and business objectives are met in a timely and cost effective manner
Understand overall business operations and develops innovative solutions to help improve productivity
Ability to understand and design provisioning solutions at Telstra and how CRM interacts with provisioning layers.
Strong problem solving and analytical skills needed to support enterprise high availability Salesforce applications
Coordinate with technical resource within and outside of Customer Platforms team.
Monitor process of software configuration/development/testing to assure quality deliverable.
Ensure standards of QA are being met
Review deliverables to verify that they meet client and contract expectations; Implement and enforce high standards for quality deliverables
Analyses performance and capacity issues of the highest complexity with Salesforce application.
Demonstrate thought Leadership in Cloudsense CPQ innovations and practices.
Assists leadership with development and management of new application capabilities to improve productivity
Provide training and educate other team members around core capabilities and helps them deliver high quality solutions and deliverables/documentation
Self-Motivator to perform Design / Develop user requirements, test and deploy the changes into production
Skill & Experience : 12 + yrs
SFDC, APEX, Conga, Appttus, Cloudsense
Technical Descriptors
Salesforce – Service Cloud, Sales Cloud, Force. Com platform
Salesforce Certified Developer / Advanced Developer / Technical Architect is essential
Experience in building applications on force.com platform with extensive hands-on and subject matter expertise in Salesforce technology including
Full cycle implementation experience with SFDC (application design, architecture and development using Salesforce.com)
Strong SFDC knowledge and Integration components for SFDC (SFDC APIs, Apex controllers, Apex Web Services, Apex callout, outbound messaging, SFDC data loaders, etc.)
Command over APEX and Visual force
Hands on experience in building salesforce apex classes, test classes and deployment process.
Deep knowledge of Salesforce API’s and hands on experience in building custom API’s and integration.
Working knowledge of web frameworks – HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JSON, Ajax
working knowledge of all Atlassian tools a bonus
Expertise in developing CPQ capability using Cloudsense.
Proven experience of working with Telco Clients to configure products, Baskets, Order Orchestration and Technical Enrichment.
Certifications in Appttus and Conga would be essential.
Expertise in developing Contract management solution integrating into CPQ using Conga or Appttus
Proven experience with creation of relevant documentation including, but not limited to Apttus CPQ solution design document and requirements documentation
Experience with migration of CPQ across environments including experience with the Apttus migration tool
Knowledge of the fundamental capabilities of Apttus CPQ including but not limited to:
Quoting and Quote Templates
Approvals (Deal Manager/IWA preferred)
X- Author
Fundamental understanding of Apttus CLM capabilities, Apttus CLM 201 certification a plus
Experience with Apttus Advanced Workflow Approvals
Experience with X-Author for Excel and Contracts
Experience with Apttus Wizard
Familiar with Apttus admin settings, Apttus custom settings and DocuSign settings.
Knowledge of Apttus development
Why Join us
Our people in India will be at the forefront of technological change as they work collaboratively with, and learn from, world-class experts and have access to the latest training programs and insights for their field.
Alongside your work on leading edge projects, working with us means you'll have access to company perks and benefits that'll reward you for the great work you do. We’re growing, fast, and for you that means many exciting opportunities to develop your career with us at Telstra.
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit tel.st/allrolesflex

Title: Big Data Architect Architecture Senior Analyst
Description:
Primary Location: India,Tamil Nadu,Chennai
Education: Bachelor's Degree
Job Function: Technology
Schedule: Full-time
Shift: Day Job
Employee Status: Regular
Travel Time: Yes, 10 % of the Time
Job ID: 19027034

Description

Position Summary

The Chief Technology Officer (CTO) function is responsible for strategic and operational management of the technology environment supporting Citi’s Global Consumer Technology (GCT) function. Key responsibilities of the CTO include enterprise architecture governance; technology innovation, strategy and roadmap development; software development technology, process and design standards; performance engineering and testing; development operations (devops) strategy and execution; operational management and optimization of infrastructure in conjunction with CTI; and production management of GCB’s global application portfolio.

The Big Data Architect is responsible for orchestrating a forward looking technology plan for Global Consumer Bank’s Data and Analytics organization to provide market-competitive (or differentiated as needed) capability at optimal speed and/or total cost of ownership. Specifically, the Big Data Architect is expected to research on market insight, perform competitive assessment, understand and inform business and technology strategy, define the reference architecture and maintain a roadmap of capability and investment aligned to critical business needs and technology requirements.The Big Data Architect will have a strategic, global and market focus for their Sub domains while assisting and driving LOB investment decisions to ensure they inform and further the reference architecture and roadmap pertaining to their Sub domains.

The Big Data Architect drives GCT’s strategy for leveraging On-Prem and External Cloud Big Data Platform and Services provided by Amazon. Understands and designs reference architectures that leverage Cloudera Hadoop and Analytical Tools (Python, R, H20, etc.) On-Prem and Cloud Big Data Services such as SageMaker, ElasticSearch, RedShift, Glue, S3, etc. on AWS.

Key Responsibilities
Maintain and apply a broad and current industry perspective on technology trends/opportunities, alternate solution providers and ranking, leading practices and our position/capability/performance relative to direct competitors and parallel industries/organizations. Ensure technology roadmaps are developed within the context of expected market developments and the opportunities/threats they present
Demonstrate technology thought leadership, foster productive business relationships and build strong sponsorship of our technology architecture and roadmap. Understand and influence business strategy, ensuring it’s informed by current and emerging technology capability and supported by our architecture and roadmap
Maintain reference architecture for the assigned Sub domain(s), ensuring it’s anchored in current/emerging business requirements, consistent with enterprise and sector architectural tenets, supported by clearly defined financial and non-financial rationale and actionable within the context of Citi’s investment and risk appetite
Maintain Sub Domain Level comprehensive technology roadmaps encompassing application and related infrastructure services that are consistent with the reference architecture and phased in accordance with business priorities, investment and risk appetite and regulatory, risk and compliance requirements
Maintain a comprehensive view of current and forecast Sub domain economics (e.g. run cost trend, expected investment and potential impairments). Ensure roadmaps support business and technology financial objectives and both highlight and mitigate financial risks to the extent possible
Drive global and regional architecture forums, ensuring the reference architecture and roadmap at sub domain level are informed by practical requirements and that design decisions remain consistent with the architecture and roadmap; ensure appropriate governance of exceptions and stringent follow-up to ensure all conditions of approval are met within the committed timeframe
Foster a strong regionally aligned solution architect/design community with intimate knowledge of our reference architect and roadmap and a governance process that will ensure our reference architecture and roadmap remain relevant within regional context and central to individual investment and project decisions
Ensure early engagement of partner organizations (e.g. CATE and CTI) in the development of our reference architecture and roadmap. Ensure planned capability can be satisfied by partner organizations within the timeframe required
Develop a learning environment; demonstrate teamwork, respect and collaboration across the CTO function and with GCT, CTI, CATE and other partner organizations, and foster a culture of innovation, commercial savvy, dependability, pragmatism and excellence
Ensure all regulatory, compliance and internal control requirements are met, while maintaining a measured view of risk affecting all areas of CTO responsibility and structured and visible plans for mitigation of this risk
Assist in the development of the roadmap and strategies for Consumer Bank’s underlying data management platforms including instruction Kits, SDKs, Dev Guides, API reference documents, experts, blogs, social, and group helps, certificate progression from sandbox to production, metrics, reports and notifications across authorized APIs, managing volumes and throttling capabilities, profile and hierarchy management for authorizing functionality, service level monitoring, bug reporting and escalation process, T&Cs, rate agreements, billing management, overall internal developer portal platform and content management, API versioning and modernization.In addition, assist the domain lead for the overall build of security features, push protocols and APIs to ingest and process external data and hold inside Citi persistence layers. Interface with Data and Security teams to address gaps and risks to building overall platform

Qualifications

Education
Minimum:
Bachelor degree in computer science, information technology, software engineering or a related field
Preferred:
Master’s degree preferred
Experience

Minimum:
3-5 years in hands-on technology/engineering roles within financial services or a related industry; specific experience in strategy development, enterprise and/or solution architecture and systems integration in a complex distributed environment employing a mix of modern and legacy technologies
Experience with Big Data platforms, SaaS analytic & BI tool sets and programming languages (e.g. R, Python), advanced analytic tools and techniques, middleware and integration approaches, data quality & metadata management, Artificial Intelligence/Machine Learning
Expertise in Cloudera Hadoop Distribution Framework with key toolsets like Python, R, H2O, Talend, Spark, Hive, Hbase, etc.
Expertise in integrating the Big data technologies with other ecosystems such as Salesforce or the Marcom stack
Expertise in integrating real-time event driven architecture, big data stack with digital and marketing channels
Expertise in AWS Big Data and Analytics services such as SageMaker, AWS Glue, Amazon Elastic Map Reduce (EMR), Amazon Athena & Amazon Kinesis in addition to other offerings that form the Data & Analytics ecosystem
Expertise in AWS Serverless, Caching, Search, Database, network, security, logging, monitoring and High Availability services and capabilities
Thorough understanding of market leading external cloud service provider’s architecture, software and technology offerings with insight into understanding of risk profile and compliance when it comes to taking financial data to cloud and knowledge of financials
Comprehensive functional and technical knowledge within the assigned or related domain developed through practical experience in defining and delivering technology solutions within a global and diverse financial services environment
Strongly developed strategic, analytical and communication skills evidenced by experience in formulating strategic scenarios, evaluating trade-offs within a robust commercial framework, developing related financial models and designing practical execution plans
Practical experience in architecture roles within a complex commercial environment including assisting in setting architectural principles, helping define the reference architecture, building technology roadmaps aligned with business plans and helping to institute governance to ensure alignment of investment to strategy/architecture
Strong interpersonal and communication skills; proven ability to engage and influence technology and business stakeholders at most levels within an organization on complex technical and commercial concepts
Preferred:
Knowledge of and experience in current technologies including market leading cloud services and providers, data storage technologies including both traditional and emerging (e.g. Big Data), SaaS/PaaS/IaaS, Micro Services, Containers, RESTful API’s
Experience in formulating and executing commercial arrangements for products and/or services
Broad financial expertise with knowledge of corporate affairs, financial and economic fundamentals, and business policies, products, processes, systems and roles
Special Skills / Certification

Certifications:
AWS Certifications - AWS Certified Big Data - Specialty desired
The successful candidate will possess the following personal qualities:
Be creative, energetic and passionate, driven by the desire to achieve a world-class standard of performance and exceptional customer experience
Be an intelligent risk taker, someone who challenges the status quo, operates across boundaries and seeks win-win outcomes
Possess uncompromising ethics, unwavering integrity and the confidence and conviction to live and uphold the values of Citi
Be decisive and balanced in decision making; balancing strategic vs. tactical and risk vs. cost vs. speed to arrive at pragmatic and sustainable solutions
Span boundaries to draw into Citi the best possible insight, experience and technology capability from current and potential partner organizations
Be disciplined in execution; retaining tight governance over multiple dimensions of performance; ensuring commitments are understood and met

Title: Technology Support Associate - GUR
Description:
About this role
Business Unit Overview:
BlackRock’s Technology Enterprise services department is responsible for the Digital Workplace, Technology Infrastructure, Information Security, Enterprise Security, Real Estate, Data Operations Engineering, Process Automation and the Artificial Intelligence Labs. The Process automation center of excellence team is a newly formed, collaborative, multi-disciplinary team. We are bringing creative and innovative process automation solutions to the firm and growing rapidly. Our objective is to provide automation at scale and we have a “roll up our sleeves” attitude. We are in “start-up mode” and we often wear many hats to achieve our delivery goals.
Brief Role Descriptions:
The Process Automation team is looking to hire someone who can help us in the journey of Automation @ BlackRock. The primary role and responsibility is to administer backend infrastructure of various system & automation tools. These tools include but are limited to Windows, Unix, VMware, Data extractors, Java / Python, PowerShell scripts, SQL DB etc. The tools we currently support are Blue Prism RPA, Amelia: Cognitive Agent, Abbyy OCR. The role requires the ability to use sound problem-solving skills to determine the root cause of issues customers are facing and wherever required, follow-up with vendors to bring issues to logical conclusions. The role also requires the ability to stay current on the latest technology, work independently and take initiative and create and maintain internal documentation. To be successful in this role, you must have a customer first attitude and be able to build and maintain positive, collaborative working relationships with stake holders to drive customer, team and organizational goals and objectives.
Skills/Qualifications:
5-8 years of relevant experience in supporting Windows & Unix operating systems both virtual (VMware) and physical.
Proven understanding of Windows systems administration with a working knowledge of process management, network configuration (VLANs), shell scripting, logging, protocols like HTTPS, FTP, SCP, LDAP, etc.
Experience setting up and supporting automation tools that do Robotic Processing Automation, chat bots and Business Process Management, and OCR. Experience with Blue Prism & IPSoft Amelia will be added advantage.
Strong attention to detail and organization skills, with demonstrated ability to multi-task and prioritize across multiple projects and assignments. Must be able to deliver and meet timelines in a fast-paced follow-the-sun support model.
Strong data analysis and demonstrated problem-solving capabilities
Strong interpersonal skills with an ability to work well on a team and with external vendors, while at the same time being able to work independently with minimal supervision.
A student of technology that stays abreast of new and emerging tools that have the potential to positively transform our automation processes/tools.
Clear oral and written communicator, able to articulate and present technical information to both a technical and a non-technical audience.
About BlackRock
BlackRock helps investors build better financial futures. As a fiduciary to investors and a leading provider of financial technology, our clients turn to us for the solutions they need when planning for their most important goals. As of March 31, 2019, the firm managed approximately $6.52 trillion in assets on behalf of investors worldwide. For additional information on BlackRock, please visit @blackrock | Blog: www.linkedin.com/company/blackrock.
BlackRock is proud to be an Equal Opportunity and Affirmative Action Employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to race, color, national origin, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability, protected veteran status, and other statuses protected by law.
BlackRock will consider for employment qualified applicants with arrest or conviction records in a manner consistent with the requirements of the law, including any applicable fair chance law.

Title: Product UI UX Designer
Description:
Job Summary
Product UI/ UX Designer
**Apply only if Istanbul, Turkey as a job location is comfortable for you**
**Apply only if you have minimum 2 years of experience**
About Company:
The client's Growth Management Platform (GMP) helps digital marketers drive growth across the funnel, from Acquisition to Activation, Retention, and Revenue. Leveraging real-time predictive segmentation powered by deep Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning capabilities, GMP empowers marketers to deliver personalized journeys across web, mobile web, mobile apps, and ad channels. Built on a unified data layer, GMP is easy to implement and simple to use, avoiding the need for complex integrations and dependency on IT teams.
It simplifies the life of digital marketers and helps them drive growth for their brands, with zero marketing waste. The client is a Sequoia-backed technology company with offices in London, Singapore, Tokyo, Dubai, Moscow, Warsaw, Kuala Lumpur, Jakarta, Istanbul, Kiev, Sydney, Seoul, Ho Chi Minh City, Bangkok, Hong Kong and Taipei.
About Job
We’re looking for a Product Designer who will collaborate with our Product, Engineering and other cross-functional teams to come up with the best ideas and solutions at every stage of the product development lifecycle. You will plan and oversee product vision from a high level as well as execute designs at a detailed level for our suite of web and mobile products. You are expected to relocate to our Istanbul office in this position.
What you’ll do day in and day out
You’ll be involved in all stages of the design process including creation of design concepts, developing interactive prototypes, devising and conducting experiments, and delivering applications which create impact for hundreds of millions of users every day.
Solve our unique problems while keeping the end users first in your work.
Plan, set up, execute, and analyze usability tests.
Turn static wireframes and designs into interactive flows.
Collaborate with a cross-functional team and lead a productive ideation session with them.
Bring your own perspective to the table, you don’t always just tell people what they want to hear.
Thrive in a dynamic, fast-paced, autonomous and collaborative environment
We’d like to hear from you if:
You have a Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (Graphic Design, HCI, Visual Communication, UX Design, etc) or you have relevant agency or extensive UX and UI design experience.
You have at least 3 years experience designing responsive web apps, websites and design systems for a SasS or similar product.
You know showing is better than telling when it comes to UX.
You are familiar with Design systems, pattern libraries, Invision, Sketch, and Figma.
You’re familiar with HTML, CSS, and front-end frameworks that you can communicate with engineers.
You favor consistency, flexibility, and reuse.
You know your way around remote testing tools like usertesting.com as well as conducting in-person tests.
You have a curious mind. You never forget there are people at the other end of the screen using our products.
You’re a good listener and empathy is one of your favorite words.
You’re a natural born problem solver, finding solutions to complex problems motivate and excite you
What’s it like to work in our Product Design team?
As The Product Design Team, we are the champions of product thinking. We are the problem solvers. We are user advocates. We understand the business value behind every product decision. We are visionaries who see the bigger picture. We follow the human-centric approach to integrate the needs of people to create delightful experiences.
Join our world-class Product Design team where your actions create impact for hundreds of millions of users every day.
Did someone say perks? Yup
On-going educational sessions and training (including Sales, Digital Marketing, Customer Success, Entrepreneurship, School of Design, Google Analytics, culture presentations, tech talk sessions with famous and groundbreaking guests from software engineering field, dev talks where our developers share growth stories in their career path, ask questions, and get mentorship)
Free access to premium services like Udemy, Blinkist, Lynda, Masterclass and Spotify
4 Meals a day & snacks in between, you even get your 3 pm healthy snack delivered to your desk every day
No-dress code
Lots - and we mean lots - of coffee machines
Yoga classes
Great energy, caring team
Most importantly, if you show exemplary performance and if you live by the Insider culture and core values, you will have the opportunity to be a Shareholder of Insider after working for one year
If this sounds like a role tailor made for you then, forward us your updated profile with details like Current CTC, Expected CTC and Notice Period.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹1,000,000.00 to ₹2,400,000.00 /year
Experience:
UX: 1 year (Preferred)

Title: Javascript Engineer
Description:
About Us
Pefin is setting a new standard in the AI FinTech space and disrupting the way people and companies look at Financial Planning and Advice. Our platform uses proprietary artificial intelligence technology to offer the only truly fiduciary financial advice by using our neural networks to analyze over 2 million points per user, help them make the most important financial decisions effortlessly and confidently!
Pefin is more than a personal financial wellness tool; our data and technology platform is used as a fully branded product by global leaders in the Retirement Planning, RIA, Asset Management and Insurance arenas and our product offering is expanding. While we've received numerous awards and recognition — such as winning the South by Southwest (SXSW) People's Choice awards and being nominated as a Timmy Awards finalist for NYC's Best Tech Workplace for Diversity — it is our people, our culture, and our vision that makes Pefin the best place to work.
Who Pefin is looking for
Pefin is looking for a javascript engineer who will be building the next generation of financial advice tools. As the javascript engineer, you will be responsible for implementing a scalable React/Redux app architecture to deliver high quality, AI-powered financial advice to clients around the world. You must be comfortable with building apps from the ground up, from data management, routing, components, and styling/layouts, modern javascript and web technologies.
As the successful candidate, you will be a motivated self-starter and will be willing to take ownership of your work. You will need to be comfortable working in an onsite/offshore model that practices agile methodologies and be able to turn plans into reality with minimal oversight.
Preferred skills
Object Oriented and Functional Programming in ES6, Webpack, Babel, Redux, React.
Knowledge of various front-end architectures (MVC, MVVM, Component)
Knowledge of Web APIs (such as history, DOM, fetch, etc).
Knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, layout and styling techniques.
Knowledge of testing tools such as Mocha and Chai.
Knowledge of HTTP, REST and JSON.
Git, ESLint/Standard, Knowledge of node.JS


What You Will Be Doing
Collaborating with our onsite team to set up and maintain Webpack-based build infrastructure.
Implement React-Redux application rendering architecture with code-splitting.
Developing critical application features using React components, HTML5 and
CSS3.


What You Need for this Position
Bachelor's Degree Computer Science, Engineering or related field of study or equivalent related experience
3+ years experience in developing web applications using Javascript, HTML, CSS.

Title: Full Stack Developer
Description:
Responsibilities:
Design & Architect: Participate in the research, design and prototype phase of all next generation product features. Ability to switch gears, investigate new technologies especially in the areas of AR, iOT and AI technologies, design and develop rapidly to contribute to our product roadmap.
Code: Take on end to end feature development for the product, developing innovative features collaboratively with teams in India and USA, be part of product release cycle and be able to code in all aspects of the code base from UI, application stack to database.
Learn: Believe in staying at the top of the game and have an appetite for seeking improvement and sharing knowledge across the company.


Micro-services & APIs - Develop highly performance micro-services-based APIs which powers our critical product engine.
User Interfaces - Design and develop intuitive, responsive and efficient interfaces for our web and mobile applications.
Data - Develop and maintain our data layer which involves data integrations, analytics, dashboards and data related to the AI engine.
Testing - Build distributed testing tools to maintain the high-quality product.
Dev Ops - Build and maintain systems to manage product releases, collaborate with dev ops team to manage cloud environment and automate client configurations.


What You Would Have Done
B.Tech/M.Tech/M.Sc/MCA in Computer Science or related field.
Must have in-depth understanding of Primary Angular, Angular 4+, NodeJS and NPM Suite.
Extensive background in algorithms and experience in designing end to end applications. Expertise with frontend technologies like HTML/CSS/JavaScript.
Experience with full-lifecycle implementation of software projects: Starting from Initiation to full production.
Must be able to identify & implement application deployment automation; define continuous integration process as per best practices like Jenkins, Bamboo, and Docker.
Must have excellent understanding of typical multi-tier application architectures: web servers (Apache, nginx, PM2), caching, application servers, load balancing.

Experience in algorithm development, prototype system development and prototype software implementation on hardware platforms
Aid in the design, build and implementation of AI solutions for our proof of concepts and experiments, including working closely with external vendors to implement AI solutions
Provide expert peer review for new AI concepts, partners and vendors
Help shape and drive our AI strategic thinking and thought leadership
Build and develop our internal and external networks with AI experts, including AI vendors and academia
Promote AI across the organization
Educate our people in Artificial Intelligence related topics and broaden our Artificial Intelligence knowledge
Effective verbal/written communication along with strong interpersonal skills. Team player
This position is responsible for timely and accurate completion of other tasks as defined by the Manager.
Requirements
Bachelor of Science in Information Technology or equivalent with 10+ years of overall IT experience
2-5 years Artificial Intelligence work experience
Experience in designing, building or implementing Artificial Intelligence business solutions is essential
This role is all about delivering practical Artificial Intelligence pilots in a business environment and is less about developing the theory
2+ years of experience with Machine Learning, Statistical Models, and Natural Language Processing
Experience with Python, TensorFlow, Keras, StackStorm
Solid understanding of Data Structures, Algorithms & Object-Oriented design concepts
Excellent academic qualifications is essential with a strong preference for a post graduate qualification

Title: Technical Leader - BIQ & Analytics
Description:
About Us

AppDynamics is an application performance monitoring solution that uses machine learning and artificial intelligence (AI) to provide real-time visibility and insight into IT environments. With our unique AIOps solution, you can take the right action at exactly the right time with automated anomaly detection, rapid root-cause analysis, and a unified view of your entire application ecosystem, including private and public clouds. Using AppDynamics, you’ll finally align IT, DevOps, and the business around the information that helps you protect your bottom line and deliver flawless customer experiences at scale.

AppDynamics R&D Center in Bangalore is founded in 2015 and is focusing on leading core product and engineering areas fairly independently and works closely with San Francisco and other teams. Over last 3 years, we have grown to 200+ people and Bangalore R&D Center has evolved as a center of excellence for core product & engineering innovation in AppDynamics. We have been able to build a super strong team, that is working on very interesting and challenging problems. We have a amazing and happy work culture at Bangalore, where entire center works as one single team and truly cares for each other!
About You

You are the kind of engineer who is passionate about distributed platforms and services that scale to handle massive data volumes of requests and growing the team that builds them. You have a passion to solve complex data problems at scale and enable building various products on data infrastructure.
You also have the following:
10-15 years of strong product development experience in building a massively large scale distributed systems.
Strong understanding of Big Data eco-system and technology stack like Hadoop/Storm/Kafka/HBase/Redis/ElasticSearch etc.
Proficiency in a programming language such as Java
Strong foundation in data structures, algorithms and a strong understanding of threads, synchronization, concurrent programming
Ability to multi-task and re-prioritize responsibilities based on changing requirements
Ability to drive innovations in the platform around capabilities, scale, and performance to remain ahead of the curve
Superior organization, communication, interpersonal and leadership skills
Must be a proven performer and team player that enjoy challenging assignments in a high-energy, fast growing and start-up workplace
Agility and ability to adapt quickly to changing requirements and scope and priorities
Ability to collaborate effectively with cross functional teams to solve complex problems and building products spanning across multiple teams to deliver end-to- end products & features
Mentors/coaches engineers to facilitate their development and provide technical leadership to them
It is a huge plus if you have,
Deep Experience with Big Data Systems like Hadoop/Strom/Spark etc
Experience shipping multi-tenant platforms for both SaaS and on-premise deployments
Deep experience with infrastructure and systems engineering, and scaling services on cloud computing platforms like AWS
Understanding of various relevant Internet open source frameworks and
Experience in application performance management and log analytics space

About the Team/Role
This position is for Staff/Principal Engineer for our “Analytics Platform” Group at Bangalore. This team’s charter is to build Big Data Infrastructure and Platform to1) ingest, manage and process all events at AppDynamics in near real-time and 2) supporting analytical capabilities and interactive querying of events at a massive scale.AppDynamics Big Data Platform has been designed to scale to massive data volumes of order tens of TBs of data and 100s of billions of events in near real-time. Technology stack is based on BigData Stream processing, Kafka and NoSQL systems.The Staff/Principal Engineer is responsible for design, architecture and delivery for a large scale feature or component/product with highest quality. You serve as a thought leader in Big Data and Data infrastructure engineering and constantly innovate the platform to remain ahead of the curve. You collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver design/architecture end-to- end features. You provide technical direction to junior engineers and coach them in technical areas.Come join the Analytics team and build the world’s next great Application Intelligence Platform. The engineers in this team have a strong passion for solving complex data problems and building infinitely scalable and highly available platforms.
Perks

In addition to our global benefits, here are a few more reasons to get excited to come to work in the morning:
New state of the art office in convenient location with onsite parking, gym facility, and game rooms
Lunch daily, unlimited snacks, breakfast and fruits
Flexible working hours and work from home options
Workforce from tier 1 institutes
We prioritize corporate social responsibility and volunteering
We love to celebrate! We host quarterly parties, hackathons, and team outing
Just a note

Note to Recruiters and Placement Agencies: AppDynamics does not accept unsolicited agency resumes. Please do not forward unsolicited agency resumes to our website or to any AppDynamics employee. AppDynamics will not pay fees to any third party agency or firm and will not be responsible for any agency fees associated with unsolicited resumes. Unsolicited resumes received will be considered property of AppDynamics.

AppDynamics is an equal opportunity employer and considers all qualified applicants without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, disability, age, protected veteran status, or any other unlawful factor. AppDynamics complies with all applicable laws, including those regarding consideration of qualified applicants with criminal histories (such as the San Francisco Fair Chance Ordinance). If your disability makes it difficult for you to use this site, please contact talent@appdynamics.com. AppDynamics participates in E-Verify

Title: Senior Automation QA Engineer (Remote/Work-from-home)
Description:
WalletHub is one of the leading personal finance destinations in the US and rapidly growing. We’re looking for a motivated, hardworking, and competitive Senior Automation QA Engineer for a full-time, permanent position.
The expected work schedule is 7 AM to 7 PM EST Monday to Friday, including a 1h break.
Responsibilities
Testing and assuring high quality performance of website
Reporting and validating bugs for all components
Creating test plans and test cases
Creating and maintaining automated tests using Selenium and Java
Identifying opportunities for improvement and making constructive suggestions for change
Qualifications
You are the ideal candidate for this job if you have:
At least 3 years of hands-on experience in Test Automation with Java and Selenium
At least 4 years experience in Manual Testing
Excellent attention to details
Proven ability to meet deadlines and handle multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment
Willingness to work hard
Proficient in written/spoken English
Compensation
Very competitive salary based on prior experience and qualifications
Potential for stock options after the first year
Raise and advancement opportunities based on periodic evaluations
The ability to work overtime for added income
100% remote position
Visa sponsorship (after 24 months with the company, based on performance, in case you will be working from outside the US)
How to apply
To get our attention, all you need to do is apply on Indeed and include your updated resume as well as a brief message telling us why you are the right candidate.If we believe that you will be a good match, we'll contact you to arrange the next steps of the application process.
Please know that we appreciate your interest in our company but due to the high number of applications we are unable to get back to candidates who have not been selected to move forward.
Note
This position does not have a location requirement and can be performed remotely from outside the U.S. without the need for U.S. work authorization.
More about WalletHub
WalletHub is a high-growth fintech company based in Washington, D.C. that is looking for talented, hard-working individuals to help us reshape personal finance. More specifically, we are harnessing the power of data analytics and artificial intelligence to build the brain of a smart financial advisor, whose services we’re offering to everyone for free. The WalletHub brain enables users to make better financial decisions in a fraction of the time with three unique features:
1) Customized Credit-Improvement Tips: WalletHub identifies improvement opportunities and guides you through the necessary corrections.
2) Personalized Money-Saving Advice: WalletHub’s savings brain constantly scours the market for load-lightening opportunities, bringing you only the best deals.
3) Wallet Surveillance: Personal finance isn’t as scary with 24/7 credit monitoring providing backup, notifying you of important credit-report changes.
In addition to the valuable intelligence the brain provides, WalletHub is the first and only service to offer free credit scores and full credit reports that are updated on a daily basis absent of user interaction, rather than weekly or monthly and only when a user logs in. Some other services hang their hats on free credit scores and reports, yet they’re still inferior to what WalletHub considers minor pieces to a much larger puzzle.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹960,000.00 to ₹2,100,000.00 /year

Title: Java Full Stack Developer / Core Java / HTML / Java Script /...
Description:
Requisition ID: 218729
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.
#SAPSFSF
WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team (Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com, APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com, EMEA: Careers@sap.com).
Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.
