Title: Product Manager
Description:
Designation : Product Manager
Company: Sell.do
Total Experience : 4-6 years.
Relevant Product Experience : 2-4 years.
Job Location : Pune
About Sell.do:
Sell.Do is the new age martech company. We have a suite of Cloud-based sales and marketing automation products. By leveraging Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence, we help our customers market smarter & sell faster.
Our range of products cover complete sales and marketing cycle. The suite includes a CRM tool, sales automation, marketing automation, and advertising automation. Our products are being used by more than 500 businesses globally and have helped them take better and quicker decisions through intelligent processes and recommendations. The platforms have helped save millions of dollars in advertising money and drive over 10X sales growth for our customers.
Our vision is to create an intuitive & intelligent technology platform that will enable high-growth businesses, SMEs/SMBs to manage their entire customer lifecycle.
Role within the organisation:
We’re on the lookout for a Product Manager to spearhead our product roadmap and feature offerings. Our ideal candidate is someone who assumes ownership of product and works with all teams on timely releases and upgrades.
Responsibilities:
Conduct market research & Competitive Analysis
Develop and define product roadmaps and feature concepts
Drive product development with a team of world class engineers
Develop understanding of customers, technology and competition, to synthesize into product strategy
Define and analyze metrics for the success of the product
Support Marketing teams with creating customer facing and other marketing collaterals
Prepare product demos for internal and external customers.
Conversations with the end users to collect feedback, and incorporate feedback in the product
Coordinate with engineering, marketing, and business teams
Assist in the development of Sales enablement collateral
Skills:
Must-have experience in Marketing Technology Products
Bachelors in Computer Science; with an MBA from Top 10 B-Schools in India is preferable not a must
Ability to understand consumer behavior and requirements
Proven experience creating marketing plans encompassing strategy, customer research, competitive analysis, product requirements, messaging, pricing, etc.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills
Passion for gaining customer insights and translating insights into Product features
Familiarity with SaaS Products, CRMs, Sales & Marketing Automation Software
Critical thinking skills to ask great questions and keep the big picture in mind.
Ability to adapt to the ever changing business and technical landscape
Passion for user experience, design and experimentation
Have experience in at least one product lifecycle - from conceptualization to release
Why join Sell.do:
You are passionate about tech and automation products
You like to take ownership
You like working in a team with a strong feedback culture who push each other to improve
Analytics, User Engagement, Digital excites you

Title: Lead Javascript Engineer
Description:
About Us
Pefin is setting a new standard in the AI FinTech space and disrupting the way people and companies look at Financial Planning and Advice. Our platform uses proprietary artificial intelligence technology to offer the only truly fiduciary financial advice by using our neural networks to analyze over 2 million points per user, help them make the most important financial decisions effortlessly and confidently!
Pefin is more than a personal financial wellness tool; our data and technology platform is used as a fully branded product by global leaders in the Retirement Planning, RIA, Asset Management and Insurance arenas and our product offering is expanding. While we've received numerous awards and recognition — such as winning the South by Southwest (SXSW) People's Choice awards and being nominated as a Timmy Awards finalist for NYC's Best Tech Workplace for Diversity — it is our people, our culture, and our vision that makes Pefin the best place to work

Who Pefin is looking for
Pefin is looking for a javascript engineer who will be building the next generation of financial advice tools. As the lead javascript engineer, you will be responsible for implementing a scalable React/Redux app architecture to deliver high quality, AI-powered financial advice to clients around the world. You must be comfortable with building apps from the ground up, from data management, routing, components, and styling/layouts, modern javascript and web technologies, as well as be a mentor to your peers.

As the successful candidate, you will be a motivated self-starter and will be willing to take ownership of your work. You will need to be comfortable working in an onsite/offshore model that practices agile methodologies and be able to turn plans into reality with minimal oversight.

Preferred skills

Object Oriented and Functional Programming in ES6, Webpack, Babel, Redux, React.
Knowledge of various front-end architectures (MVC, MVVM, Component)
Knowledge of Web APIs (such as history, DOM, fetch, etc).
Knowledge of HTML5, CSS3, layout and styling techniques.
Knowledge of testing tools such as Mocha and Chai.
Knowledge of HTTP, REST and JSON.
Git, ESLint/Standard, Knowledge of node.JS

What You Will Be Doing

Collaborating with our onsite team to set up and maintain Webpack-based build infrastructure.
Implement React-Redux application rendering architecture with code-splitting.
Developing critical application features using React components, HTML5 and CSS3.
Help mentor Javascript developers to promote best practices amongst the team.
What You Need for this Position
Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science, Engineering or related field of study.
5+ years experience in developing web applications using Javascript, HTML, CSS.

Title: Mgr Software Engineering
Description:
A bit about Epsilon

We are the global leader in creating meaningful connections between people and brands. We work with 15 of the top 20 global brands and 8 of the top 10 Fortune 500 companies. How did we get this far? It is because of our team of thinkers and doers who together are the perfect blend of data, technology and creativity. They are fearless go-getters and creative innovators who have passion, determination and our support to make their ideas come to life.
To know more about us, please visit https://india.epsilon.com and follow us on Facebook, Twitter, LinkedIn, and Instagram.

Who we are looking for
At Epsilon, we deliver excellence and create connections that last a lifetime. Our digital marketing arm, Conversant, is now growing and we are on the lookout for talented individuals who believe that every interaction counts - and want to make an impact on the future of our clients’ businesses.
So, are you someone who wants to work on the cutting edge of new-generation UI technology? Does the thought of working with Data Warehouse, Machine Learning, and Artificial Intelligence excite you? Then you could be exactly who we’re looking for.
Apply today and be part of a dynamic, enthusiastic and passionate team who want nothing more but to make a lasting impact on the lives of consumers. You will also get the opportunity to see your ideas come to life on almost every consumer device across the US.
What you’ll do
We are looking for a Manager for Data Solutions Engineering to engage with the larger Conversant Engineering Data Warehousing teams. This role will be hands on in code development to drive solutions to delivery by effectively engaging with team members across the globe. The person in this role will need to be able to work independently to meet required specifications of solution delivery where the output work product will be incorporated into production environments managing all data processing within Conversant. Expertise required in complex ETL, data aggregations, data modelling, business intelligence and API development.

You will design and code solutions on and off database for ensuring application access to enable data driven decision making for the company’s multi-faceted ad serving operations.
Working closely with Engineering resources across the globe to ensure enterprise data warehouse solutions and assets are actionable, accessible and evolving in lockstep with the needs of the ever-changing business model.
Should be able to develop test cases and validation methodology to demonstrate work product meets required needs
Ideal candidate can lead in the areas of: solution design, code development, quality assurance, data modeling, business intelligence, cross team communication, project management, and application maintenance.

What you’ll do

Bachelor’s Degree in Computer Science or equivalent degree is required.
10+ years of business analysis experience around database marketing technologies and data management, and technical understanding in these areas.
Strong experience in SQL
Experience with PostgreSQL, pgplsql and python
Strong understanding of Disaster Recovery and Business Continuity solutions
Experience with scheduling applications with complex interdependencies
Good experience in working with geographically and culturally diverse teams
Familiarity with complex data lake environments that span OLTP, MPP and Hadoop platforms
Excellent written and verbal communication skills.
Ability to handle complex products
Excellent Analytical and problem solving skills

Ability to diagnose and troubleshoot problems quickly

Title: Internship (6months)

Tosh Innovations is looking for tech-savvy interns for its various technology brands (Blockchain Council, Global Tech Council, Toshblocks, YouTube Channels etc.). Title: Senior Automation QA Engineer (Remote/Work-from-home)
Description:
WalletHub is one of the leading personal finance destinations in the US and rapidly growing. We’re looking for a motivated, hardworking, and competitive Senior Automation QA Engineer for a full-time, permanent position.
The expected work schedule is 7 AM to 7 PM EST Monday to Friday, including a 1h break.
Responsibilities
Testing and assuring high quality performance of website
Reporting and validating bugs for all components
Creating test plans and test cases
Creating and maintaining automated tests using Selenium and Java
Identifying opportunities for improvement and making constructive suggestions for change
Qualifications
You are the ideal candidate for this job if you have:
At least 3 years of hands-on experience in Test Automation with Java and Selenium
At least 4 years experience in Manual Testing
Excellent attention to details
Proven ability to meet deadlines and handle multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment
Willingness to work hard
Proficient in written/spoken English
Compensation
Very competitive salary based on prior experience and qualifications
Potential for stock options after the first year
Raise and advancement opportunities based on periodic evaluations
The ability to work overtime for added income
100% remote position
Visa sponsorship (after 24 months with the company, based on performance, in case you will be working from outside the US)
How to apply
To get our attention, all you need to do is apply on Indeed and include your updated resume as well as a brief message telling us why you are the right candidate.If we believe that you will be a good match, we'll contact you to arrange the next steps of the application process.
Please know that we appreciate your interest in our company but due to the high number of applications we are unable to get back to candidates who have not been selected to move forward.
Note
This position does not have a location requirement and can be performed remotely from outside the U.S. without the need for U.S. work authorization.
More about WalletHub
WalletHub is a high-growth fintech company based in Washington, D.C. that is looking for talented, hard-working individuals to help us reshape personal finance. More specifically, we are harnessing the power of data analytics and artificial intelligence to build the brain of a smart financial advisor, whose services we’re offering to everyone for free. The WalletHub brain enables users to make better financial decisions in a fraction of the time with three unique features:
1) Customized Credit-Improvement Tips: WalletHub identifies improvement opportunities and guides you through the necessary corrections.
2) Personalized Money-Saving Advice: WalletHub’s savings brain constantly scours the market for load-lightening opportunities, bringing you only the best deals.
3) Wallet Surveillance: Personal finance isn’t as scary with 24/7 credit monitoring providing backup, notifying you of important credit-report changes.
In addition to the valuable intelligence the brain provides, WalletHub is the first and only service to offer free credit scores and full credit reports that are updated on a daily basis absent of user interaction, rather than weekly or monthly and only when a user logs in. Some other services hang their hats on free credit scores and reports, yet they’re still inferior to what WalletHub considers minor pieces to a much larger puzzle.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹960,000.00 to ₹2,100,000.00 /year

Title: Java Full Stack Developer / Core Java / HTML / Java Script /...
Description:
Requisition ID: 218026
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.
#SAPSFSF

WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team (Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com, APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com, EMEA: Careers@sap.com).

Title: Software-Senior Engineer(CPQ Architect)
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Join us on this exciting journey, and together, we’ll reimagine the future.
Role with us
CPQ Technical Architect will work with business stakeholders and ITS colleagues in the implementation and support of Cloudsense CPQ at Telstra. This position offers diversity in projects, an opportunity to work in a team environment with autonomy and a high-level of responsibility. There are also excellent opportunities for professional growth and advancement within Telstra Customer Platforms and broader Telstra systems.
CPQ Technical Architect is responsible for leading technical CPQ low level architecture activities for Telstra across requirement analysis, design, development and implementation on Telstra’s key CRM platforms. They will be responsible for developing and coordinating technical delivery aspects of all Telstra’s CRM systems implementations, communicating effectively and fostering strong relationships with business users and stakeholders.
The purpose of the role is to take responsibility for ensuring all requests from the business are developed and delivered in the most optimal way taking into consideration business roadmaps, ITS CRM Strategy, industry best practice, vendor roadmaps and thought leadership and innovation delivering a competitive advantage to Telstra.
He will participate in and/or be responsible for technical analysis of functional designs, preparation of technical designs, technical build & implementation of CRM, CRM configuration and scripting, quality & code reviews, facilitating testing, resolution of defects identified during test, managing relationships between support and development team, mentoring and training
Key Accountabilities
Salesforce Technical Architect role is to plan, coordinate, and execute all activities related to the requirements interpretation, design and implementation of CPQ, CLM applications. This individual will apply proven industry and technology experience as well as communication skills, problem-solving skills, and knowledge of best practices to issues related to design, development, and deployment of mission-critical CRM systems with a focus on quality application development and delivery.
This role is key to the success of the Customer Platforms function at Telstra and will be responsible and accountable for the following:
Ability to design and develop Salesforce CRM, Cloudsense CPQ & Force.com Applications
Ability to review vendor designs and recommended solutions based on industry best practises
Ability to provide technical governance across Cloudsense CPQ solutions at Telstra
Assess and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the Salesforce application solutions to ensure user requirements and business objectives are met in a timely and cost effective manner
Understand overall business operations and develops innovative solutions to help improve productivity
Ability to understand and design provisioning solutions at Telstra and how CRM interacts with provisioning layers.
Strong problem solving and analytical skills needed to support enterprise high availability Salesforce applications
Coordinate with technical resource within and outside of Customer Platforms team.
Monitor process of software configuration/development/testing to assure quality deliverable.
Ensure standards of QA are being met
Review deliverables to verify that they meet client and contract expectations; Implement and enforce high standards for quality deliverables
Analyses performance and capacity issues of the highest complexity with Salesforce application.
Demonstrate thought Leadership in Cloudsense CPQ innovations and practices.
Assists leadership with development and management of new application capabilities to improve productivity
Provide training and educate other team members around core capabilities and helps them deliver high quality solutions and deliverables/documentation
Self-Motivator to perform Design / Develop user requirements, test and deploy the changes into production
Skill & Experience : 12 + yrs
SFDC, APEX, Conga, Appttus, Cloudsense
Technical Descriptors
Salesforce – Service Cloud, Sales Cloud, Force. Com platform
Salesforce Certified Developer / Advanced Developer / Technical Architect is essential
Experience in building applications on force.com platform with extensive hands-on and subject matter expertise in Salesforce technology including
Full cycle implementation experience with SFDC (application design, architecture and development using Salesforce.com)
Strong SFDC knowledge and Integration components for SFDC (SFDC APIs, Apex controllers, Apex Web Services, Apex callout, outbound messaging, SFDC data loaders, etc.)
Command over APEX and Visual force
Hands on experience in building salesforce apex classes, test classes and deployment process.
Deep knowledge of Salesforce API’s and hands on experience in building custom API’s and integration.
Working knowledge of web frameworks – HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JSON, Ajax
working knowledge of all Atlassian tools a bonus
Expertise in developing CPQ capability using Cloudsense.
Proven experience of working with Telco Clients to configure products, Baskets, Order Orchestration and Technical Enrichment.
Certifications in Appttus and Conga would be essential.
Expertise in developing Contract management solution integrating into CPQ using Conga or Appttus
Proven experience with creation of relevant documentation including, but not limited to Apttus CPQ solution design document and requirements documentation
Experience with migration of CPQ across environments including experience with the Apttus migration tool
Knowledge of the fundamental capabilities of Apttus CPQ including but not limited to:
Quoting and Quote Templates
Approvals (Deal Manager/IWA preferred)
X- Author
Fundamental understanding of Apttus CLM capabilities, Apttus CLM 201 certification a plus
Experience with Apttus Advanced Workflow Approvals
Experience with X-Author for Excel and Contracts
Experience with Apttus Wizard
Familiar with Apttus admin settings, Apttus custom settings and DocuSign settings.
Knowledge of Apttus development

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Hyderabad, Telangana, India
Full-time
Company Description
My Ally is a cutting-edge B2B SaaS company focused on implementing Artificial Intelligence to reinvent recruiting.
We’re disruptive, work hard but try not to take ourselves too seriously. We are highly adaptable and constantly evolving. We are passionate about our product and live for our customers. A career at My Ally means challenging yourself to always be better.
Job Description
We are looking for a qualified Senior Data Scientist to join our team. You will work with upper management to define software requirements and take the lead on operational and technical projects. In this role, you should be able to work independently with little supervision. You should have excellent organization and problem-solving skills. If you also have hands-on experience in software development and agile methodologies, we’d like to meet you. Your goal will be to develop high quality software that is aligned with user needs and business goals.
Responsibilities
Serve as a lead data scientist leading and support various analytical initiatives
Research and prototype new machine learning techniques to enhance our ability to process conversational data (email, text, etc)
Work with domain experts, engineers, and other data scientists to develop, implement, and improve analytical models and use cases
Define architecture, best practices and coding standards for the development team
Provides expertise in all phases of the development lifecycle from concept and design to testing
Qualifications
Graduate/Post-Graduate/M.S./Ph.D in Computer Science/Mathematics/Machine Learning/NLP or allied fields
Industry experience of 5-10 years
Hands on experience solving language-related problems using statistical methods on vast quantities of unstructured and structured data.
Strong background in Natural Language Understanding and Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence
Experience with Python, Java, Regex, Sklearn
Experience with web development including but not limited to: Flask and/or Django

Title: Senior Full Stack Developer
Description:
About TapClicks
TapClicks is a leader in Marketing Reporting, Operations and Search Engine Optimization SaaS solutions for Enterprises, Agencies and Media companies. It has been recognized as #1 fastest growing company in Silicon Valley by Inc 500; the Best Technology Product or Service by MITX and #163 by Deloitte's 2018 Technology Fast 500. TapClicks is the only end-to-end marketing operations platform that allows companies to streamline their marketing operations, manage and optimize campaigns and report progress from any device at any time. TapClicks uses cutting edge technology (big data analytics, Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning) to continuously deliver innovative solutions to our customers. TapClicks Marketing operations platform is widely used by over 400,000 end customers globally.
RavenTools, part of the TapClicks suite of solutions, is the best SEO SaaS tool-set for Agencies, In-house Marketers, Freelancers and Media companies. RavenTools is a G2Crowd leader in the SEO Tools category. It offers 6 amazing tools in one Software toolbox- including Site Audits, Keyword & Competitor Research, Backlink Analysis & LinkSpy, Rank Tracking, Comprehensive SEO Data, and PPC/Social/Email/Call Tracking Reporting. It enables users to grow their business, create beautiful reports quickly and elevate client and executive satisfaction. RavenTools is also a leading Self-service SaaS toolset, empowering customer adoption and value with minimal friction.
Currently, TapClicks's SEO solution is marketed under the RavenTools brand. TapClicks also plans to leverage the RavenTools brand to introduce new Self-serve solutions in other areas of digitla marketing.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES:
Developers are empowered to work closely with product and customer facing teams to release features
that best suit the customer needs.
Aspiring candidate will get a chance to work on challenging problems, the very best in UX and a wide
range of third party APIs to integrate across products.
Development involves not just design and development but also constant enhancements of features that
are released. Code review, unit tests and performance monitoring play a pivotal role during development
to ensure high quality deliverables.
Also, role involves
Build new features into the application and own their further development
Designing features that can scale
Build tools to streamline development processes
. Work within the product team to suggest new features and enhancements
code quality via code reviews, unit testingEnsuring5.
Performance monitoring
JOB REQUIREMENTS:
B.E/B.Tech/MCA full time graduates with 4-7 year web development experience in a product based company
Expertise in any web stack is welcome
Willing to work on PHP 7.2, Slim framework, AngularJS 1.5 and MySQL
Ability to take architectural level decisions
Be motivated to build amazing products that meaningfully impact users
Good analytical and communication skills
Other:
Interested candidates must apply directly with a resume explaining how their background exceeds the
basic qualification required for this role.

Title: Embedded Systems & Software Development Internship
Description:
About the company:
mBreath, is a smart home healthcare company focused on providing wireless sleep tracking device with in-depth analytics using IoT, big data analysis, cloud computing, artificial intelligence and machine learning for home healthcare monitoring. These parameters will be used to provide extended health analytics on changes in sleeping pattern, respiration rate, and heart rate. We have developed proprietary algorithms and device to measure wirelessly different bodily factor such as respiration rate, heart rate, and body movement, even without touching the body. These parameters are being used to provide in-depth analytics on the sleep and overall health of the person. This is a revolutionary device which can monitor, diagnosis, and control diseases related to the sleep, pulmonology, and cardiology.
Selected intern's day-to-day responsibilities include: 1. Work on wireless protocols such as Bluetooth low energy, ANT, and Wi-Fi 2. Develop digital signal processing algorithms for audio and sensor data 3. Develop IoT and embedded systems 4. Work on Raspberry Pi and Python 5. Work on RTOS, FreeRTOS, TI-RTOS and DSP processor 6. Work on Qualcomm's Snapdragon processor
Who can apply:
Only those students or freshers can apply who:
are available for full time (in-office) internship
have relevant skills and interests
can start the internship between 5th Jul'19 and 4th Aug'19
are available for duration of 6 months
have already graduated or are currently in any year of study
Females willing to start/restart their career may also apply
Number of internships/jobs available: 2
Categories: Embedded Systems,Software Development,Electronics,Engineering,Computer Science,Internet of Things (IoT)

Title: AI Product Manager - Global AI Accelerator India
Description:
Date: Jun 28, 2019
Ericsson Overview:
Ericsson is world’s leading provider of communications technology and services. Our offerings include services, consulting, software and infrastructure within Information and Communications Technology.
Using innovation to empower people, business and society, Ericsson is working towards the Networked Society: a world connected in real time that will open-up opportunities to create freedom, transform society and drive solutions to some of our planet’s greatest challenges.
We are truly a global company, operating across borders in over 180 countries, offering a diverse, performance-driven culture and an innovative and engaging environment. As an Ericsson employee, you will have freedom to think big and the support to turn ideas into achievements. Continuous learning and growth opportunities allow you to acquire the knowledge and skills necessary to progress and reach your career goals. We invite you to join our team.
Exciting Opportunity:
It will be practically impossible for human brains to understand how to run and optimize next generation of wireless networks, i.e., 5G network with distributed edge compute, that will drive economic and social transformation for all aspects of society. Machine Learning (ML) and other Artificial Intelligence (AI) technologies will be vital for us to handle this opportunity. We are setting up a Global AI Accelerator (GAIA) in the US, Sweden and India, with 300 experts, to fast-track our strategy execution.
Machine Intelligence, the combination of Machine Learning and other Artificial Intelligence technologies is what Ericsson uses to drive thought leadership to automate and transform Ericsson offerings and operations. MI is also a key competence for to enable new and emerging business. This includes development of models, frameworks and infrastructure where we in our advancements push the technology frontiers. We engage in both academic and industry collaborations and drive the digitalization of Ericsson and the Industry by developing state of the art solutions that simplify and automate processes in our products and services and build new value through data insights.
Ericsson is now looking for AI Product Manager to significantly expand its global team for AI acceleration in Bangalore/Chennai, India.

Role And Responsibilities

Develop following deliverables in Collaboration with Ericsson Business Lines, and Global AI Accelerator (GAIA) team of Data Scientists and Data Engineers:

Translating business problem (with relevant business metrics) into data science problem
Detailed end-to-end solution requirements, including for data access and comprehension (in compliance with Regulatory and Contractual obligations)
Detailed requirements for necessary tooling and instrumentation of the target deployment/production environment – for complete life-cycle management
Strategic asset creation from these engagements to bootstrap a self-service AI/ML platform – for design, development and life cycle management

Minimum Required Skills
Solid understanding of generations of RAN, EPC and SGi-LAN, as per 3GPP Specification. Additionally, an understanding of OSS/BSS systems in telecom domain would be ideal.
Carrier grade solution design, field engineering, and network management experience in Service Provider settings.
Understanding of use cases based on machine learning and deep learning – to drive business/operations benefits – would be ideal
Desired Skills
Network planning and operations expertise at Tier-1 Telecom Service provider, Telecom vendor or System integrators
Exposure to cloud-native architectures and their usage in Telecom Networks
Machine Learning and Deep Learning to telecom domain in general and operators in particular, including life cycle management considerations

Educational Requirements

M.E./M.Tech. in CS/EE or MBA + 5 years (or) B.E./B.Tech. + 10 years of Tier-1 service provider domain experience needed

Location: Bangalore / Chennai

Ericsson provides equal employment opportunities (EEO) to all employees and applicants for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, marital status, pregnancy, parental status, national origin, ethnic background, age, disability, political opinion, social status, veteran status, union membership or genetics.
Ericsson complies with applicable country, state and all local laws governing nondiscrimination in employment in every location across the world in which the company has facilities. In addition, Ericsson supports the UN Guiding Principles for Business and Human Rights and the United Nations Global Compact.
This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, training and development.
Ericsson expressly prohibits any form of workplace harassment based on race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, marital status, pregnancy, parental status, national origin, ethnic background, age, disability, political opinion, social status, veteran status, union membership or genetic information.

Title: Full stack developer
Description:
Nokia IoT & Analytics Business unit (part of Nokia Enterprise business group) is looking for Senior Java Developers for IOT product development. Nokia IoT R&D caters for emerging opportunities in Internet of Things (IoT) ecosystem. As digital transformation and automation continues to accelerate, this group is at the center of emerging technologies and product development.

You will have opportunities to be part of the core R&D and work in the areas of IoT Applications, Asset Intelligence, Video Analytics, Anomaly Detection, Machine Learning, Deep Learning, Cloud/SaaS deployment along with significant artificial intelligence implementation. You will work all the way from requirements through the delivery of the product including building prototype for practical problems by leveraging the latest tools

We plan to build our team to cater to the new opportunities and requirements for the IOT market. This important position is for an individual contributor in our R&D team in Bangalore.

Title: Software Engineer
Description:
We're looking for an amazing technologist to be the Architect in our SBSEG organization, expanding our global footprint and transforming the QuickBooks product to a highly scalable, performant and delightful product for customers. QuickBooks is world's No. 1 Cloud Accounting solution serving millions of small & medium businesses worldwide. We are looking for a talented and bright Architect to help us accelerate our growth worldwide. Imagine working on a code that's going through a major refactoring with 2.5+ million paid users, serving 160+ countries worldwide in multiple languages. The target Architecture is microservices in AWS and Java based back end platform and ReactJS, GraphQL and Relay/Redux technologies for the front end. We take page load times extremely seriously, take pride in designing picture perfect pixels, and build functionality with mobile and global first mindset. You will be working in startup mode mentality and everyday will greet you with interesting challenges. You job is to ensure we maintain our Architecture goals working out of our India Bangalore team and collaborating with other Architects worldwide.


You will need to be hands-on technical leader, rubbing shoulders with engineers, connecting the business and technology, work closely with customers, product managers, coach Staff and senior engineers in the team. If you want to be part of something big and special, it's the job for you. There has never been a better time to be an Architect within Intuit's Small Business & Self-Employed Group. Come join us and be a part of this exciting journey and write history.


Responsibilities:
Work in a startup group within in Intuit that's powering mid sized companies grow and scale their businesses in the cloud.
Build and deploy features quickly at scale and do work that will impact the financial lives of millions of small businesses across the globe, tapping into a new segment of business for Intuit.
Work with multiple teams across the globe across horizontal features within the small business ecosystem.
Build highly performant services and systems that scale with millions of transactions for mid sized companies. Through machine learning and artificial intelligence, unlock the power of our data sets and harness our ecosystem to bring the power of many for the prosperity of one.
Drive the adoption of a hybrid cloud model.


Requirements:
Hands on experience with designing and building web scale SaaS products that serves millions of users globally with varying business and compliance regulations.
Expertise around full stack technologies.
Leadership to define architectural strategies, standards and practices to enable integrations of the platform within Intuit and outside with third party developers.
Passion for being hands on techie, with Devops mindset.
Deep customer empathy and ability to quickly translate learnings into solid, scalable architecture w/ a mobile first approach.
Deep knowledge around building Global products.
Innovative & entrepreneurial approach to building products that make a profound difference in customer's life.
Ability to lead the highest of profile projects & products, directly impacting the future growth of Intuit.
Ability to lead & influence technical & non-technical audiences across organizational ladder, product lines and geographies.
5+ years' experience developing software with extensive knowledge and experience building SaaS based applications on AWS & hybrid cloud environments.
Experience having driven programs as an application Architect involving various Web and/or Mobile and cloud technologies.
Experience of designing and developing applications in cloud environments like AWS.
Experience in SOA and microservice based architecture approaches.
Experience in breaking up large monolithic applications into collections of smaller independent services for simplifying development will be a big plus.
Strong experience with a modern front-end SPA framework (React.js, Angular, Ember, etc.), OR modern Java/J2EE technologies.
A strong viewpoint and/or experience with global. mobile, social product mindset.
Experience developing, maintaining, and innovating large scale, consumer facing web or mobile applications.
Solid communication skills: Demonstrated ability to explain complex.

Title: SoC Integration Specialist/Lead-Hyderabad
Description:
Location
India - Hyderabad

Job Overview
Work on SoC design for Qualcomm Snapdragon Mobile Platforms. These System on Chips (SoCs) support premium mobile experiences built on 5G with on-device artificial intelligence (AI) and extended reality (XR). Our SoCs are smart, powerful, and power-efficient. They have new architectures designed to deliver worldwide connectivity, unimaginable performance, exceptionally powerful AI, future-forward photography, and breakthrough immersive entertainment. As a part of Qualcomms SoC design organization you will be collaborating with global teams to produce cutting edge designs in the latest SoC fabrication processes.
Develop micro-architecture and RTL implementation for SoCs .Responsible for block level/ full chip integration and design.

RTL (Verilog)
Formal Verification
Clock Domain Crossing
Lint Require knowledge of:
Static Timing Analysis
Synthesis
Ultra low power design (Power domain crossings).
ARM Advanced Microcontroller Bus Architecture (AMBA)
Should be a team player with good communication skills.


Education Requirements
Required: Bachelor's, Computer Engineering and/or Electrical Engineering
Preferred: Master's, Computer Engineering and/or Electrical Engineering

Title: Software Engineer I, Compliance Risk and Diligence
Description:
Our professionals balance analytical skills, deep market insight and independence to deliver solid, defensible analysis and practical advice to our clients. As an organization, we think globally. We create transparency in an opaque world, and we encourage our people to do the same. That means when you take your place on our team, you’ll discover a supportive and collaborative work environment that empowers you to excel. If you’re ready to share your perspective with the world, then you can make a real impact here. This is the Duff & Phelps difference.

Duff & Phelps is looking for software engineers to help us expand our cutting-edge research systems. Our software combines artificial intelligence, big data collection, and modern cloud computing technology to help our clients more easily identify risks in their business relationships.


At Duff & Phelps, your work will help protect, restore and maximize value for our clients. Join us and together we’ll maximize the value of your career.

At least 3 years of experience with Microsoft SQL Server and Entity Framework
Demonstrate ability to understand and implement complex middleware business logic
Demonstrate basic knowledge of .NET Core

Excellent communication skills in written and oral English

Desired Skills:

Experience with OAuth2 and OpenID Connect

Experience with Linux shell scripting
Experience with continuous integration and continuous delivery tools

Experience with big data systems like Hadoop and Spark

Title: Java Full Stack Developer / Core Java / HTML / Java Script /...
Description:
Requisition ID: 218026
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.
#SAPSFSF

WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team (Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com, APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com, EMEA: Careers@sap.com).
Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.
Additional Locations:

Title: Senior Automation QA Engineer (Remote/Work-from-home)
Description:
WalletHub is one of the leading personal finance destinations in the US and rapidly growing. We’re looking for a motivated, hardworking, and competitive Senior Automation QA Engineer for a full-time, permanent position.
The expected work schedule is 7 AM to 7 PM EST Monday to Friday, including a 1h break.
Responsibilities
Testing and assuring high quality performance of website
Reporting and validating bugs for all components
Creating test plans and test cases
Creating and maintaining automated tests using Selenium and Java
Identifying opportunities for improvement and making constructive suggestions for change
Qualifications
You are the ideal candidate for this job if you have:
At least 3 years of hands-on experience in Test Automation with Java and Selenium
At least 4 years experience in Manual Testing
Excellent attention to details
Proven ability to meet deadlines and handle multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment
Willingness to work hard
Proficient in written/spoken English
Compensation
Very competitive salary based on prior experience and qualifications
Potential for stock options after the first year
Raise and advancement opportunities based on periodic evaluations
The ability to work overtime for added income
100% remote position
Visa sponsorship (after 24 months with the company, based on performance, in case you will be working from outside the US)
How to apply
To get our attention, all you need to do is apply on Indeed and include your updated resume as well as a brief message telling us why you are the right candidate.If we believe that you will be a good match, we'll contact you to arrange the next steps of the application process.
Please know that we appreciate your interest in our company but due to the high number of applications we are unable to get back to candidates who have not been selected to move forward.
Note
This position does not have a location requirement and can be performed remotely from outside the U.S. without the need for U.S. work authorization.
More about WalletHub
WalletHub is a high-growth fintech company based in Washington, D.C. that is looking for talented, hard-working individuals to help us reshape personal finance. More specifically, we are harnessing the power of data analytics and artificial intelligence to build the brain of a smart financial advisor, whose services we’re offering to everyone for free. The WalletHub brain enables users to make better financial decisions in a fraction of the time with three unique features:
1) Customized Credit-Improvement Tips: WalletHub identifies improvement opportunities and guides you through the necessary corrections.
2) Personalized Money-Saving Advice: WalletHub’s savings brain constantly scours the market for load-lightening opportunities, bringing you only the best deals.
3) Wallet Surveillance: Personal finance isn’t as scary with 24/7 credit monitoring providing backup, notifying you of important credit-report changes.
In addition to the valuable intelligence the brain provides, WalletHub is the first and only service to offer free credit scores and full credit reports that are updated on a daily basis absent of user interaction, rather than weekly or monthly and only when a user logs in. Some other services hang their hats on free credit scores and reports, yet they’re still inferior to what WalletHub considers minor pieces to a much larger puzzle.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹960,000.00 to ₹2,100,000.00 /year

Title: Software-Senior Engineer(CPQ Architect)
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Join us on this exciting journey, and together, we’ll reimagine the future.
Role with us
CPQ Technical Architect will work with business stakeholders and ITS colleagues in the implementation and support of Cloudsense CPQ at Telstra. This position offers diversity in projects, an opportunity to work in a team environment with autonomy and a high-level of responsibility. There are also excellent opportunities for professional growth and advancement within Telstra Customer Platforms and broader Telstra systems.
CPQ Technical Architect is responsible for leading technical CPQ low level architecture activities for Telstra across requirement analysis, design, development and implementation on Telstra’s key CRM platforms. They will be responsible for developing and coordinating technical delivery aspects of all Telstra’s CRM systems implementations, communicating effectively and fostering strong relationships with business users and stakeholders.
The purpose of the role is to take responsibility for ensuring all requests from the business are developed and delivered in the most optimal way taking into consideration business roadmaps, ITS CRM Strategy, industry best practice, vendor roadmaps and thought leadership and innovation delivering a competitive advantage to Telstra.
He will participate in and/or be responsible for technical analysis of functional designs, preparation of technical designs, technical build & implementation of CRM, CRM configuration and scripting, quality & code reviews, facilitating testing, resolution of defects identified during test, managing relationships between support and development team, mentoring and training
Key Accountabilities
Salesforce Technical Architect role is to plan, coordinate, and execute all activities related to the requirements interpretation, design and implementation of CPQ, CLM applications. This individual will apply proven industry and technology experience as well as communication skills, problem-solving skills, and knowledge of best practices to issues related to design, development, and deployment of mission-critical CRM systems with a focus on quality application development and delivery.
This role is key to the success of the Customer Platforms function at Telstra and will be responsible and accountable for the following:
Ability to design and develop Salesforce CRM, Cloudsense CPQ & Force.com Applications
Ability to review vendor designs and recommended solutions based on industry best practises
Ability to provide technical governance across Cloudsense CPQ solutions at Telstra
Assess and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the Salesforce application solutions to ensure user requirements and business objectives are met in a timely and cost effective manner
Understand overall business operations and develops innovative solutions to help improve productivity
Ability to understand and design provisioning solutions at Telstra and how CRM interacts with provisioning layers.
Strong problem solving and analytical skills needed to support enterprise high availability Salesforce applications
Coordinate with technical resource within and outside of Customer Platforms team.
Monitor process of software configuration/development/testing to assure quality deliverable.
Ensure standards of QA are being met
Review deliverables to verify that they meet client and contract expectations; Implement and enforce high standards for quality deliverables
Analyses performance and capacity issues of the highest complexity with Salesforce application.
Demonstrate thought Leadership in Cloudsense CPQ innovations and practices.
Assists leadership with development and management of new application capabilities to improve productivity
Provide training and educate other team members around core capabilities and helps them deliver high quality solutions and deliverables/documentation
Self-Motivator to perform Design / Develop user requirements, test and deploy the changes into production
Skill & Experience : 12 + yrs
SFDC, APEX, Conga, Appttus, Cloudsense
Technical Descriptors
Salesforce – Service Cloud, Sales Cloud, Force. Com platform
Salesforce Certified Developer / Advanced Developer / Technical Architect is essential
Experience in building applications on force.com platform with extensive hands-on and subject matter expertise in Salesforce technology including
Full cycle implementation experience with SFDC (application design, architecture and development using Salesforce.com)
Strong SFDC knowledge and Integration components for SFDC (SFDC APIs, Apex controllers, Apex Web Services, Apex callout, outbound messaging, SFDC data loaders, etc.)
Command over APEX and Visual force
Hands on experience in building salesforce apex classes, test classes and deployment process.
Deep knowledge of Salesforce API’s and hands on experience in building custom API’s and integration.
Working knowledge of web frameworks – HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JSON, Ajax
working knowledge of all Atlassian tools a bonus
Expertise in developing CPQ capability using Cloudsense.
Proven experience of working with Telco Clients to configure products, Baskets, Order Orchestration and Technical Enrichment.
Certifications in Appttus and Conga would be essential.
Expertise in developing Contract management solution integrating into CPQ using Conga or Appttus
Proven experience with creation of relevant documentation including, but not limited to Apttus CPQ solution design document and requirements documentation
Experience with migration of CPQ across environments including experience with the Apttus migration tool
Knowledge of the fundamental capabilities of Apttus CPQ including but not limited to:
Quoting and Quote Templates
Approvals (Deal Manager/IWA preferred)
X- Author
Fundamental understanding of Apttus CLM capabilities, Apttus CLM 201 certification a plus
Experience with Apttus Advanced Workflow Approvals
Experience with X-Author for Excel and Contracts
Experience with Apttus Wizard
Familiar with Apttus admin settings, Apttus custom settings and DocuSign settings.
Knowledge of Apttus development
Why Join us
Our people in India will be at the forefront of technological change as they work collaboratively with, and learn from, world-class experts and have access to the latest training programs and insights for their field.
Alongside your work on leading edge projects, working with us means you'll have access to company perks and benefits that'll reward you for the great work you do. We’re growing, fast, and for you that means many exciting opportunities to develop your career with us at Telstra.
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit tel.st/allrolesflex

Title: Change-Senior Specialist
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
The Telstra SECs are located across India in various partner locations. These centers operate in hybrid mode along with the partner resources.
This role is for supporting the Enterprise business program running across the centers. This position will work closely with the Technology leads, Stream Manager, Partners, Business units, internal Telstra departments (SEC leads), and will be integral in moving business unit strategy forward.
Responsibilities:
Coordinate with Agile coach, Scrum Master and Tech Leads in identifying wins, messages and stories to be communicated with the teams in parallel to the engineering communications that the team would have with their leads.
Interact with the teams in SEC to bring people together, so we can build cohesive Telstra culture, spread the positiveness and motivating the team to take the lead in driving efficiency.
Interact with the teams to understand the user experience, bring out the positivity and share their story.
Bring together the comms across the geography and help the teams understand the big picture and reemphasize the purpose and the role that the team plays in the transformation journey.
Act as a stimulant in bringing about the enterprise wide change and help with smooth transition by projecting the benefits.
Assist the Engineering leads to document and support inter group presentation. There are often details asked in different formats, and it will help if those details can be shared in the format asked for.
Assist the engineering leads in managing the Metrics - Manage all aspects Engineering Metrics, KPI, capacity planning of SECs, create and generate periodic reports for various business and use case in India.
Work closely with the Digital Transformation in sharing the key achievements, important milestones and employee engagement activities from centers in India. This role will also help collate important communication from across all streams and ensure it reaches the teams in India.
Ensure the proper procedures/documentations are in place. Act as first line of escalation and arrange necessary support as and when clarification is required on local policies, procedures.
Documentation - Serve as the central point of contact for managing all requests for SEC requirements, contracts, exceptions, deficiencies and all the evidentiary documentation that goes along with it in the team’s SharePoint site.
Track timelines as needed for various initiatives within B2B and maintain trackers.
Work with the Engineering leads and the project coordinators to run employee engagement activities and Enterprise stream specific R&R.
Work closely with partner project manager and with ODC feature team leads to ensure smooth Joiner – Leaver process (on boarding of employees), asset management, timely submission of timesheet, completion of mandatory trainings, etc.

Skills Required :
Minimum 8 years professional work experience
3 - 4 years in Enterprise communication, brand building, Organizational Change Management and People engagement activities
3 - 4 years of Project Management experience in Agile (matrix) organizations preferably in a PM/PMO role
Excellent Communication and coordination skill
Strong program management, time management, conflict management, multi-tasking & analytical skills with Agile Scrum and IT infrastructure background.
Discreet and professional with good organizational skills
Articulate, express the thoughts in visual and vocabulary and Extreme attention to detail
Ability to remain calm under pressure
Familiar with Microsoft Office, SharePoint, Teams etc
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit our Telstra Careers Website: tel.st/allrolesflex

Title: Software-Senior Engineer(DEVOPS Product owner)
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Join us on this exciting journey, and together, we’ll reimagine the future.
Role with us:
To create a brilliant connected future for everybody through the delivery of high quality software solutions.
Technical Product owner is responsible for laying out vision for implementing DEVOPS i..e CI/CD, Automation Testing, TDD, Monitoring across SaaS and IaaS platforms on AWS and Azure
Key Accountabilities:
Technical Product Owner would be responsible for laying out the vision and blueprints and bring it to reality with a DevSecOps view.
Identify industry best practices and standards for implementation of Cloud.
Guide engineers and developers in following best practices and standards and cross train them on cloud technology.

DEVOPS, CI/CD, Agile, Bamboo, Jenkins, AWS, Azzure, Git, Bitbucket, Docker, Virtualisation, Monitoring, Teraform, Product Management, Agile

7+ years of experience with AWS Cloud with understanding of AWS platform, service offerings and billing.

Experience in high level design and architectures of networks, servers, infrastructure and other systems for various models such as IaaS, SaaS, PaaS etc.

Working experience in a DevOps environment with the team and other stakeholders.

Exposure to and ability to support automation pipeline (Bamboo, Jenkins, etc.)
Have working knowledge on tools such as Jira/Confluence/BitBucket/Git.
Understanding and hands on experience with VMs and Dockers
Certification(s) in AWS
Why Join us
Our people in India will be at the forefront of technological change as they work collaboratively with, and learn from, world-class experts and have access to the latest training programs and insights for their field.
Alongside your work on leading edge projects, working with us means you'll have access to company perks and benefits that'll reward you for the great work you do. We’re growing, fast, and for you that means many exciting opportunities to develop your career with us at Telstra.
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit tel.st/allrolesflex

Title: Business Development Manager
Description:
About ThoughtWorks
We are a global technology company that is synonymous with innovation in the delivery of complex custom software. ThoughtWorks has worked with customers across BFSI, retail, Travel, Hitech and Healthcare space from 40 offices across the globe. We have helped some marquee companies globally in their transformation journey. Please refer https://www.thoughtworks.com/clients to know more about the work we have done.

What We Do
We work with our clients to help them build a successful digital business with tech@core. We focus on developing digital platforms and products that help transform enterprises. We have worked across a range of solutions in the area of digital platforms, Big Data, Artificial intelligence, IoT and blockchain to name a few. We've been at the forefront of innovation around Agile methods, DevOps and evolutionary architecture for a long time. Add to this our recognition as innovators in the technical world and you'll start to see why working here is refreshingly different.

ThoughtWorks in India Market
We have been in the India domestic market for the past few years and have changed the rules of the game. We are partners of choice for some of the leaders in Banking, Insurance, Retail, Travel and consumer industries in India for large and multi-year digital transformation initiatives.Keeping our focus on growth, we are looking for self-driven individuals who can identify opportunities and are able position ThoughtWorks brand and value to our customers.

Responsibilities:
Generate business for ThoughtWorks in India by acquiring large transformational projects from new logos. The areas of engagement will include digital platforms and product development, Data platform, IoT platforms and products, Blockchain, AI, AR & VR and other emerging technologies
Connect with Executive leadership in the prospect organization for understanding their business priorities for transformation
Works with other teams in the ThoughtWorks ecosystem to build the point of view/ solution for client
Present the ThoughtWorks solution and proposal to the client executive leadership
Create the. Commercial structure of the deal in collaboration with other stakeholders in ThoughtWorks and conduct negotiations with customers for closing the deal.
Conduct negotiations on and close contracts with customers
Track competitive activity, build plans to effectively counter it
Build relationships with internal ThoughtWorks teams to ensure the required support levels are obtained to close sales
Become a trusted and valued partner of the client CXO and team
Maintain knowledge of current and emerging technologies, trends and products
Demonstrate financial stewardship in all interactions and existing relationship management, internally and externally
What we are looking for
Minimum 10 total years of software sales, with past experience in pre-sales or delivery management as desirable
Must have proven capability and past experience in shaping up and closing large deals, ability to work independently, capability to establish relationships with CXO-level stakeholders and the ability to interact and work effectively across all levels of the customer organizations
Experience of selling solutions to CXO level stakeholders
Must have closed multi - million dollar deals in software services
Masters Degree (or equivalent work experience) in business,marketing and sales or related field of study
Analytical skill set, strong presentation skills, ability to interact with any level within an organization
Ability to self-motivate and multi-task and work independently or within a team
Good written and verbal communication skills
Good interpersonal skills and professional demeanor
If this sounds like the sort of thing you are looking for, we should be speaking. Please apply online. We want to hear from you!

Title: Hardware Engineer
Description:
Job Description
Conducts or participates in multidisciplinary research in the design, development, testing and utilization of information processing hardware and/or electrical components, mechanisms, materials, and/or circuitry, processes, packaging, and cabinetry for central processing units (CPUs) and/or peripheral equipment. Prepares specifications, evaluates vendors, and analyzes test reports. Ensures products conform to standards and specifications. Develops plans and cost estimates and assesses projects to analyze risk. Develops procedures, analysis and design for computer components, products, and systems. Initiates, guides, and coordinates overall design and development of new ideas and products. Responds to customer/client requests or events as they occur. Develops solutions to problems utilizing formal education and judgement.

Qualifications
BS/MS degree in electrical / electronic engineering with 10+ years of relevant hardware experience
Experience in High speed board design, Signal integrity and power integrity is must
Hands on experience developing server class motherboards based on Intel x86 processor chipsets is desirable
Candidate must demonstrate in depth knowledge of all aspects of commercial HW development including memory interfaces, power distribution and VRM, signal integrity, Power Integrity, HW Verification and testing.
Detailed knowledge of the interface technologies like DDR, PCIe, UPI, etc.
Test and qualification strategies for high speed boards including high speed interfaces, memory, etc.
Experience with Allegro* and Cadence* design tools and knowledge in schematic capture, PCB layout.
Good understanding of Design for Cost, Quality, Manufacture and Test
Excellent written and verbal communication skills, strong analytical ability, proven problem solving
Candidate will need to be confident, enthusiastic and self-driven
Ability to work both independently and in a team environment
Should have led multiple HW/board design projects
Inside this Business Group
The Data Center Group (DCG) is at the heart of Intel’s transformation from a PC company to a company that runs the cloud and billions of smart, connected computing devices. The data center is the underpinning for every data-driven service, from artificial intelligence to 5G to high-performance computing, and DCG delivers the products and technologies—spanning software, processors, storage, I/O, and networking solutions—that fuel cloud, communications, enterprise, and government data centers around the world.
