Title: Software Engineer, Embedded Systems
Description:
Minimum qualifications:
BS degree in Computer Science, or equivalent practical experience.
5 years of relevant work experience
Experience in a software engineering capacity.
Experience working with C++

Preferred qualifications:
Experience in Python.
Experience in Electronics, or Software development related to Hardware.
Experience working with processors and GPU programming.
Performance analysis and optimization experience.
About the job
Our products need to handle information at massive scale, and extend well beyond web search. We're looking for engineers who bring fresh ideas from all areas, including information retrieval, distributed computing, large-scale system design, networking and data storage, artificial intelligence, natural language processing, and UI design; the list goes on and is growing every day. As a software engineer, you will work on a specific project critical to Google’s needs with opportunities to switch teams and projects as you and our fast-paced business grow and evolve. We need our engineers to be versatile, display leadership qualities and be enthusiastic to take on new problems across the full-stack as we continue to push technology forward.
As a Software Engineer, Embedded Systems, you'll work on hardware and software. We are a vertically integrated team spanning from hardware through applications.
Google's mission is to organize the world's information and make it universally accessible and useful. Our team combines the best of Google AI, Software, and Hardware to create radically helpful experiences. We research, design, and develop new technologies and hardware to make computing faster, seamless, and more powerful. We aim to make people's lives better through technology.
Responsibilities
Work to enable applications for devices.
Develop new software, hardware, and system architecture to support future applications.
At Google, we don’t just accept difference—we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products and our community. Google is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace and is an affirmative action employer. Title: Software Development Manager III
Description:
BS/MS in Computer Science or equivalent
7+ years’ experience planning, designing, developing and delivering large, highly available applications, with a strong focus on scalability
5+ years’ experience managing a team in a software development organization that delivered commercial software or software-based services
3+ years hands-on experience with Java, Python, or another OO language
Significant experience with Service Oriented Architecture
Proven leadership skills and teamwork skills as well as demonstrable experience guiding and mentoring software engineers

Amazon Customer Service Technology/Post-order Automation and Customer Engagement (PACE) technology team is looking for a Software Development Manager to lead a team of talented engineers that deliver cutting edge software and services to influence the experience of millions of Amazon customers. PACE team owns and manages Self Service products that focus on reducing effort for Amazon customers, Artificial Intelligence (AI) powered, automated customer communication channels that help solve customer issues, transactional communication across channels and Smart Routing and prediction frameworks where we use data to pre-empt customer issues, address them pro-actively and dynamically connect them to the best equipped associates.

The SDM role requires excellent leadership skills, strong technical expertise and hands-on project management skills. Along with demonstrable tech chops — you should be able to solve complex technical problems and design robust, scalable solutions.
You are an ideal candidate if you have a solid track record of hiring and leading teams of software development engineers to design and deploy in an agile manner.
Additionally, the SDM will assist in roadmap planning, staff training and development.

What You’ll Do:
Lead a team of software engineers responsible for the design, development, and testing of the Amazon Customer Service Tech solutions
Advise and consult with other SDM’s and Senior Engineers on design and architecture
Hire and mentor software engineers and actively participate in their career development
Evaluate and recommend new and emerging products and technologies
Be a proactive contributor to projects that develop new intellectual property

10 + years’ experience planning, designing, developing and delivering software, including highly scalable systems as well as extensive experience with service-oriented architecture
7 + years’ experience managing, owning technical roadmap, focusing on making strong hires and developing junior engineers.
3 + years hands-on experience with Java/Python technologies and associated frameworks

Title: Senior Technical Lead/ Associate Manager – Data Architecture
Description:
Summary of Job Purpose:
Everything working together is a beautiful thing! A unified view of your data is imperative. Without this, every link in the big data chain – from machine learning to artificial intelligence to information gathered from the Internet of Things – becomes less useful. Data warehouse and data mart technologies store, manage and transform your data. It is the fuel of the entire analytics process. Sound interesting? Read on!
Do you believe that Technology drives the world? If yes, do skills and techniques such as Data Warehousing, SQL Queries, ETL and BI Reporting ring a bell? If yes, then we are looking for you. You will form a part of a fast paced, dynamic and rapidly scaling team where you will work closely with clients to deliver cutting edge analytics enabled by technology.

Skilled professional with ability to lead projects on Business Intelligence and Data Warehousing and work as an individual contributor to optimize the database systems across different clients (internal and external) and categories

Development, Implementation, Team Mentoring and Training on BI / DWH / Data Load / Reporting applications.
Exceptional performance tuning capabilities; especially tuning complex queries, procedure and indexing strategies
Hands on experience in No-SQL and Parallel Database architectures like Teradata / Exadata
Exceptional SQL-XML programming skills, XML Extraction and Transformation, XML Databases and Indexing / Search /Lucene experience with EDM development
Strong in ETL and BI Reporting
Qualification & Skills :
Work experience of 7 – 9 years with a B. Tech / M.Sc. (Computer Science) / MCA / M. Tech is what we are looking for!

Title: Server Side Developers
Description:
At June Gaming, Our mission is to "Make Games that People Play for Years".

We got started with real time multiplayer games like MaskGun, Puzzle Clash, Ninja Fun Race, Tower Conquest and Road Riot.

Our most valuable asset is our People - We believe that the best Games are made by the best Teams.
Our people at June are passionate about Game making, are self motivated, persistent, ship regularly and work well in small teams.

Our games have been downloaded over 150 Million times, but we believe that we are just getting started.

For us to succeed in our mission to make Great games, we need a few more people.
Join us on our journey of our life time, by applying for a job.
We promise that these open positions are few and fill up quickly.

Job Description
As a Server Side Developer at June, you will be working on the heart of our RealTime Multiplayer Web Platform that powers millions of users in a realtime environment.
Where latencies are measured in milli seconds and downtime does not exists and scaling happens automatically.
If you like working on complex technical challenges in small teams, love technology and genuinely work proactively and autonomously, you will love working here.
You will be working in a small cross functional games team, helping with designing features, making decisions and solving complex scalable problems.
You should be a great communicator and enjoy working in a fast paced and Agile environment.

Our Games Teams share work and frameworks across projects.
If one game team creates something cool, we often use or repurpose that in another game.
Part of your role will be to effectively collaborate and share knowledge among the rest of the team.

This is a great opportunity to develop games with some incredibly passionate and creative people, so a passion for technology and games would be great.
If you want to join us to make great games on our cutting edge technology and truly make an impact, then we want to talk to you!

Job Responsibilities
Taking responsibility for server development in an agile team comprising front-end engineering, server engineering, devops, art, game design and QA engineering
Working with .NET/Java/Lua/Javascript, writing .NET Restful Services, various opensource frameworks, or using AWS SDK to develop game features, middleware services, common components and tools.
Taking part in all aspects of the sprint life-cycle, from feature design and planning through implementation, launch and live operations support.
Creating elegant, reusable code and unit tests.

You take pride in your work, and know what it means to take responsibility and deliver quality focused products.
You enjoy working in a dynamic and agile environment.

We offer you a chance to join a team of professionals, looking to iterate fast on a fun concept and then building it out where we believe that talent feeds talent.
We do not believe in bureaucracy, nor are there any solo artists at June.
We all work together to achieve the best results.
All of us have a genuine chance to contribute to the final product.
We believe in each other’s skills and value each other’s work.

Hands on architect and coder for sophisticated client/server systems for mobile gaming
Innovate and iterate on process, systems and technology to deliver world-class social games
Be a leader; Identify and articulate technical and production risks and obstacles, as well as generate solutions!

If these are values that you are passionate about, then you might just be the person we are looking for.

Job Requirements
Excellent server engineering skills in .NET/.NET Core/Java/JavaScript
Experience and/or a passion for functional programming
Experience working in a service based architecture
Experience working with NoSQL systems like MongoDB
Experience working with AWS / GCP / Azure Hosted Infrastructure
Experience working in a team building and supporting a product with a significant user base
Excellent communication skills and attitude
Ability to quickly get up to speed with existing code
Passion for games
Write maintainable and robust code in a popular object oriented language.
Solid familiarity with 3rd party SDKs, analytics, and A/B testing in mobile games
Familiarity with git, svn or other VCS.
Self starter, analytical and creative
Involvement in all areas of game development including Game Logic, Artificial Intelligence, writing Bots and User Interface.
Support and contribute new ideas to game design
Write robust code to be used by millions of users
Independently create complete games from scratch
Work as part of a team, but with plenty of opportunity to take responsibility on an individual level
Bonus Points
Having worked on a successful ( >1M MAU) free to play game
Proven effectiveness in directing or delivering production software for high quality games with at least one shipped game product of which you were a primary contributor (self published titles are acceptable).
Having designed and developed an AWS based architecture with 5-100 servers
Having built and launched a mobile game on iOS and Android
Having a working knowledge of React
Having a working knowledge of Unity3D
Open Source Contributor.

Title: Java Full Stack Developer / Core Java / HTML / Java Script /...
Description:
Requisition ID: 218026
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.
#SAPSFSF

WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. Title: Senior Automation QA Engineer (Remote/Work-from-home)
Description:
WalletHub is one of the leading personal finance destinations in the US and rapidly growing. We’re looking for a motivated, hardworking, and competitive Senior Automation QA Engineer for a full-time, permanent position.
The expected work schedule is 7 AM to 7 PM EST Monday to Friday, including a 1h break.
Responsibilities
Testing and assuring high quality performance of website
Reporting and validating bugs for all components
Creating test plans and test cases
Creating and maintaining automated tests using Selenium and Java
Identifying opportunities for improvement and making constructive suggestions for change
Qualifications
You are the ideal candidate for this job if you have:
At least 3 years of hands-on experience in Test Automation with Java and Selenium
At least 4 years experience in Manual Testing
Excellent attention to details
Proven ability to meet deadlines and handle multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment
Willingness to work hard
Proficient in written/spoken English
Compensation
Very competitive salary based on prior experience and qualifications
Potential for stock options after the first year
Raise and advancement opportunities based on periodic evaluations
The ability to work overtime for added income
100% remote position
Visa sponsorship (after 24 months with the company, based on performance, in case you will be working from outside the US)
How to apply
To get our attention, all you need to do is apply on Indeed and include your updated resume as well as a brief message telling us why you are the right candidate.If we believe that you will be a good match, we'll contact you to arrange the next steps of the application process.
Please know that we appreciate your interest in our company but due to the high number of applications we are unable to get back to candidates who have not been selected to move forward.
Note
This position does not have a location requirement and can be performed remotely from outside the U.S. without the need for U.S. work authorization.
More about WalletHub
WalletHub is a high-growth fintech company based in Washington, D.C. that is looking for talented, hard-working individuals to help us reshape personal finance. More specifically, we are harnessing the power of data analytics and artificial intelligence to build the brain of a smart financial advisor, whose services we’re offering to everyone for free. The WalletHub brain enables users to make better financial decisions in a fraction of the time with three unique features:
1) Customized Credit-Improvement Tips: WalletHub identifies improvement opportunities and guides you through the necessary corrections.
2) Personalized Money-Saving Advice: WalletHub’s savings brain constantly scours the market for load-lightening opportunities, bringing you only the best deals.
3) Wallet Surveillance: Personal finance isn’t as scary with 24/7 credit monitoring providing backup, notifying you of important credit-report changes.
In addition to the valuable intelligence the brain provides, WalletHub is the first and only service to offer free credit scores and full credit reports that are updated on a daily basis absent of user interaction, rather than weekly or monthly and only when a user logs in. Some other services hang their hats on free credit scores and reports, yet they’re still inferior to what WalletHub considers minor pieces to a much larger puzzle.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹960,000.00 to ₹2,100,000.00 /year

Title: Software-Senior Engineer(CPQ Architect)
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Join us on this exciting journey, and together, we’ll reimagine the future.
Role with us
CPQ Technical Architect will work with business stakeholders and ITS colleagues in the implementation and support of Cloudsense CPQ at Telstra. This position offers diversity in projects, an opportunity to work in a team environment with autonomy and a high-level of responsibility. There are also excellent opportunities for professional growth and advancement within Telstra Customer Platforms and broader Telstra systems.
CPQ Technical Architect is responsible for leading technical CPQ low level architecture activities for Telstra across requirement analysis, design, development and implementation on Telstra’s key CRM platforms. They will be responsible for developing and coordinating technical delivery aspects of all Telstra’s CRM systems implementations, communicating effectively and fostering strong relationships with business users and stakeholders.
The purpose of the role is to take responsibility for ensuring all requests from the business are developed and delivered in the most optimal way taking into consideration business roadmaps, ITS CRM Strategy, industry best practice, vendor roadmaps and thought leadership and innovation delivering a competitive advantage to Telstra.
He will participate in and/or be responsible for technical analysis of functional designs, preparation of technical designs, technical build & implementation of CRM, CRM configuration and scripting, quality & code reviews, facilitating testing, resolution of defects identified during test, managing relationships between support and development team, mentoring and training
Key Accountabilities
Salesforce Technical Architect role is to plan, coordinate, and execute all activities related to the requirements interpretation, design and implementation of CPQ, CLM applications. This individual will apply proven industry and technology experience as well as communication skills, problem-solving skills, and knowledge of best practices to issues related to design, development, and deployment of mission-critical CRM systems with a focus on quality application development and delivery.
This role is key to the success of the Customer Platforms function at Telstra and will be responsible and accountable for the following:
Ability to design and develop Salesforce CRM, Cloudsense CPQ & Force.com Applications
Ability to review vendor designs and recommended solutions based on industry best practises
Ability to provide technical governance across Cloudsense CPQ solutions at Telstra
Assess and improve the efficiency and effectiveness of the Salesforce application solutions to ensure user requirements and business objectives are met in a timely and cost effective manner
Understand overall business operations and develops innovative solutions to help improve productivity
Ability to understand and design provisioning solutions at Telstra and how CRM interacts with provisioning layers.
Strong problem solving and analytical skills needed to support enterprise high availability Salesforce applications
Coordinate with technical resource within and outside of Customer Platforms team.
Monitor process of software configuration/development/testing to assure quality deliverable.
Ensure standards of QA are being met
Review deliverables to verify that they meet client and contract expectations; Implement and enforce high standards for quality deliverables
Analyses performance and capacity issues of the highest complexity with Salesforce application.
Demonstrate thought Leadership in Cloudsense CPQ innovations and practices.
Assists leadership with development and management of new application capabilities to improve productivity
Provide training and educate other team members around core capabilities and helps them deliver high quality solutions and deliverables/documentation
Self-Motivator to perform Design / Develop user requirements, test and deploy the changes into production
Skill & Experience : 12 + yrs
SFDC, APEX, Conga, Appttus, Cloudsense
Technical Descriptors
Salesforce – Service Cloud, Sales Cloud, Force. Com platform
Salesforce Certified Developer / Advanced Developer / Technical Architect is essential
Experience in building applications on force.com platform with extensive hands-on and subject matter expertise in Salesforce technology including
Full cycle implementation experience with SFDC (application design, architecture and development using Salesforce.com)
Strong SFDC knowledge and Integration components for SFDC (SFDC APIs, Apex controllers, Apex Web Services, Apex callout, outbound messaging, SFDC data loaders, etc.)
Command over APEX and Visual force
Hands on experience in building salesforce apex classes, test classes and deployment process.
Deep knowledge of Salesforce API’s and hands on experience in building custom API’s and integration.
Working knowledge of web frameworks – HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, JSON, Ajax
working knowledge of all Atlassian tools a bonus
Expertise in developing CPQ capability using Cloudsense.
Proven experience of working with Telco Clients to configure products, Baskets, Order Orchestration and Technical Enrichment.
Certifications in Appttus and Conga would be essential.
Expertise in developing Contract management solution integrating into CPQ using Conga or Appttus
Proven experience with creation of relevant documentation including, but not limited to Apttus CPQ solution design document and requirements documentation
Experience with migration of CPQ across environments including experience with the Apttus migration tool
Knowledge of the fundamental capabilities of Apttus CPQ including but not limited to:
Quoting and Quote Templates
Approvals (Deal Manager/IWA preferred)
X- Author
Fundamental understanding of Apttus CLM capabilities, Apttus CLM 201 certification a plus
Experience with Apttus Advanced Workflow Approvals
Experience with X-Author for Excel and Contracts
Experience with Apttus Wizard
Familiar with Apttus admin settings, Apttus custom settings and DocuSign settings.
Knowledge of Apttus development
Why Join us
Our people in India will be at the forefront of technological change as they work collaboratively with, and learn from, world-class experts and have access to the latest training programs and insights for their field.
Alongside your work on leading edge projects, working with us means you'll have access to company perks and benefits that'll reward you for the great work you do. We’re growing, fast, and for you that means many exciting opportunities to develop your career with us at Telstra.
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit tel.st/allrolesflex

Title: Change-Senior Specialist
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
The Telstra SECs are located across India in various partner locations. These centers operate in hybrid mode along with the partner resources.
This role is for supporting the Enterprise business program running across the centers. This position will work closely with the Technology leads, Stream Manager, Partners, Business units, internal Telstra departments (SEC leads), and will be integral in moving business unit strategy forward.
Responsibilities:
Coordinate with Agile coach, Scrum Master and Tech Leads in identifying wins, messages and stories to be communicated with the teams in parallel to the engineering communications that the team would have with their leads.
Interact with the teams in SEC to bring people together, so we can build cohesive Telstra culture, spread the positiveness and motivating the team to take the lead in driving efficiency.
Interact with the teams to understand the user experience, bring out the positivity and share their story.
Bring together the comms across the geography and help the teams understand the big picture and reemphasize the purpose and the role that the team plays in the transformation journey.
Act as a stimulant in bringing about the enterprise wide change and help with smooth transition by projecting the benefits.
Assist the Engineering leads to document and support inter group presentation. There are often details asked in different formats, and it will help if those details can be shared in the format asked for.
Assist the engineering leads in managing the Metrics - Manage all aspects Engineering Metrics, KPI, capacity planning of SECs, create and generate periodic reports for various business and use case in India.
Work closely with the Digital Transformation in sharing the key achievements, important milestones and employee engagement activities from centers in India. This role will also help collate important communication from across all streams and ensure it reaches the teams in India.
Ensure the proper procedures/documentations are in place. Act as first line of escalation and arrange necessary support as and when clarification is required on local policies, procedures.
Documentation - Serve as the central point of contact for managing all requests for SEC requirements, contracts, exceptions, deficiencies and all the evidentiary documentation that goes along with it in the team’s SharePoint site.
Track timelines as needed for various initiatives within B2B and maintain trackers.
Work with the Engineering leads and the project coordinators to run employee engagement activities and Enterprise stream specific R&R.
Work closely with partner project manager and with ODC feature team leads to ensure smooth Joiner – Leaver process (on boarding of employees), asset management, timely submission of timesheet, completion of mandatory trainings, etc.

Skills Required :
Minimum 8 years professional work experience
3 - 4 years in Enterprise communication, brand building, Organizational Change Management and People engagement activities
3 - 4 years of Project Management experience in Agile (matrix) organizations preferably in a PM/PMO role
Excellent Communication and coordination skill
Strong program management, time management, conflict management, multi-tasking & analytical skills with Agile Scrum and IT infrastructure background.
Discreet and professional with good organizational skills
Articulate, express the thoughts in visual and vocabulary and Extreme attention to detail
Ability to remain calm under pressure
Familiar with Microsoft Office, SharePoint, Teams etc
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit our Telstra Careers Website: tel.st/allrolesflex

Title: Software-Senior Engineer(DEVOPS Product owner)
Description:
About Telstra
Telstra is Australia’s leading telecommunications and technology company, with operations in more than 20 countries, including in India where we’re building a new Innovation and Capability Centre (ICC) in Bangalore.
We’re combining innovation, automation and technology to solve the world’s biggest technological challenges in areas such as Internet of Things (IoT), 5G, Artificial Intelligence (AI), Machine Learning, and more.
Join us on this exciting journey, and together, we’ll reimagine the future.
Role with us:
To create a brilliant connected future for everybody through the delivery of high quality software solutions.
Successful candidates will be experienced Senior Technology Specialists possessing strong problem solving skills, a self-starter mindset with a proactive attitude towards delivery and leadership capabilities in order to provide technical guidance to other Software Engineers.
Technical Product owner is responsible for laying out vision for implementing DEVOPS i..e CI/CD, Automation Testing, TDD, Monitoring across SaaS and IaaS platforms on AWS and Azure
Key Accountabilities:
Technical Product Owner would be responsible for laying out the vision and blueprints and bring it to reality with a DevSecOps view.
Identify industry best practices and standards for implementation of Cloud.
Guide engineers and developers in following best practices and standards and cross train them on cloud technology.
Complying with all relevant processes and standards, including change management principles and processes to ensure deliverables meet or exceed defined quality standards.
Skill & Experience: 12 + yrs Exp
DEVOPS, CI/CD, Agile, Bamboo, Jenkins, AWS, Azzure, Git, Bitbucket, Docker, Virtualisation, Monitoring, Teraform, Product Management, Agile
Optional Skills: Chef, Ansible, Python, Database, Perl, UNIX
Technical Descriptors
7+ years of experience with AWS Cloud with understanding of AWS platform, service offerings and billing.
AWS CloudFormation templates, AWS EC2, VPC and Subnets, S3, ELB/ALB.
Experience in high level design and architectures of networks, servers, infrastructure and other systems for various models such as IaaS, SaaS, PaaS etc.
Experience with setup and administration of databases in AWS (MongoDB, SQL Server, Couchbase databases etc.)
Working experience in a DevOps environment with the team and other stakeholders.
Understanding of Agile, DevOps
Understanding of Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and ability to develop and contribute in an IaC environment.
Exposure to and ability to support automation pipeline (Bamboo, Jenkins, etc.)
Have working knowledge on tools such as Jira/Confluence/BitBucket/Git.
Understanding and hands on experience with VMs and Dockers
Certification(s) in AWS
Why Join us
Our people in India will be at the forefront of technological change as they work collaboratively with, and learn from, world-class experts and have access to the latest training programs and insights for their field.
Alongside your work on leading edge projects, working with us means you'll have access to company perks and benefits that'll reward you for the great work you do. We’re growing, fast, and for you that means many exciting opportunities to develop your career with us at Telstra.

Title: QC Technical Director
Description:
Job Description

About the organisation:-
Ubisoft India is proud to be one of the most creative video game studios in India with over 800 + talented employees ranging over many areas of expertise. Just Dance, Prince of Persia, Steep, Grow Up or For Honor, are some of the amazing Ubisoft’s brands, our teams are working on.
We have very challenging and exciting opportunities for creative minds to develop their expertise and capabilities to grow.
At Ubisoft we favour diversity, creativity, drive and team spirit, and, together, we build success. Besides, the friendly work environment, Pune is a fast growing city and a hub for the Indian economy.
To continue building on its achievements for the future, Ubisoft is looking for talented candidates for its growing Indian studio in Pune!

Job Title: Technical Director

Summary:
Reporting to the QC Director, this role's primary objective is to help lead significant automation and tools infrastructure technology across multiple QC Projects and titles.
The ideal candidate would be the one who thrives on challenges like building new and better build and CI pipelines, introducing new ways of testing to increase robustness, making team build deployments an instantaneous process, improving and finding deep-rooted problems in existing tools, scaling processes to the cloud, and automating all the things.
You constantly seek new innovative solutions and systems, but you also reject most from a position of pragmatism. You see the big picture, but you know that the details matter. You understand the tradeoffs between ambition and risk. You walk and chew gum at the same time.

Responsibilities:
Provide key technological leadership, innovate and introduce new technologies, practices, processes, tools, and systems in areas like- Automation, testing, deployment, architecture, configuration, scaling and optimization
Lead a team comprising of Automation Architect, R&D Engineers and Quality Engineers
Guide and drive future state digital capabilities via Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning, bring industry best practices and external market capabilities to enable the same to improve existing process and lead the Academic and Research collaborations to achieve the given objectives.
Define and implement proof-of-concepts for proving new technologies and/or architecture patterns
Proactively seek improvements to existing tools and production pipelines
Measure and identify bottlenecks and key issues
Seek root causes of problems
Help resolve scaling and stability issues
Communicating and collaborating with Production studio, QC and other Technical stakeholders
Mentor other engineers in areas of domain expertise and best practices
Lead governance of project deliverables in terms of adherence to Ubisoft quality and long term viability
Strive to Influence engineering teams to move quality upstream and to the Left. Cultivate an organization, which is passionate towards Quality Control.

Experience and Qualifications:
12+ years of relevant experience in field of software development and/or gaming industry
8+ years of experience in QA Engineering and Automation solution development
Bachelor's or Master's degree in computer science, computer engineering, or other technical discipline, or equivalent work experience
Hands on experience writing advanced object oriented code including creating automation frameworks and test scripts for large-scale testing scenarios.
Experience with large software projects, ideally those involving building both code and large data sets
Strong programming and scripting skills in C++, Python and other languages
Familiarity with a wide variety of open source technologies
Working knowledge of continuous integration platform (Jenkins, TeamCity, etc.)
Experience with automation/configuration management tools (Puppet, Chef, Salt, etc.)
Experience with virtualization, containerization, scaling (KVM, Kubernetes, Rancher, Docker, AWS, etc.)
Experience with database technologies
Deep understanding of QC methodologies including triaging, debugging, automating and testing
Experience deploying automated testing for performance, UI, features, stability and other product oriented needs
Familiar with full product life cycle and agile development methodologies.
Experience creating and bringing to qualitative metrics and measurements
Able to be flexible and work independently when necessary
Able to effectively influence key stakeholders, team members, and peers not in direct control to architect, design and deliver optimal solutions in line with the best interest and expectations of the business
Able to partner with key IT/GNS, Production and QC stakeholders
Experience leading multi-disciplinary teams across cultures, regions, and geographies; and able to travel if required.
Demonstrated experience working in a highly matrixed organization and partnering to achieve exceptional business outcomes

Qualifications

null

Additional Information

To all recruitment agencies: Ubisoft does not accept agency resumes. Please do not forward resumes to our jobs alias, Ubisoft employees or any other company location. Ubisoft is not responsible for any fees related to unsolicited resumes

Title: Senior Software Developer
Description:
Are you a passionate Techie ninja with 5 - 7 yrs of experience, who thinks, “I don’t want to just keep pushing paper or doing dumb work and want to create products that change people’s lives”. Someone who has the passion to create and not just the mentality to maintain existing systems. An Entrepreneurial spirit with a startup mentality, who will take pride in what he/she will help create. A believer and not a skeptic with an ability to wear multiple hats required in astartup.
Company Profile:
At AIndra Systems, an exciting early stage Start-Up based out of Bangalore, our Vision is to build world class systems to aid diagnosis of fatal diseases like cancer with the use of Artificial Intelligence. Our Mission is to use Computer Vision as the vehicle. We take immense pride in the fact that we are amongst the very few deep technology startups in India. We are working on using deep-tech like Optics, Mechatronics and AI in Healthcare. We have been featured by Forbes, Economic Times, Your story etc. We have been supported by multiple national as well as international agencies. We have multiple patent pending products which are under National Phase applications stage in multiple countries.
As a Senior Software Developer, you will be responsible for leading the implementation of the product architecture. We want you if you can:
A person with a great aptitude matched with an amazing attitude and work ethic
Someone who is unfazed by the speed of development and implementation.
Someone who loves new challenges and working on new requirements.
Capable of implementing scalable and high-performance systems.
Want to be involved in product development from an early stage of product conceptualization.
Capable of implementing solutions to be hosted on the Cloud.
Cloud computing knowledge and experience with deploying applications on any of the well known IAAS/PAAS providers.
Capable of providing reliable solutions to a variety of problems using sound problem-solving techniques
Capable of performing technical root cause analysis and outlining corrective action for problems using debuggers, log files etc.
A quick learner willing to work on new programming languages depending on requirement
The ability to communicate technical information clearly and succinctly to both technical and non-technical teams
Highly Desirable:
BS/BTech/MS/MTech (or equivalent degrees) in Computer Science or related technical disciplines
Required Technical and Professional Expertise :
Strong expertise in Python, Java, JEE, JSP, Servlets, JDBC, XML, Spring Framework, Hibernate, MVC, SQL, REST APIs, JAX-RS, Web Services & design patterns
Hands-on experience in Mysql or Postgres with excellent understanding of SQL queries, stored procedure, DB Design etc
Hands-on experience in Tomcat and JBoss
Hands-on experience in Linux/Ubuntu platform
Should have experience in using tools such as Eclipse/IntelliJ/NetBean, ANT/Maven, Jenkin/ Cruisecontrol, JUnit etc
Hands-on experience of using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript.
Strong knowledge or working experience with REST APIs, frameworks and components
Experience of working in any of the JavaScript frameworks Backbone.js/ Angular.js/ ember.js/ node.js is a big plus.
Knowledge/Experience of any NoSQL database (MongoDB, CouchDB, Cassandra etc)
Job Perks
Performance based Stock options
Access to top academic research profs from a few IITs
Beer punch with the team at every second Friday's of the month
Company sponsored passes to technical & entrepreneurship events and meet ups.
Please send your Details & your Resume to contactus@aindra.in

Title: AI/ML Enterprise Architect
Description:
AI/ML Enterprise Architect
Job Description
Preferred Skills & Characteristics:
Understand E2E Data Flow across all the Systems. Will be able to come up with the As-Is and To-Be Data Architecture.
Have an Enterprise wide view and understanding of the future Analytics & AI Requirements and work closely with the D&A Team
Understanding of Machine Learning, Model Repository, Determining the confidence level of Models
Deep knowledge of SQL Azure (PaaS)
Knowledge of Azure Data warehouse, Azure Data Lake
Prior experience with Azure Machine Learning, HD Insight is strongly preferred
Familiarity with Azure Data services, like Azure Data Factory, Azure Catalog, Azure Security model
Good understanding of Data Bricks
Strong interest in Artificial Intelligence, Machine Reasoning, or related fields.
Capable of quickly becoming familiar with new approaches to AI and computational comprehension.
Fluency in English and a good communicator both orally and in writing.
Excited about working on a team of highly diverse, creative people, all aiming for the same goal and mutually supportive of each other.
Have what it takes to break new ground and implement radical innovation, facing skepticism, incumbent conservatism, and strong resistance to change in general - with a positive, constructive approach and attitude.
Great story teller, visual thinker and empathetic listener.
Global VISA and Relocation Specifications:
K-C requires that an employee have authorization to work in the country in which the role is based. In the event an applicant does not have current work authorization, K-C will determine, in its sole discretion, whether to sponsor an individual for work authorization. However, based on immigration requirements, not all roles are suitable for sponsorship.
This role is available for local candidates already authorized to work in the role’s country only. K-C will not provide relocation support for this role.
Primary Location
IT Centre Bangalore GDTC
Additional Locations
Worker Type
Employee
Worker Sub-Type
Regular
Time Type
Full time

Title: Content Writer - Artificial Intelligence
Description:
Want a dynamic, challenging career? We are looking for a
Content Writer - Artificial Intelligence
WS Group is a leading Mobile apps and AI Bots company with headquarters in New York and offices in London, Singapore & India. With a singular focus of driving "user engagement", the products & solutions span multiple industries and channels It is a premier bots and machine learning company that helps brands leverage the promise of AI. This is a unique products company in East India with a focus on building cutting-edge AI-enabled products for Enterprise.
It has over 250 professionals across AI & Mobile stacks in Microsoft and Open Source frameworks. Offices are spread across Singapore, London & New York, Kolkata.
Kolkata new office is one of its kind located in IT heart of the city Rajarhat with approx. 50,000 sq ft work space including yoga, lunch, library and over 4000 sq ft of recreation and relaxation space.
WS Group is a certified partner system integrator of

WS Group is looking for Content Writers.

PARTIAL LIST OF BENEFITS
Apart from a state-of-the-art office with ergonomically friendly atmosphere, Web Spiders offers a host of other benefits to its employees like:
On-the-job Benefits
Regular and Process Oriented Appraisals
Employee performances are evaluated on a quarterly basis. All employees have easy access to the management for regular feedback and exchange of ideas.
Training Room and Library
We have a training room and a library with an extensive range of books, magazines and electronic resources available for advanced learning and development.
Lunch Subsidy
We offer high-quality, fresh and healthy lunch at a 50% subsidized rate. Complimentary snacks are also served during evening hours.
On-the-job Training
Web Spiders offers regular on-the-job training programs on Drupal, Sitecore, Kentico, EKTRON, HTML and other upcoming technologies. We also offer soft skills training programs periodically.

There is also a unique training program for freshers known as PRATHAM. Best of the class is absorbed into live projects. Interested employees can write to [email protected].

Deserving candidates qualify for on-site training programs in US/UK as well as sponsorships for special training camps.
Paid transportation benefit
Employees are entitled to get reimbursed for transportation after 9.30 pm as per office rules.
Rewarding Buddy-Referral Program
You can recommend your friends for suitable positions. In addition to the thrill of working with your friends, you also get an attractive incentive based on the seniority and designation of the selected candidates.
Complimentary Breakfast and Snacks
We serve nutritious and tasty snacks, including fresh fruits, to keep employees fuelled throughout the day.
Leave Benefits
Paid and Sick Leave - 20 Days
Apart from standard public holidays (details on our Intranet) employees are entitled to the following leave structure after 4 months of their tenure.
Paid leaves – 14 days in a calendar year
Sick leaves – 6 days in a calendar year
Maternity Leave
Employees of Web Spiders are entitled to 26 weeks of paid maternity leave as per statutory laws and company guidelines.
Special Bereavement Benefit
It is available to employees for immediate family bereavement and is processed in a short notice. It forms part of overall leave and can be extended based on the management's decision.
Working Hours
Normal working hours at Web Spiders are from 9:30 a.m. to 6:30 p.m. (Monday through Friday).
Awards for Excellence
No good deed goes unrewarded at Web Spiders. Excellent performance is officially recognized with Awards for Excellence and Certificates of Merit at our Annual Town Hall Meets.

For outstation candidates, Web Spiders provides comprehensive relocation support, including relocation fees and airfare.
Fun @copy; Web Spiders
Spiders love to work hard and party harder! Parties, picnics and movie trips are all a part of our work culture at Web Spiders!

We have 2 table tennis boards in our campus. You can break into a little sweat, get your brain racing and come back to work refreshed. More details and guidelines are on the office intranet.
Financial Benefits
Gratuity
After 5 years of continuous service, employees become eligible for gratuity. It is given @copy; 15 days basic salary for every completed year of service.
Income Tax Consulting on request
We offer free tax consulting through our Chartered Accountants.

Title: Research Analyst
Description:
Job Location – Pune, India
Required experience – 1-2 Years
About Innoplexus
Innoplexus offers Data as a Service and Continuous Analytics as a Service products, leveraging Artificial Intelligence and advanced analytics to help reduce the drug development time, from synthesis to approval, significantly.
Our products leverage proprietary algorithms and patent-pending technologies to help global Life Sciences and Pharmaceuticals organizations with access to relevant data, real-time intelligence & intuitive insights, across pre-clinical, clinical, regulatory and commercial stages of a drug.
We automate the collection, curation, aggregation, and analysis, of billions of data points from thousands of data sources, using machine learning, network analysis, ontologies, computer vision and entity normalization.
Responsibilities:
Researching scientific data pertaining to a particular topic and finding answers to specific questions based on product/client requirements.
Presenting desired scientific information to other members of the team or clients in a manner that it is easily understood.
Keeping pace with new developments, publications, conferences, activities etc. relevant to the particular scientific field of requirement.
Summarizing research findings and making self-explanatory Excel sheets/PowerPoint presentations for other colleagues of the team.
Regular discussions with other team members towards discussing the progress of current work, finding ways to furnish missing information and working together to meet the company as well as client deadlines in time.
Required experience
1-2 years of experience working in a Pharma based company (desirable)
Strong analytical skills, structured problem solving attitude, excellent written & verbal skills, good knowledge of MS office & other analytical tools for day-to-day use.
An open mind to learn and discover new approaches to achieve a goal.
Required qualification
PhD/Masters in Life sciences.

Title: Lead - Software Engineering
Description:
Lead - Software Engineering
(Job Number: 1904616)
The Purpose of This Role
This is purely a hands on role where you need engage in developing solutions in latest technologies, lead the code reviews and coding standards for newer projects.
The Value You Deliver
Below are few of the primary areas that you will be required to contribute as an Architect –
Working closely with architects in FICOT (U.S) and with the architecture group so set the future direction for our applications.
Must be completely hands on in Java programming language and it related ecosystem. Should have a very good understanding of Java related programming language.
Should be aware of functional programming concepts.
AWS implementation along with database migration on PostgreSQL, MySQL and Oracle. Cloud services evaluation for ETL, Application health monitoring, logging, etc.
Container deployment model such as…EC2, EKS and PCF.
Data encryption techniques (At rest and in-transit)
Kafka implementation with confluent for the event steaming platform
Moving all our 40+ applications to Devops with CICD implementation and also implementing various other tools in pipeline to get maximum efficiency.
Implementation of stage 2 of Artificial Intelligence in operational chatbot using either of these (Python NLTK , AWS Lex Bot , Azure Bot service).
Feasibility of using open source tools like KNIME or Apache NIFI for ETL processing against the licensed Informatica tool.
Micro analysis of all the existing set of legacy applications and set a directions for each of them to move them to the latest tech stack which can be more efficient and maintainable.
To help FICOT team in keeping pace with the WS direction of moving everything to cloud in next 3-4 years. It will involve the following
Evaluating the best cloud platforms (as of now AWS and Azure) and Google next year for our applications.
Building strategy and architecture by working closely with Enterprise Cloud Committee (ECC) for each application
Deciding the right set of Cloud services and Data migration services for moving the existing applications to cloud
Security considerations as per the recommendations from ECC for all the components moving to cloud.
Helping the teams in setting up coding standards along with best practices for backend and frontend technologies.
Mentoring the team members in thinking holistically while starting with the development which helps in getting more efficient solutions.
Evaluate and recommend technology and frameworks for flexibility, long-term viability, and time to market.
The Skills that are Key to this role
Technical / Behavioral
Experience and knowledge of HTML 5, JavaScript, CSS3 , Ajax, JQuery, HTML5, Angular
Application development using Java EE, Spring framework
Experience / exposure of hosting the application on to public cloud (Data, service and UI).
Exposure to container deployment models & CI-CD for cloud applications.
Understanding of and experience with Micro-Services Architecture concepts and emerging patterns such as APIs, JAX-RS, REST/JSON.
Relational databases like Oracle & DB2.
Event driver transaction processing using EAI, ESB and messaging patterns using technologies such as WSO2, ActiveMQ, Tomcat etc.
Experience with API Manager tools such as WSO2 preferred (API gateway).
Security integration using oAuth and LDAP.
Good working experience on GIT, Maven, Jenkins, uDeploy, JIRA, Artifactory, Dynatrace, Sonar is must.
The Skills that are Good To Have for this role
Business Process Management and workflow system like IBM BPM.
Business Rules management system such as ODM/Drools etc.
Working knowledge of external cloud AWS, Azure etc. Any certification is an added advantage.
Complex event processing and distributed caching.
Knowledge of responsive web design and technologies.
Knowledge of continuous integration, static code analysis and test driven development.
Knowledge of internet security and OAuth, Open ID Connect etc. knowledge and best practices.
Experience on performance analysis and tuning.
Knowledge of client side and mobile technologies: Node, Handlebars and Cordova a plus
Knowledge of No Sql Database MongoDb, Cassandra etc.
Knowledge of QA Automation tools like Selenium, Cucumber etc. .
Knowledge on Document based database systems (MongoDB, DynamoDB, etc..)
Knowledge on Agile practices
How Your Work Impacts the Organization
Workplace Solutions (WS) helps millions of people save and invest through workplace savings plans. WS builds lifetime relationships with customers and provides employers with cost-effective, integrated employee benefit solutions. The company serves customers online, over the phone. WS business constitutes of 5 different product lines Defined Contribution (DC), Defined Benefits(DB), Health & Welfare(HW), Stock plan and Plan sponsor services(SPS)
The Financial and Operations development team (FIOT) is part of the Workplace Solutions (WS) Technology group. Our team is responsible for new and enhanced design and development of application areas across WS. We have close to 40 + applications that we deal with currently.
The Expertise we’re looking for
Bachelor’s degree in Computer science or any other discipline
Demonstrated mastery of previous level skills and responsibilities of relevant job family
10+ years of experience in web technology role
AWS certification is great value add
Fidelity Investments is one of the world's largest providers of financial services. Headquartered in Boston, US, Fidelity's goal is to make financial expertise broadly accessible and effective in helping people live the lives they want. Privately held for nearly 70 years, Fidelity employs 45,000 associates who are focused on the long-term success of our customers. FMR (Fidelity Management & Research) India is the Global In-house Center of Fidelity Investments. Headquartered at Bangalore, where operations commenced in 2003, FMR India has another fully-functional unit at Chennai. To know more visit: FMR India

Title: Java Full Stack Developer / Core Java / HTML / Java Script /...
Description:
Requisition ID: 218026
Work Area: Software-Design and Development
Expected Travel: 0 - 10%
Career Status: Professional
Employment Type: Regular Full Time
COMPANY DESCRIPTION
SAP started in 1972 as a team of five colleagues with a desire to do something new. Together, they changed enterprise software and reinvented how business was done. Today, as a market leader in enterprise application software, we remain true to our roots. That’s why we engineer solutions to fuel innovation, foster equality and spread opportunity for our employees and customers across borders and cultures.
SAP values the entrepreneurial spirit, fostering creativity and building lasting relationships with our employees. We know that a diverse and inclusive workforce keeps us competitive and provides opportunities for all. We believe that together we can transform industries, grow economics, lift up societies and sustain our environment. Because it’s the best-run businesses that make the world run better and improve people’s lives.
JOB TITLE: Developer - Cloud HCM Analytics Team
PURPOSE AND OBJECTIVES:
At SAP SuccessFactors we have started a Human Revolution. Using the latest technology, we are unlocking human potential and transforming our customer’s workforces in ways they never imagined. We are digitally transforming their businesses into the next generation of intelligent enterprises. Because people are at the heart of every business transformation and people are the heart of our business. The SAP SuccessFactors product suite spans core human resources and payroll, analytics-based hiring and customized onboarding, continuous performance management, intelligent succession and more. We operate the largest HCM Cloud in the world, supporting over 120 million users with over a billion transactions for customers across 26 industries in over 90 countries. Our co-located agile teams have end-to-end ownership of product, design, development, release, user assistance, and cloud operations capabilities. We are looking for the best talent to join our team and deliver continuous innovations in the cloud while bringing purpose to their lives and more meaning to their work. Join us today and become a part of the Human Revolution.
ABOUT THE TEAM
The Cloud HCM Analytics team builds the analytics solution on top of world’s biggest cloud-based enterprise application which has unique challenge in building a common solution that should be customizable for more than 4,450 across 60 industries in over 177 countries and scalable for 50 million users usage. We are responsible for building operational reporting solutions, as well as cutting edge analytical solutions. This team provides ample opportunities to interact with various stake holders and come of the best solution and implement the same with support for highly customizable and scalable approach. Current development activities involved in make use of Predictive Analytics, Machine learning and Artificial Intelligence. We have ambitious road map to start working on Prescriptive analytics.
Position Overview
Developers should be able to work as a Full stack developer with specialized either in UI or back end. Design highly scalable and performant solution which address functional as well as nonfunctional requirement with high quality.
Full stack developer – willing and capable of handling both client and server development
End to end responsibility – take care of your feature from requirements to deployment
Collaborate well – demonstrate excellent development practices, share and motivate others.
This development role provides immense potential for growth. The potential candidate would work closely with other members of the team and other functional groups within SAP SuccessFactors
SKILLS AND COMPETENCIES
Strong technical skills with technologies like Java/J2EE, Hibernate, Spring, SAP HANA, UI Technologies and OData protocols to develop modem cutting edge software that performs and scales in cloud environment
Server oriented - Knowledge in Java backend development (tomcat, JEE, dependency injection, and more) – mandatory
At least basic client-side knowledge of Web technologies, JS, HTML, CSS – mandatory.
Sound knowledge in Object Oriented Programming Principles, Design Patterns and Software Architecture, especially in new age Cloud solutions
Must be able to design and implement across all layers of the software (UI, Backend, Database)
Exposure to debugging, troubleshooting and performance tuning for complex SQL queries
Knowledge of lean development infrastructure process including Git, TeamCity, Jenkins etc. and exposure to Continuous Delivery practices
Exposure to building Analytical and report modelling for highly customizable Enterprise cloud-based SaaS application
Working knowledge of Scrum, Test Driven Development and passionate about unit test, integrity testing, stress testing and performance testing and test automation
Exposure to building large scale application deployed on public cloud like AWS, AZURE etc ..
EDUCATION, WORK EXPERIENCE AND QUALIFICATIONS
BE/B.Tech, ME/M.Tech, MCA with 60% aggregate across.
Strong educational qualifications (Engineering majors, MCA from reputed institutes)
4-8 years of professional experience in developing Java/J2EE based enterprise web-based application,
Outstanding written and verbal communication skills.
Bachelor’s in Computer Science required, Master preferred.
#SAPSFSF

WHAT YOU GET FROM US
Success is what you make it. At SAP, we help you make it your own. A career at SAP can open many doors for you. If you’re searching for a company that’s dedicated to your ideas and individual growth, recognizes you for your unique contributions, fills you with a strong sense of purpose, and provides a fun, flexible and inclusive work environment – apply now.
SAP'S DIVERSITY COMMITMENT
To harness the power of innovation, SAP invests in the development of its diverse employees. We aspire to leverage the qualities and appreciate the unique competencies that each person brings to the company.
SAP is committed to the principles of Equal Employment Opportunity and to providing reasonable accommodations to applicants with physical and/or mental disabilities. If you are in need of accommodation or special assistance to navigate our website or to complete your application, please send an e-mail with your request to Recruiting Operations Team (Americas: Careers.NorthAmerica@sap.com or Careers.LatinAmerica@sap.com, APJ: Careers.APJ@sap.com, EMEA: Careers@sap.com).
Successful candidates might be required to undergo a background verification with an external vendor.

Title: Senior Automation QA Engineer (Remote/Work-from-home)
Description:
WalletHub is one of the leading personal finance destinations in the US and rapidly growing. We’re looking for a motivated, hardworking, and competitive Senior Automation QA Engineer for a full-time, permanent position.
The expected work schedule is 7 AM to 7 PM EST Monday to Friday, including a 1h break.
Responsibilities
Testing and assuring high quality performance of website
Reporting and validating bugs for all components
Creating test plans and test cases
Creating and maintaining automated tests using Selenium and Java
Identifying opportunities for improvement and making constructive suggestions for change
Qualifications
You are the ideal candidate for this job if you have:
At least 3 years of hands-on experience in Test Automation with Java and Selenium
At least 4 years experience in Manual Testing
Excellent attention to details
Proven ability to meet deadlines and handle multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment
Willingness to work hard
Proficient in written/spoken English
Compensation
Very competitive salary based on prior experience and qualifications
Potential for stock options after the first year
Raise and advancement opportunities based on periodic evaluations
The ability to work overtime for added income
100% remote position
Visa sponsorship (after 24 months with the company, based on performance, in case you will be working from outside the US)
How to apply
To get our attention, all you need to do is apply on Indeed and include your updated resume as well as a brief message telling us why you are the right candidate.If we believe that you will be a good match, we'll contact you to arrange the next steps of the application process.
Please know that we appreciate your interest in our company but due to the high number of applications we are unable to get back to candidates who have not been selected to move forward.
Note
This position does not have a location requirement and can be performed remotely from outside the U.S. without the need for U.S. work authorization.
More about WalletHub
WalletHub is a high-growth fintech company based in Washington, D.C. that is looking for talented, hard-working individuals to help us reshape personal finance. More specifically, we are harnessing the power of data analytics and artificial intelligence to build the brain of a smart financial advisor, whose services we’re offering to everyone for free. The WalletHub brain enables users to make better financial decisions in a fraction of the time with three unique features:
1) Customized Credit-Improvement Tips: WalletHub identifies improvement opportunities and guides you through the necessary corrections.
2) Personalized Money-Saving Advice: WalletHub’s savings brain constantly scours the market for load-lightening opportunities, bringing you only the best deals.
3) Wallet Surveillance: Personal finance isn’t as scary with 24/7 credit monitoring providing backup, notifying you of important credit-report changes.
In addition to the valuable intelligence the brain provides, WalletHub is the first and only service to offer free credit scores and full credit reports that are updated on a daily basis absent of user interaction, rather than weekly or monthly and only when a user logs in. Some other services hang their hats on free credit scores and reports, yet they’re still inferior to what WalletHub considers minor pieces to a much larger puzzle.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹960,000.00 to ₹2,100,000.00 /year

2) Personalized Money-Saving Advice: WalletHub’s savings brain constantly scours the market for load-lightening opportunities, bringing you only the best deals.
3) Wallet Surveillance: Personal finance isn’t as scary with 24/7 credit monitoring providing backup, notifying you of important credit-report changes.
In addition to the valuable intelligence the brain provides, WalletHub is the first and only service to offer free credit scores and full credit reports that are updated on a daily basis absent of user interaction, rather than weekly or monthly and only when a user logs in. Some other services hang their hats on free credit scores and reports, yet they’re still inferior to what WalletHub considers minor pieces to a much larger puzzle.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: ₹960,000.00 to ₹2,100,000.00 /year

Experience with Data Modelling Tool like Erwin/MagicDraw, Hadoop Monitoring services, Hadoop Architecture Understanding, Hadoop Installation/ Service Management, Cluster Management, Unix/Python Scripting,

Should be able to compare tools and technologies and recommend a tool or technology

Why Join us
Our people in India will be at the forefront of technological change as they work collaboratively with, and learn from, world-class experts and have access to the latest training programs and insights for their field.
Alongside your work on leading edge projects, working with us means you'll have access to company perks and benefits that'll reward you for the great work you do. We’re growing, fast, and for you that means many exciting opportunities to develop your career with us at Telstra.
We’re committed to building a diverse and inclusive workforce. To enable everyone to participate, we’ve developed an ‘All Roles Flex’ policy to consider flexible ways of working for every role. To learn more, visit tel.st/allrolesflex
